Lulyabimera(Herbivorous) eba nsolo efuna ebiriisa(nutrients) n'amasoboza(energy) gayo nga okusingira ddala erya bimera . Muni mulimu ente, embuzi,n'endala.

Okugajambula(Predation):
Kino ky'ekikolwa ekya lulyansolo eky'okuyuzayuza ensolo gye zigenda okulya oba okuginuunamu omusaayi n'enjala n'amannyo gaazo amayuziso(canine teeth).

English - Luganda thematic dictionary:
Physics.
The concept "akatinniinya" is formed by blending the words in the phrase "akatoffaalo akatini ennyo:
(viii) Obutunniinya (Alpha and beta particles).
The concept "obutunniinya" is formed by blending the words in the phrase "obutundutundu obutini ennyo". Obutunniinya are actually "Obutoffaali"(any kindo of particles.
Don't confuse "obutoffaali"(particles) with the biological "obutaffaali"(cells)
From "amasannyalaze" (electricity) , he has formed ,"Obusannyalazo". “Obusannyalazo” (electrons) are responsible for creation of “amasannyalaze” (electricity) due to their “flow” called “omugendo gw’obusannyalazo” (the flow of electrons).

Ensolo Lubbira:
“Lubbira” zirina ebisonjozo bino:
Bivudde mu Kitabo "Essomabiramu"(Biology) ekya Muwanga

Lugirigimba(Reptiles):
Lugirigimmba
Bino by’ebisonjozo bya Lugirigimmba:
(i) Zirina olususu olukalubo nga lukaluwavu oba luyita oluliba olukalubo nga olukaluwavu. Era Muwanga aziyise Nalukalu olutafulumya mangu mazzi kuva mu mubiri ekizisobozesa okuwangaalira mu mbeera enkaluwavu era ne ziba nga ziyinza okutambula ne zibeera wala okuba awali amazzi nga emigga, emyala, ennyanja, oba entobazi. Lugirigimba nga enfude zibiika amagi ku lukalu
(ii) Zirina ebigirigimba.Era Muwanga aziyise Lugirigimba
(iii) Ezisinga zirina amagulu ana kyokka waliwo n’ezitalina magulu nga emisota
(iv) Zonna zibiika amagi. Muwanga nga ebinyonyi ebitali mu kikula kyazo.
Bivudde mu kitabo "Essomabiramu"(Biology) ekya Muwanga

Luyonsa (Mammals):
Luyonsa 
Ebikula bya luyonsa biri eyo mu nkumi nnya , nga ekikula kya luyonsa ekisingayo obutono ke kawundo ek’oluyindo ate ekikula kya luyonsa ekisinga obunene ye lukwata (whale) eya bbulu eno nga ebaako nga fuuti kikumi ate ezitowa ttani kikumi mw’ataano . Kyokka oba zibeera ku lukalu oba mu mazzi , luyonsa zonna zirina ebisonjozo eby’awawamu . Luyonsa zonna :
• Nsolo ez’enkizi ( vertebrates) kuba zirina ebikoggo oba olukoggo( backbone or spine).
• Nsolo ez’omusaayi omubugumu (warm-blooded animals) oba “lwepimirabbugumu “( endothermic animals). Lwepimirabbugumu nsolo ezirina emibiri egifuga obwoki bwagyo, ekintu ekizisobozesa okuwangaalira kumpi mu buli mbeera ya budde ku Nsi. 
• Zirina obwoya ku mibiri gyazo 
• Emibiri gyazo gikola amata okuyonsa ebito byazo. Kati nno eno y’ensonga lwaki Muwanga aziyise Luyonsa .
Bivudde mu kitabo "Essomabiramu"(Biology) ekya Muwanga

Ekibalo ekigobensonga(Variation Math):
Kyandibadde kirungi osome ku miramwa gino ebiri:
(ii) Ekigobansonga
Singa oba ogoberedde bulungi engeri Charles Muwanga gy'annyonnyolamu emiramwa gino oba okiraba nti amakulu gaagyo ge gamu.
Ekigobansonga kibalo kya bintu oba embeera ezigoba ensonga. Okugoba ensonga kuba kunoonya kakwate wakati z’embeera emu n’embeera endala oba ekintu ekimu n’ekirala.
Mu Sayansi ez’entabaganyai(Social sciences) okufaanana ne Sayansi ez’obulamu(health sciences),buli kintu kirina akakwate n’ekirala. Mu ngeri y’emu,embeera emu eyinza okuba n’akakwate n’embeera endala, ekitegeeza nti ekibeera k mbeera emu kibaako kye kikola ku mbeera endala.
Kino kiyinza okutunuulirwa nga omukwataganyo(unction) nga embeera emu ekwatagana n’embeera endala , butereevu (directly) oba mu kifuunannenge(inversely).
“Omugobansonga” (Dialectician) anoonya enjawulo eri wakati w’ebifaanagavu n’obumu bw’ebitali bifaanagavu. Bino biyinza okuba :
• Ekigerageranyo ky’omusolo n’obungi bw’ebitundibwa (tax rate and amount of items sold)
• Emisinde n’ebiseera (Speed and time)
• Omuwendo gw’abakola n’obunene bw’omulimu gwe bakola mu kiseera ky’ekimu
• Obwetoloovu n’olusekkati(Circumfrence and diameter
• Ekigerageranyo ky’obungi bw’omukyere n’amazzi ageetaagisa oggujjisa . Kino kiba mu mugerageranyo(roati) kya 1:2 
Weetegereze emiramwa gino egiri wansi w’essomo lino:
(i)Okugendana obutereevu (Direct proportionality). Its synonym is :
• Okukyukana obutereevu(Direct variation)
(ii) Okugendana ekifuulannenge (Inverse proportion). Its synonym is :
• Okukyukana ekifuulannenge(Inverse variation)
Nga waliwo enkyusibwo(variables) bbiri x ne y, y eba egendana butereevu ne x singa wabaawo entakyuka(k) etali zziro . Okugendana obutereevu era tukiyita okukyukana obutereevu(direct variation).
Ebigambululo ebigobansonga(Variation statements):
(a)Singa ekintu kiba kitambulira ku misinde egy,entakyuka(constant speed), kitegeeza nti obuwanvu bw’olugendo oluba lutambuliddwa lugendana butereevu(is directly proportional) n’ebiseera bye kimala mu kkubo , ng’emisinde , y’entakyuka ey’omugerageranyo era eyitibwa entakyuka ey’omugendaganyo(constant of proportionality).
(b) Obwetoloovu(circumference) bw’enkula ennetoloovu (entoloovu) bugendana butereevu n’olusekkati (diameter) lwayo , nga paayi(pi) y’entakyuka ey’omugendaganyo(constant of proportion ).
(d) Empalirizo eteekebwa ku kintu olw’essikirizo (gravity) eba egendana butereevu n’enzitoya(mass) y’ekintu ekyo; entakyuka ey’omugendagano wakati w’enzitoya n’empalirizo eyitibwa “ekitebenteso eky’essikirizo(gravitational acceleration).
(ii) Ebigambululo ebyakifuulannenge(inverse proportions) . “Okukyukana ekifuulannenge”(Inverse proportionality).Enkyusibwo bbiri (two variables) ziba zigendana kifuulannenge(are inversely proportional) oba zikyukana kifuulannenge singa buli nkyusibwo eba egendana butereevu n’ensulike y’ekirala.
Wamo enkyusibwo y eba egendana kifuulannenge n’enkyusibwo x singa wabaawo entakyuka etali zeero. Ekyokulabirako:
(a) Obuwanvu bw’olugendo bigendana kifuulannenge n’emisinde
(b) Ebiseera ebyetaagisa okukola omulimu bigendana kifuulannenge n’omuwendo gw’abakozi .
Mu kibalangulo , singa “y = 7x” ,kitegeeza nti buli “x” lw’ekyuka ne “y” eba ekyuka.

Obufo,Obusangiro, Obwolekero (Position, Location, and Direction):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles, obufo(Position), obusangiro(Location) , n'obwolekero (direction) miramwa girinaaniganye nnyo mu makulu naye ate mu nsi eya sayansi oba ka tugambe nti mu Luganda olubalanguzi(mathematical Luganda) girina amakulu ga njawulo:
Oluganda we lutuuse omuntu ajja kuba yetaaga okusoma ennyo okwawula buli kintu ku kilara ne bwe biba bifaanagana nnyo. Tewakyaali bigambo bibiri birina makulu ge gamu kukimu ku kikumi.

Ekibuuzabantu n'embuuzamuntu(Survey and Questionaire):
Mu kisengekakalonda (Statistics), Muwanga akusaba weetegereze emiramwa gino:

Ekibazisambira=Embazamapeesa (Abacus):
“Embazisambira” oba "ekibazisambira"(abacus) 
Ky’olina okumanya ku mbazisambira/ekibazisambira oba embazamapeesa(abacus) kwe kuba nti:
• Eno mbalanguziso(culaturator) eriko embira oba amapeesa agasengekeddwa ku kweso(frame) okukozesebwa okubala n’okubaza 
• embira zibalibwa okusinziira ku muwendo gw’ekifo .

Muddugavukwefaako(Blafricanism):
"Muddugavukwefaako"(Blafricanism) ndowooza ey'awamu eyetaagisa mu baddugavu bonna we bali, naddala abaddugavu abali mu Afirika, okwenyigira mu kawefube w'okwetaggulula ku buyivuwavu obw'esigamye ku nnimi engwira nga Olungerza, Olufalansa, Oluwalabu, olukyayina, n'endala mu kusomesa n'okuyiga okwa sayansi.Muddugavukwefaako ndowooza eteeka essira okukulaakulanya ennimi zaffe za kinnansi mu magezi aga sayansi n'ekibalangulo(essoamkubala), okunoonyereza okwa sayansi awamu ne tekinologiya.
Muddugavukwefaako ndowooza etategeeza nti ennimi engwiira tuziviireko ddala, wabula tukozese ennimi zaffe enzaaliranwa n'ezo engwira mu kusomesa, okuyiga n'okunoonyewreza okwa sayansi.Kino kyetaagisa kawefube okukulaakulanya ennini zaffe enzaaaliranwa okufuuka ennimni eza sayansi.
"Muddugavukwefaako" ye ayidologiya oba endowooza eyawamu , okusinziira ku Munnabyabufuna (Political economist) Muwanga Charles, eyetaagibwa okusoosowaza buli muddugavu ali mu Afirika okusobola okweyubula mu magezi aga sayansi. Muwanga agamba nti endowooza eyawamu eya "Muddugavukwefaako yekuusiza ku bwetaavu bwa kukunga baddugavu okukimanya nti balina "obusobozi bw'omulengera" (mental faculty) bwe bumu n'abazungu lwa kuba abaddugavu:
(i) besaasira nnyo n'okwekubagiza olw'ebikolobero ebizze bibabatuusibwako mu byafaayo era ne balobera mu kwekubagiza mu kifo ky'okugenda mu maaso.
(ii) tebaagala kutawaanya bwongo bwabwe , so ng'ate okusomooza obwongo nga twefumiitiriza ku butonde kye kivaamu okuvumbula okwa sayansi.Omudfdugavu Obutayagala kutawaanya bwongo bwe, okirabira ku butayagala kusoma bitabo ku bintu bya njawulo okujjako nga basoma lwa kuyita bigezo.Tebatera kukubaganya birowoozo ku miramwa gya sayansi nga bwe bakikola ku byobufuzi n'ebyokusamira.
(iii)baagala nnyo ebikolerere n'okwegyalabya mu kifo ky'okuteeka ebiseera n'ensimbi mu kuyiiya n'okuvumbula.
(iv) Tebaagala kuva kw'ekyo ekibaddewo okuva edda n'edda yadde ebivumbuddwa mu sayansi bikiwakanya
(vi) Bavumirira era ne bavuvuba abo ababa bavuddeyo n'endowooza empya ku butonde era baggulumiza nnyo endowooza za bajjajja abaaliwo mu mirembe egitaali gya sayansi nga buli kirwadde ekitamanyiddwa kikireeta okukiyita eddogo mu kifo ky'okukola kaweefube okunoonyereza ku kikireeta bakifunire eddagala.
(vii) Tebafaayo kunonooza bya magezi na buyiiya abo bakagezimunyu baffe abedda bye baavumbula n'okukola mu bisera byabwe eby'obulamu wabula badda mu kumala biseera nga babasamirira nga babayita balubaale.
(viii) Obutonde obubasukkulumyeko mu kumanya kwabwe batandika kubusinza nga amageege , emiti, n'ensozi ebyakula ne biwola. Omuzungu ye buli ekimusukkulumyeko mu kutegeera kwe ye takisamirira wabula ekikolako okunoonyereza okwa sayansi asobole okuzuula amateeka ga sayansi agali emabega waakyo.
(ix) Baagala nnyo ekyo ekyawamu (collectivism) okusinga kawefube n'okuyiiya okuva eri muntu kinnoomu(individualism) so ngaate baalugera nti ebyabasatu/ eby'abangi bisattuka.Bw'okola okuvumbula ekipya nga okinoonyerezzaako wekka bakubuuza lwaki wakivumbudde nga oli wekka so ng'ate by'ovumbudde bigenda kugasa bonna, abaana n'abazzukulu.
(x) bagattika eby'obuwangwa n'emize egiteesigamye ku sayansi nga okusaddaaka abantu, okutwala abalwadde b'obuwuka obusirikitu(micro organisms) nga ekilwadde ky'ettalo ku ndagu eziteesigamya nzijanjaba ku magezi ga sayansi, okunoonya obugagga mu mmandwa mu kifo ky'okukola okwejja mu bwavu.
(xi) Okukuliriza n'okusooosowaza enjawukana z'amawanga n'amadiini mu kifo ky'okwenyigira mu kawefube w'eby'enjigiriza, ebyokwerinda, ebyenfuna , awamu sayansi ne tekinologiya ebiyamba bonna awatali kuiva ku buwangwa na ddiini.

Ekibanduso (A Primer of Change):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga , "ekibanduso"(Primer of change ) kiva mu bigambo by'oluganda "ekikolwa eky'emmanduso" oba "ekiwandiiko eky'emmanduso( an act or document that triggers a fundamental change). Mu byafaayo by'ensi, enkulaakulana zizze zivugibwa "ebibanduso eby'enkyukakyuka"(primers of change). Ekibanduso ky'ekyo ekibandula(that which triggers) enkyukakyuka ssinziggu.
Ekimu ku "bibanduso eby'enkyukakyuka" ebikulu mu byafaayo by'ensi , abadde sayansi ne tekinologiya. Olw'okuba sayansi ne tekinologiya kibadde kibanduso ekiteewalika , Charles Muwanga akizudde nti okufuula ennimi zaffe ez'abadddugavu ennimi eza sayansi kibanduso kya nkyukakyuka(primer of change) ssinziggu kye tutayinza kubuusa maaso.
"Omugeye Muwanga agamba nti omuntu yenna omugezi, eyefumiitiriza era omunoonyerezi ne bwaba si mukenkufu mu ssomo erimu oba eddala , ayinza okukola "ekibanduso"(primer of change) okukyusa abantu mu ntabaganya ye(in his society) kyokka alina kufungiza bbiri , anti ajja kusanga ebiwonvu n'ebikko , Muwanga Charles b'alaga okuba abantu ba biti bisatu:
1. Abantu ebitundu 33% baba bajja kukola buli ekikulemesa.Bano be bayita abantu ab'effutwa, enge , n'empiiga(the reactionaries , retrogressive elements of society )
2. Abantu 33% tebajja kufaayo ku ky'okola era bajja kukulaga nti tebibakwatako. Bagamba ebyo bibyo, oba omala biseera oba oli mulalu atalina bya kukola.Bano be bayita abantu abeesuulirayo ogwa naggamba(these are indefferent to social change).
3. Abantu 33% be bantu abajja okukuwa amaanyi, okukuwabula mu mutima omulungi, okukwebaza , n'okukwegattako oba pokukuwa obuwagizi obw'enjawulo bwe wetaaga(progressive elements of society).
Okiraba nti , abasinga obunji tebajja kuba naawe .Kyokka nga omuntu eyekkirirzaamu era ow'enkyukakyuka , lemerangako, onootuuka ku buwanguzi wamu n'aba ababadde bakulemesa. Eno y'ensonga lwaki tuleseewo endowooza ey'omuddugavuwefeeko(blafricanism), topowa(toggwamu maanyi) !!!
Ekibanduso(Primer of change) ky'ekimu ku bintu ebijja okukuyamba okubunyisa enjiri y'ebyo by'ozudde ebigenda okuyamba buli muntu okutuuka ku ntikko !!!

Ekitojji ky'ensirinngaannyi:

Okuvunda Kw'ebiramu:
"Okuvunda kw’Ebiramu"
Okuva mu kitabo kye "Essomabiramu"(BIology), Muwanga Charles ayogera ku sayansi ali emabega w'okuvunda kw'ebiramu nga wano wansi:
Okuvunda(decomposition/rotting) y’engeri ekintu ekibaddewo gye kikutulwakutulwamu okuzzibwa mu kirala. Emibiri gy’ebiramu gitandikirawo okuvunda olumala okufa naye okuvunda kuno kugenda mu maaso mu mitendera ate era mu buli kikula kya kiramu okuvunda kugenda mu maaso mu ngeri ya njawulo kyokka emitendera gye kuyitamu gye gimu.
Waliwo okuvunda kw’ebiramu(biotic decomposition) n’okuvunda kw’ebitali biramu(abiotic decomposition). Okuvunda kw’ebitali biramu kuba nga kufumya kintu ne sabusitansi eya kemiko oba ng’efunyibwafunyibwa. Okuvunda kw’ebiramu kuba kukutulakutula mu mubiri gw’ekiramu okuyita mu bulamu obulala obusirikitu(microorganisms).
Omuntu afudde avunda okuyita mu mitendera etaano ; ayegayega(omubiri gufuuka yegeyege nga y’akakutuka ate olwo ne gukakanyala) , ekiddako n’afuma(bloat), avundira ddala(active decay), n’akunkumuka(advanced decay).
1. Okuyegayega
Omutima olusirika , wabaawo enkyukakyuka ez’ebuziba(chemical changes) mu mubiri era obutaffaalikazimbamubiri nebutandika okusereba nga buviibwaako obuzimbe bwabwo.Kino kiviirako okufulumya enzaimu ez’obutaffaali eziyinza okusobozesa okukutulakutula mu butoffaalikazimbakiramu endala. Wano tewaba kyamaanyo kiba kirabibwa nti kigenda mu maaso.
Okuyegayega kubaawo ng’omuntu ya kakutuka ng’omubiri gwonna gufuuse yegeyege ate oluvannyuma ne gukakanyala. Olw’okuba omusaayi tegukyatambula mu mubiri guwagamira mu mubiri, kino ne kikolawo endabika eya bululu(livor mortis). Mu ssawa ssatu okutuuka ku mukaaga, wabaawo okukakanyala(rigor mortis) . Omuntu olumala okukutuka omubiri gutandika okunnyogoga(algor mortis) ng’ebbugumu lifuluma wa bweeru.
2. Okufuma
Okufuma( bloat ) kwe kulaga nti waliwo ekigenda mu maaso mu nkyuukakyuuka eri mu mubiri ogufudde. Mutereezabulamu(metabolism) mu mubiri ng’amazi okukoma wantandika okubeerawo aketalikiriro k’obuwuka bunakavundiza obuleetawo mutereezakuvunda(anaerobic metabolism) ,ekintu ekiviirako okwekuluumulula kw ggasi ne kizimbya olubuto n’okufulumya amazzi okufa buli katuli ka mubiri ng’ennyindo, akamwa n’emabega .Ggaasi zino era zikola akanyigirizi akayinza okuleetera olususu okwesala . Singa ebiwuka bituuka ku mulambo, ebivunyuvunyu(maggots) byalula ne bitandika okulya omubiri.. 
3. Okuvundira ddala(okusebengerera)
Mu kuvundira ddala(active decay) ennyama etandika okusaanirawo ddala olw’envunyu eziba zigirya n’amazzi ga nakavundiza(decomposition fluids) gaba gafulumizibwa .Wano okuwunya okw’amaanyi we kutandikira . Enkomerero y’okuvunda yeyolekera mu kugenda kwa nvunyu okuva ku mubiri nezigenda mu kiwummulo( to pupate) .
4. Amasitukiro 
Wano ekisigalawo kiyitibwa ebisigalira omuli akawanga ne ngumbagumba endala.Kyokka mu essoambiramu, tetwagala nnyo kubiyita bisigalira wabula amasitukiro(skelton) ekitegeeza, amagumba okusitukira omubiri gw'ekiramu.
Okuvunda nakwo kugenda mu maaso mu mitendera, okutandika n’okukala(okuggwaamu amazzi n’okukamula ebipooli bya kaboni ebimerenguka mu kikolwa kino.Ekiddako kuba kumenyekamenyeka kw’ekimera obutundutundu obuyinza okulumbibwa ebiwuka obulungi. 
Ebbugumu liyamba nnyo mu kuvunda kw’ebimera era okuvunda kwanguwa nnyo nga waliwo okwokya oba ebbugumu ery’amaanyi . Kino kiba kitegeeza nti ekimera ekiri awookya kyanguwa okuvunda okusinga ekiri ewannyogoga.. Ebbugumu lye lifuga emisinde gy'okuvunda era ekigerageranyo ekifu kwe kifundira kyeyongera buli ebbugumuu lwe lyeyongera era okiraba nti n'ekimera mu mbeera eyokya kivunda mangu okusnga mu bunnyogovu. W
Mu mbeera gye tulimu empiira(omuliro) , ebiwuka, ebirya ebintu ebiri mu kuvunda , enkuyege, ensolo ezirya omuddo , n’okusattira kw’ensolo ezirinnyirira omuddo nga zitambulirako bye biyamba okukutulakutula mu muddo ate olwo bakitiria ne fungi nezongezaayo okuvundiza ebimera ebyo. 
Mu kuvundiza oba okuvunda kw’ebimera , okutomaggana kwa kemiko okugenda mu maaso kuvaaamu okufulumya omukka ogwa kaboni-bbiri-okisayidi. (carbon dioxide).

Obutaffaali n'Obutoffaali(Cells and particles):
Emiramwa eginnyonnyola enjawulo wakati w’akatoffaali n'akataffaali, okusinziira ku Muwanga gye gino:
Akatoffaali(particle) katono nnyo okusinga akataffaali(living cell). Ennyukuta “o” mu kigambo katoffaali ekkaatiriza obutono bw’akatoffaali yadde byombi akatoffaali n’akataffaali busirikitu obwetaagisa enzimbulukusa okusobola okubulaba n’eriiso eriri obukunya.
(ix) Obusirikitu . (Muno mulimu ) 
• Nampawengwa(nampa) neutron(nyutirooni)
• Kikontana (konta) proton(piratoni)
• Akasannyalaza electron(erakitooni)
Akatoffaalikazimbakintu (the building block of matter) era kayitibwa atomu(obungi-watomu) . Akataffaalikazimbakintu nako kalina obusirikitu obukazimba, obuyitibwa obutoffaalikazimbatomu (subatomic particles). Obutoffaalikazimbatomu buli busatu Obusannyalaza, Konta, ne nampa.
Amakkati g’akaziba(atom) ge gayitibwa obuziizi (nucleus) era muno mwe musangibwa obusirikitu obuyitibwa nampa ne konta. Konta (Protons) ekiggwayo “kikontana” (opposite of) ne nampa, ekiggwayo “nampawengwa” (neutral) bwe busirikitu obukola obuziizi ya atomu .

Munna-words of Luganda experts:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles, Munna- kawango kasookeso akeyambisibwa okuzimba emiramwa egiraga obukenkufu mu masomo ag'enjawulo. Muno mulimu abakugu oba bakakensa nga :
(i) Munnamateeka (Lawyer) = Owebyamateeka
(ii)Munnasayansi (Scientist)=Owebyasayansi
(iii) Munnabwengula (Astronomist) =Owebyobwengula
(iv) Munnassomabiramu (biologist) = Owessomabiramu
(v)Munnassomabutonde(Physicist)= Owebyessomabutonde 
(vi)Munnassomabuziba(Chemist) =Owebyessomabuziba
(vii)Munnabyabufuna(Political economist)=Owebyobufuna
(viii) Munnasssomabibuuka(Earonetic scientist ) =Owebyessomabibuuka

Ekikamulabiriisa(Digestion):
Ekikamulabiriisa
Ensengekera y'ekikamula biriisa(the digestive system) ey’omuntu, erambuluddwa Muwanga mu Luganda bweti:
Mufulumya – lwe lujji lw’emanju ku mubiri gw’omuntu ku nkomerero y’ensengekera ya kikola ku mmere awafulumira obubi atayingiziddwa mu nsengekera ya mubiri(body system).
apendiisi – akasawo akatono akasangibwa ekyenda ekinene we kitandikira 
Omumiro(esofagguusi) - omuyitiro(opening) omuwanvu wakati w’omumwa n’olubuto . ogukozesa okwenyenyeenya kw’emiwuula okusengeke okuyingiza emmere mu lubuto . 
Akalulwe –kano kalinga kasawo akatono akaliraanye dwodina. Ke katereka n’okufulumya kemiko eyitibwa boyiro(bire) mu bwenda obutono. Boyiro kemiko ya kikamula mmere(digestive chemical) ekolebwa mu kibumba. 
Ekyenda ekinene – Guno gwe muyitiro omuwanvu ate omugazi omuyita emmere ng’emaze okukolebwaako(okukamulwaamu ebyetaagisa omubiri) mu bwenda obutono. 
Ekibumba – Kino kitundu ekinene ekisangibwa waggulu ne mumaaso g’olubuto. Ekibumba ke kakungunta k’obujama oba obutwa okuva mu musaayi ate era ne kikola boyiro(bire) ekutulakutula mu masavu n’ekola ne bizimbamubiri (proteins) ezimu mu masaayi. 
Omumwa – Kino kye kitundu ekisooka mu nsengekera ya kikamula biriisa oba kikola ku mmere (digestive system) , emmere weyingirira mu mubiri. Okugaaya ne enzayimu ezisangibwa mu malusu mu kamwa munda bye bikola entandikwa ya kikamula biriisa nga bikutulakutula mu mmere. 
Akataago- . kano kavuluzi (gland) akafulumya enzayimu esangibwa wansi w’olubuto ne waggulu w’ebyenda. . Enzayimu okuva mu kataago ziyamba okukola ku bireetamaanyi(digestion of carbohydrates), amazavu , n’ebizimbamubiri( proteins) mu bwenda obutono .
Ekireeta – Kino kye kitundu kya wansi eky’ekyenda ekinene omuterekwa kazambi nga tannaba kufulumizibwa okuva mu mubiri. 
Obwenda obutono. Guno gwe muyitiro omutono omuwanvu – emmere mwyita era n’ekolebwaako ng’evudde mu lubuto.
Olubuto . Lino ttogero lya asidi , ekitundu ekiringa ekisawo ekyekutte ku mumiro(esofaggaasi). Emmere bw’eyingira mu lubuto esogolwasogolwa mu ttogero lya asidi lino.

Ekifulumyakazambi(Excretion):
Ekifulumyakazambi 
(Excretion). 
Ensengekera y'ekifulumyakazambi(the excretory system) nsengekera ya bulamu ey’ekimpowooze ejja ebitetaagisa oba ebyobulabe mu mubiri gw’ekiramu . Ensengekera ya kifulumyakazambi y’evunaanyizibwa okujja kazambi(waste products) ava mu mutereezabulamu( metabolism) awamu n’ebitetaagisa ebirala mu kikula kya kakulukusi(omusulo oba entuuyo) n’omukka. 
Ebitundu by’omubiri ebiramu ebisinga bifulumya kazambi wakati mu mutereezabulamu(metabolism) aba agenda mu maaso mu mubiri, ekintu ekyetaagisa ensengekera ya kifulumyakazambi ennambulukufu mu mubiri. Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles , ensengekera y'ekifulumyakazambi efulumya kazambi ng’omusulo(urine) oba obubi(feaces),okunokoolayo ebimu.Ebitundu by’omubiri ebikola ensengekera y'ekifulumya kazambi mulimu:
(i) Olususu
Olususu lulimu obutuli obufulumiramu entuuyo ezirimu kazambi ow’engeri emu oba endala. Kyokka olw’okuba okutuyana kuyamba okufuga tempulikya z’omubiri kuyinza era okubalirwa mu kuvulula(secretion). Wano olususu luba lweyisizza nga ekifulumyamazzi(perspiration) mu bimera.
(ii) Amawuggwe
(iii) Ensigo
Olumu kazambi omungi akalabula xxxxxxx ng’obuyinja . Bwe bukula buleeta okulumizibwa era buyinza okwetaaga okulongoosebwa yadde ng’obumu ku buyinja buno buba butono ekimala okusobola okufulumizibwa mu musulo. 
xxxx birina emigaso mingi mu mubiri omuli n’ okufulumya kazambi wa mutereezabulamu nga omusulo, wamonia(ammonia), ne asidi za kasulo(uric acids)
(iv) Okupita 
Ensolo enamu zifulumya kazambi owa ssolido , olutabu oba owa kakulukusi(bbi) okuva mu muyitiro gwa kikolaku mmere( digestive tract) okuyita mu mufulumya(anus) mu kikolwa ekiyitibwa okupita (defecation).
(v) Omiyitiro gy’omusulo ogusooka 
Mu buzimbe bw’omuntu( human anatomy), emiyitiro gy’omusulo mikusese gya miwuula egisindika omusulo(urine) okuva mu xxxxx(kidneys) okudda mu kawago( urinary bladder). 
Akawago( urinary bladder) kye kitundu ky’omubiri ekikungaanya omusulo ogubagufulumiziddwa ebiwowoolo(kidneys) nga tegunafukwa .
(vii) Omuyitiro gw’omusulo ogusembayo
Mu buzimbe bw’omubiri gw’omuntu( anatomy), omuyitiro gw’omusulo ogusembayo(the urethra) guba mukusese ogugatta akawago n’awafulumya omusulo awayitibwa “akasolo”. 
Okukola omusulo kitandika na musaayi nga guyita mu alitaali Arteries) ez’enjawulo okudda mu kapiraali(capirlaries) eziyitibwa golomero(glomerulus), okutuuka ku kapisu ya bboma ( Bowman's capsule).

Ekivululo:
Ekivululo (Secretion)
Muwanga agamba nti omwogezi w'Oluganda yenna kimukakatako okumanya enjawulo wakati w'ekifulumyakazambi (excretion) n’okuvulula oba ekivululo (secretion)
Okuvulula oba ekivululabibikulukusi kitegeeza ebitundu by’omubiri okuleeta sebusitansi naddala etali kazambi okuva mu musaayi oba mu butaffali bw’omubiri. Ekyokulabirako kwe kuvulula amalusu, amaziga, boyiro (bire) ebikemuluzi (hormone) oba amata okuva mu mabeere.Sebusitansi zino ze ziyitibwa ebivululo by’omubiri(body secretions). 
Okuvulula kye kikolwa ( process) eky’okuleeta enkyusabuziba(chemical) oba sebusitansi z'enkyusabuziba (chemical substances) okuva mu katoffaalikazimbamubiri oba obuvuluzi (glands). Obutafaanana na kifulumyakazambi (excretion), sebusitansi evululibwa eba n’omugaso mu mubiri; teba kazambi (waste).

Ensengekera y'ekitambuzamusaayi(the Blood circulatory system):
Ensengekera y’ekitambuzamusaayi
Ensengekera y’ekitambuzamusaayi(the blood circulatory system) etambuza matiiriyo mu mubiri gwo era ensengekera eno erimu omutima, omusaayi, n’emisuwa. Ekisanjabavo (lymphatic part) ekuuma omwenkanyonkanyo gw’obuuvuluzi bw’ensanjabavu (lymph glands).
Okutwalira awamu ensengekera y’ekitambuzamusaayi ebunyisa omusaayi okwetoloola omubiri gwo okuyita mu mutima , Atari ne veyini okuweereza okisigyeni n’ebiriisa mu bitundu by’omubiri n’obutaffaali n’okujja ebizambi(waste) mu mitundi eby’enjawulo.Bivudde mu Kitabo kya Muwanga Charles "Essomabiramu(Biology)"

Ensengekera y'emifumbi(the muscular system):
Ensengekera y’emifumbi 
(Muscular system). 
Okusinziira ku Muwanga , Ensengekera y’emifumbi esobozesa omubiri okutambula ng’ekozesa emifumbi(muscles).

Ensengekera y'ekikyusaganyampewo(the Respiratory System):
Ensengekera y’ekikyusaganyampewo
Ensengekera y’ekikyusaganyampewo (the respiratory system)erimu amawuggwe n’emiyitiro gy’empewo(airways).Ensengekera eno esobozesa okukyusaganya empewo(ggaasi/omukka) wakati w’omusaayi n’embeera y’omubiri ey’ebweru ( body's external environment). 
Naddala ensengekera eno eyingiza okisigyeni ate n’efulumya ggaasi endala nga kaboni-bbiri-okisayidi (carbon dioxide).Bivudde mu Kitabo "Essomabiramu"(Biology) ekya Muwanga Charles

Ensengekera y'Ekizaazi(the Reproductive system):
Ensengekera ey’ekizaazi
Ensengekera ey’ekizaazi (the urogenital system oba reproductive system)) erimu ebitundu by’omubiri ebizaala ebito n’okufuyisa omusulo. 
Obusajja (male reproductive organs) n'obukyala(female reproductive organs) bye byegatta mu kikolwa eky'okukola okwegadanda era kino ne kiviirako ekisajja okuwakisa ekikazi olw'empakiso(sperms) eziva mu kisajja ne ziwugira mu mpugiso(semen) okutuuka ku ggi ly'ekikazi eriba llengedde .
Ebisawo by’enkwaso (testes), amagi g’ekikazi(ovaries) n’obuzimbe obubyekuusizaako bye bisobozesa okuzaala okubaawo.Bivudde mu kitabo "essomabiramu(Biology) ekya Muwanga Charles

Ensengekera y'ekiremesandwadde(the immune system):
Ensengekera ey’ekiremesandwadde 
Okusinziira ku Muwanga , ensengekera ey’ekiremesandwadde oba ensengekera ey'ekiziiyizandwadde oba ensengekera ea kirwanyisandwadde (the immune system) ekugira omubiri obutamala kosebwa buwuka buleeta ndwadde nga bakitiiriya ne vayiraasi. Ensengekera ya kiremesandwadde erimu obuzimbo bw’ensanjabavu(lymph nodes) n’obutaffaali obulala obw’enjawulo obulawuna ebitundu by’omubiri gwo okulwanyisa obuwuka obuyinza okuleeta endwadde nga bubadde bulumbywe. 
Obutaffaali obw’ekiremesandwadde(immune cells) butondeka ebizimbamubiri(proteins) eby’enjawulo ebiyamba okukuuma omubiri nga gubadde gulumbiddwa obuwuka obuleeta endwadde.

Ensengekera y'amasitukiro(the Skeletal system):
"Ensengekera y’amasitukiro" 
Ensengekera z’amasitukiro (skeletal systems) ziri mu ngeri za njawulo. Waliwo "amasitukiro agali ku ngulu"(exoskeleton) ne "amasitukiro agali munda" (exoskeleton) mu mubiri. 
Ebiwuka n’ebikongojja( Insects and crustaceans) birina ensengekera z’amasitukiro agali ku ngulu kw’emibiri gyabyo (exoskeleton) .
Ebiramu nga ebyennyanja ebimunyeenyo(starfish) tebirina magumba naye ebisitukiro byabyo bikolebwa bitengejjeso munda mwa tyubu eziri mu mibiri byazo.Ensengekera z’ebisitukiro ebyekitengejjeso(fluid skeretal systems) ziyitibwa nakazzi ez’entagenda(hydrostatic). Namba zonna ezsangibwa wabweru w’amazzi zetaaga ensengekera y’amasitukiro ag’engeri emu oba endala emibiri gyazo kwe gisitukira n’okuzikugira . 
Okutwalira awamu ekigendererwa ky’ensengekera y’amasitukiro kwe kukuuma ebitundu by’omubiri ebimu ate era n’okusitukirako omubiri gw’ekiramu.
Ensengekera eno ekola ki ? 
Twayogedde dda ku kigendererwa ky’ensengekera y’amasitukiro (skeletal system). Okukuum ebitundu by’omubiri ebiyinza okutuukako amangu obuvune n’okusitukirwako omubiri z’ensonga enkulu ebbiri lwaki ebiramu biba n’ensengekera z’amasitukiro.
Mu mubiri gwo , amasitukiro (the skeleton ) gakolera wamu ddala n’ensengekera y’emifumbi(muscle system) okukusobozesa okutambula (okuva mu kifo). Awatali magumba agakola amasitukiro go , wandibadde nga tyubu y’emiwuula egijjudde amazzi . Amagumba ge gakola ekibago(framework) emifumbi n’ebitundu byo kwe byekwata. Amasitukiro go era gawa obukuumi ebitundu eby’okwegendereza nga obwongo obukuumirwa mu kawanga(skull) . 
Amagumba g’akawanga ko ge gawa obukuumi obwongo bwo ate embiriizi ziwa obukuumi ebitundu byo ebyomunda ebisinga .N’ebisolo ebirina amasitukiro ebyo kungulu(exoskereton) bifuna obukuumi okuva mu kasitukiro kazoo.Amakovu ggo galena ebisosonkole agawa obukuumi ebitundu ebyo munda. 
Bivudde mu kitabo "Essomabiramu" ekya Muwanga Charles

Ensengekera y'Obusimu(the nervous system):
Ensengekera y’obusimu 
Ensengekera eno ekung’anya n’okukola ku bubaka okuva mu kentero z'omubiri(the body senses) okuyita mu busimu (nerves) n’obwongo era n’egamba emifumbi okwesika (contract) okuisobola okuleetawo ebikolwa eby’omubiri.
Ensengekera y’obusimu ebaamu obwongo, emiraatira gy’obubaka obaomuyitiro gw’obubaka(spinal cord), amaswanso g’obusimu(nerves) ne sensa z’omubiri ettano ng’amaaso, amatu. Olususu, olulimi . 
Ensengekera eno eyingiza , eweereza n’okulungamya obubaka okuva mu mubiri munda ne wabweru w’omubiri . Obwongo bwo n’emiraatira gy’obubaka(spinal code) bye bikola ensengekera y’obusumu eyo mu makkati, so ng’ate ensengekera y’obusimu ey’amabbali ebaamu ebitundu bya sensa byonna n’obusimu bwonna obugatta emiraatira gy’obusimu ku bitundu by’omubiri byonna .Bivudde mu Kitabo "Essomabiramu" ekya Muwanga Charles

Ensengekera y'ekikugiro:
Ensengekera ey’ekikugiro (integumentary system) ekugira obuvune okutuuka mu mubiri munda. Kino ekikola nga ebikkirira n’eziiyiza ekintu kyonna okuva mu mbeera ey’ebweru okutuusa obuvunde mu mubiri gw'ekiramu , naddala ng’ekugira obuwuka obusirikitu obuleeta endwadde n’embeera z’obudde enkaalamufu nga obunnyogovu oba ebbugumu.
Ensengekera eno erimu olususu , enviiri, enjala, n’obuvuluzi bw’entuuyo (sweat glands). Olususu lwo, enviiri n’enjala bya kukugira ate obuvuluzi obw’entuuyo bbwo ne buba bwa kukkakkkanya tempulikya ya mubiri n’okuyamba okufulumya ebituuyano(waste excretion).
Muwanga agamba nti gg’ojjeeko ekyo , enkettanyo(receptors) mu lususu lwo ziwa obubaka ku ki ekikkoonyeko , ebbugumu, obunnyogovu n’obulumi.

Ensengekera mu Essomabiramu (Systems in Bilogy):
Ensengekera kye ki mu Essomabiramu?
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles, "ensengekera"(system) kiva mu kugattika bigambo(blending) bya Luganda "ensengeka eyemaliria"(selfsustaining arrangement). Mu essomabiramu , kiba kibinja kya bitundu bya kiramu(organs) ebikolagana okusobozesa ekiramu okubaawo. Ensengekera y’ensengeka eziyinza okuba enzibuwavu mu mubiri era y’enkulaakulana esembayo waggulu okuva ku butaffaali okudda ku miwuula(tissues) okuyita ku bitundu by’omubiri eby’enjawulo okutuuka ku nsengekera.
Omubiri gw’omuntu oba ensolo endala yonna gubaamu obutaffaali obulina emirimu egy’enjawulo, emiwuula(tissues), n’ebitundu by’omubiri ebikolaganira awamu okukola emirimu egy’enjawulo. Ensengekera zino zikwataganyiza wamu okukuuma omubiri gwo nga mulamu. 
Omubiri gwo gulimu ensengekera(systems) ez’enjawulo nga 
(i) ensengekera ey’obuvuluzi( endocrine),
(ii) ensengekera ey’obusimu(nervous), 
(iv) ensengekera y’amasitukiro(musculo skeletal),
(v) ensengekera ey’ebifulumiro(urogenital), 
(vi)ensengekera eya kikyusaganyampewo (respiratory), 
(vii) ensengekera ey’ennetoloola y’omusaayi(circulatory), 
(viii)ensengekera ey’ekiziiyizandwaddei(immune) , 
(ix) ensengekera ey’ekikamulabiriisa (digestive systems).
Ensengekera zikola zokka awamu n’ensengekera zinne waazo okusobozesa omubiri gwo okukuuma embeera ey’ekibalo (homeostasis). Embeera ey’ekibalo(Homeostasis) kyekuusiza ku mbeeera y’omubiri gwo munda ekusobozesa awamu n’obutaffaali bwo okubeera omulamu .
Yadde nga buli sengekera ya mubiri gwo yetaagisa okukukuuma nga oli mulamu , ensengekera y’obusimu(nervous system) y’esingayo okuba ey’omugaso. Amaaso go n’obwongo k=mu kaseera kano biri mu kusoma binyukuto bino era bijjukira ibubaka bunobwonna ku nsengekera. Bw’okirowoozaako , era oba weyambisa ensengekera y’emifumbi(muscular system) ekuyamba okutambuza amaaso go n’okukuumira omutwe gwo waggulu .
Ebitundu by’omubiri (organs) bitundu ku buli nsengekera. Omutimwa gwo gubalibwa nga ekitundu ky’omubiri (organ) so ng’ate era kitundu kya nsengekera eyetolooza omusaayi mu mubiri (circulatory system). Ebitundu by’omubiri (organs) biyinza okukolagana n’ensengekera ez’enjawulo ez’omubiri gwo.

Ensengekera mu Essomabiramu(Systems in Biology):
Ensengekera kye ki mu Essomabiramu?
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles, "ensengekera"(system) kiva mu kugattika bigambo(blending) bya Luganda "ensengeka eyemaliria"(selfsustaining arrangement). Mu essomabiramu , kiba kibinja kya bitundu bya kiramu(organs) ebikolagana okusobozesa ekiramu okubaawo. Ensengekera y’ensengeka eziyinza okuba enzibuwavu mu mubiri era y’enkulaakulana esembayo waggulu okuva ku butaffaali okudda ku miwuula(tissues) okuyita ku bitundu by’omubiri eby’enjawulo okutuuka ku nsengekera.
Omubiri gw’omuntu oba ensolo endala yonna gubaamu obutaffaali obulina emirimu egy’enjawulo, emiwuula(tissues), n’ebitundu by’omubiri ebikolaganira awamu okukola emirimu egy’enjawulo. Ensengekera zino zikwataganyiza wamu okukuuma omubiri gwo nga mulamu. 
Omubiri gwo gulimu ensengekera(systems) ez’enjawulo nga 
(i) ensengekera ey’obuvuluzi( endocrine),
(ii) ensengekera ey’obusimu(nervous), 
(iv) ensengekera y’amasitukiro(musculo skeletal),
(v) ensengekera ey’ebifulumiro(urogenital), 
(vi)ensengekera eya kikyusaganyampewo (respiratory), 
(vii) ensengekera ey’ennetoloola y’omusaayi(circulatory), 
(viii)ensengekera ey’ekiziiyizandwaddei(immune) , 
(ix) ensengekera ey’ekikamulabiriisa (digestive systems).
Ensengekera zikola zokka awamu n’ensengekera zinne waazo okusobozesa omubiri gwo okukuuma embeera ey’ekibalo (homeostasis). Embeera ey’ekibalo(Homeostasis) kyekuusiza ku mbeeera y’omubiri gwo munda ekusobozesa awamu n’obutaffaali bwo okubeera omulamu .
Yadde nga buli sengekera ya mubiri gwo yetaagisa okukukuuma nga oli mulamu , ensengekera y’obusimu(nervous system) y’esingayo okuba ey’omugaso. Amaaso go n’obwongo k=mu kaseera kano biri mu kusoma binyukuto bino era bijjukira ibubaka bunobwonna ku nsengekera. Bw’okirowoozaako , era oba weyambisa ensengekera y’emifumbi(muscular system) ekuyamba okutambuza amaaso go n’okukuumira omutwe gwo waggulu .
Ebitundu by’omubiri (organs) bitundu ku buli nsengekera. Omutimwa gwo gubalibwa nga ekitundu ky’omubiri (organ) so ng’ate era kitundu kya nsengekera eyetolooza omusaayi mu mubiri (circulatory system). Ebitundu by’omubiri (organs) biyinza okukolagana n’ensengekera ez’enjawulo ez’omubiri gwo.

Ekigoberero kya Akimeedizi:
Ekigoberero kya Akimeddezi 
Kyekuusiza ku mpalirizo eziteekebwa ebitengejjeso ku bintu ebiba byetoloolodde ebitengejjeso(fuids).Empalirizo eno eba eteelkeddwa ku kintu ekendeeza obuzito bwakyo nga kiri mu kitengejjeso, ka kibe kikulukusi oba ggaasi.
Ekigoberero kya Akimeddezi kye ki ?
Buli lw’obuuzibwa ki ekireetera eryato okutengejja , ansa eba “ntengejjeso”('buoyancy).
Empalirizo y’ekitengejjo(Buoyant force) eba mpalirizo y’ekitengejjeso esindika ekintu waggulu .
Lumu Akimeeddezi yayingira mu bbaafu erimu amazzi n’akizuula nti amazzi agaali mu baafu gaalinnya.Yakizuula nti gye yakoma okuyingiza omubiri gwe mu bbaafu y’amazzi, amazzi gye gaakoma okulinnya.
Kino kitegeeza nti obubangirivu (volume) bw’omubiri gwe gwe yayingiza mu bbaafu bwali bulina okuseetula(to displace) amazzi asobola okugya mu baafu .N’olwekyo ekiseetuko(displacement) mu mbeera eno kibaawo nga ekintu kiseetula ekitengejjeso (Fuid) kisobole okubugaana obubangirivu ekitengejjeso mwe kibadde. 
Emmeeri
Emmeerei ennwanyi ekolebwa mu sitiiru ate nga okimanyi bulungi nti sitiiru tatengejja .Yo emmeeri ey sitiiru esobola etya okutengejja .
Naye okiraba nti emmeeri ebaamu obubangirivu obukalu (empty volume) . Singa obubangirivu buno obujjuzaamazzi, emmeeri eba ezitowa nnyo okusingawo .Mu butuufu eba ezitowa nga emmeeri yonna wamu .
Obuzito bw’amazzi agajjuza emmeeri eno buba bwe bumu b’emmeeri yonna ‘ ekitegeeza nti amazzi gateeka empalirizo ey’ekitengejjo ( buoyant force ) n’empalirizo eyo yonna .Kino kye kireetera emmeeri eya sitiiru okutengejja . 
Kyesatuza ya AyisiSinga oba oteeka kyesatuza ya ayisi mu giraasi y’amazzi, kyesatuza etengejja kubanga amazzi gasinga ayisi obukwafuwavu(water is more dense than ice).
Ekigoberero kya Akimeddezi n’olwekyo kigamba nti:
Ekintu kynna ekitengejja kiseetula obuzito bwakyo bwennyini obw’ekitengejjeso (Any floating object displaces its own weight of fluid ).
Ku bintu ebitengejja oba ebibbidde ekitundu mu ggaasi n’ebitengejjeso , ekigoberero kya akimedezi kiyinza okunnyonnyolwa n’empalirizo(forces) :
Ekintu ekibbidde nu mazzi kyonna oba nga kibbidde kitundu , kiba kitengejjebwa okudda waggulu(is buoyed up ) olw’empalirizo eyenkana obuzito bw’entengejjeso eseetuddwa ekintu . 
Ekintu okubbira obubangirivu bw’ekitengejjeso ekiseetuddwa buba bwenkana obubangirivu bw ‘ekintu kyennini .Bya Muwanga

Entengejjeso (Buoyancy):
Entengejjeso (Buoyancy)
Mu essomabuzimbe, entengejjeso(empallirizo etengejjesa ku mazzi ) eba mpalirizo ku kintu ereetera ekintu ekyo okutumbiira oba okudda waggulu . Entengejjeso ereetebwawo enjawulo eba wakati w’akanyigirizi akateekebwa ekitengejjeso ku kuntu oba empewo ekintu mwe kiri . 
Entengejjeso ya mugaso nnyo mu bidduka bingi nga amaato, emmeeri , luseyeeya (bbaluuni), okunokoolayo ezimu .
Njawulo ki eri wakati w’entengejjeso n’ensukuma(Buoyancy and thrust)?
Ensukuma(thrust) eba mpalirizo oba ensukuma. Ensengekera bw’esukuma oba okutebentesa enzitoya(to accelerate a mass) mu bwolekero bumu, wabaawo ensukuma(=empalirizo esukuma(thrust) nga eteekawo embeera egyenkana okuva mu bwolekero obwa kikontana. Mu ssomabuzimbe n’ekibalangulo kino , kino kinnyonnyolwa amateeka ga Isaac Newton ag’okuva ery’okubiri n’ery’okusatu.
Ensukuma(thrust) ekozesebwa okulaga omutindo ekitondekamaanyi(engine) kwe kiddukira .Bya Muwanga

Akanyigirizi ka nampewo(atmospheric pressure):
Akanyigirizi ka nampewo(Atmospheric pressure)
Akanyigirizii ka nampewo(Atmospheric pressure ) eba mpalirizo mu kifo esindikibwa obuzito bw’empewo ku safeesi . 
Ensi yebulunguddwa bbulangiti y’empewo naye bbulangiti eno tebugaanye wonna kyenkanyi okwetoloola enkulungo y’ensi. Ebiseera ebimu bbulangiti y’empewo eba nkwafu mu bifo ebimu okusinga mu birala. Bbulangiti y’empewo okuba enkwafu mu kitundu ekimu okusinga mu kirala kitegeeza nti ekifo ekimu (empewo w'eri emnkwafu) wabaawo empewo nnyingi okusinga awaddako.
Olw’okuba wabaawo empewo nnyingi okusingako, akanyigirizi kaba waggulu mu kifo ekyo. Bbulangiti w’eba entono akanyigirizi ka nampewo kaba wansi(there is a lower atmospheric pressure).
Obugulumivu(altitude) gye bukoma okuba waggulu , empewo gy’ekoma okuba entono era akanyigirizi ka nampewo gye kakoma okuba wansi ( the lower the atmospheric pressure).Kino kiva ku kuba nti ebifo ebigulumivu biba n’empewo ntono ebyekkatidddeko waggulu wabyo .
Ekipimakanyigirizi (Barometer) kye kikozesebwa okupima akanyigirizi ka nampewo . Akanyingirizi ka nampewo kaba ke kamu okuva mu buli bwolekero .Bya Muwanga

Obuzimbe(Structure):
Obuzimbe (Structure)
Okusinziira ku Muwanga , kino kitegeeza obusitukiro bw’ekintu. 
Laba obusitukiro(superstructure) . Obuzimbe(structure ) mulamwa gwa sayansi owa kakyo kano ekitegeeza obusitukiro bw’ekintu , ntegeeza, ensengeka y’ebitundu by’ekintu eby’enjawulo kwe kizimbirwa oba kwe kisitukira oba kwe kisitukira okulabika nga bw’oba okiraba. Obuzimbe era kikwata ku buzimbe bw’ebitundu by’omubiri ogw’ ekiramu n’ekitali kiramu oba obutundutundu , patiko oba obusirikitu mu kintu(sebusitansi) oba omubiri. 
Obuzimbe oba obusitukiro kiyinza okukwata ku bizimbe, masiini n’ebintu ebirala ebikolebwa abantu awamu n’enjazi , minero, obuziba oba obutaffaali n’ebitundu by’ebiramu.
Obuzimbe bw’ekintu(physical structure) kikwata ku nkula oba obusitukiro byakyo bwonna . Kino kitwaliramu n’obuzimbe by’ekiramu ( the structure of an organism) ng’ekimera, ensolo oba omuntu .Obuzimbe bw’ekintu bwe buvaako endabiko yakyo.

Ekiramu kataffaalikamu(Unicelullar organism):
Ekiramu kataffaalikamu(Unicellular life form)
Ekitaffaalikamu kiva mu kugattika bigambo bya Luganda“ ekiramu ekirina akataffaalikamu”(single celled life form). Buno buba bulamu busirikitu(Microorganisms) .Bya Muwanga

Ekiramu butaffaalibungi(Multicellular organism):
Ekiramu butaffaalibungi(Multicerlular organism)
Ekiramu butaffaalibungi kiva mu kugattika ebigambo ebiri mu kigambululo ky’Oluganda “ekiramu ekirina obutaffaali obungi”( a life form made up of a multitude of cells).Bya Muwanga

Ebiziziina(Eukaryotes):
Ebiziiziina(Eukaryotes)
Ebiziiziina Muwanga akijje mu kugattika bigambo bya Luganda “ebiramu nga obuziizi(nuclei) obwesonjodde obulungi birina”(life forms without werl-defined cells ).

Ebiziziite(Prakaryotes):
Ebiziziite kiva mu kugattika bigambo bya Luganda “ ebiramu nga obuziizi obwesonjodde(life forms well defined nuclei) obulungi tebirina”(life forms without well-defined cells ). Buno okusinga buba bulamu bwa kataffaalikamu, obulamu obusirikitu.Bya Muwanga

Ebikoggona(Vertebrates):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga , ebikoggona kiva mu kugattika bigambo bya Luganda “ebiramu nga ebikoggo birina”.Bino biramu ebirina enkizi .

Ebikoggote(Invertebrates):
Ebikoggote(Invertebrates)
Ebikoggote kiva mu kugattika bigambo bya Luganda “ebiramu nga ebiramu nga ebikoggo tebiirina”. Bino biba biramu ebitalina nkizi. Bya Muwanga

Okwezaala(Reproduction):
Kyezaala (reproduction)
Buno bwe busobozi okuzaala ebiramu ebito oba ebipya okuyita mu kwegadanga(sexually) kw’ebiramu ebizadde ebibiri oba okutali kwa kwegadanga(asexual) okubaawo mu kiramu ekyezaalumu kyokka(single parent organism). Bya Muwanga

Omuntu omukujjukujju(Homo Habiris):
Omuntu Omukujjukujju( Homo Habiris)
Omuntu omukujjukujju kitegeeza omuntu alina obwongo obunene(big brain) oba koma erina obwongo obunene . Ebisigalira ebipimiddwa okuba n’emyaka obukadde buibiri bizuuliddwa nga irina obwongo obunene okusinga ebya komowedda(kominids) . manya nti omuntu okuba n’obwongo obunene kyekimusobozesa okubeera kalimagezi kubanga gye bukoma obunene gye bukoma okubaamu ebisenge ebikwanaganya obwa kalimagezi .
Komennene (Homo habiris) atwalibwa okuba nga ye muntu eyasooka mu lubu lw’omuntu(genus homo). Homo habiris kitegeeza omuntu eyetoolatoola oba omukujukujju ( “handy human.”) .
Bamemba ba sipiisa eno basobola okukozesa ebikola, ne bazimba aw’okubeera , ne bayiiya n’ebyokwambala era nga baali batambula busimba ku magulu abairi.Komenkujjukujju eteeberezebwa okuba nga ye yaliwo mu biseera by’omulembe gw’amayinja”( Stone Age), ekiseera abantu we baakoera ebikola(tools) eby’amayinja. Komenkujukujju oluvannyuma yasaanawo n’erekawo Komegenda.

Omuntu kalimagezi:
Omuntu kalimagezi(Homo sapiens)
Ebisigalira by’omuntu kalimagezi ( Homo sapiens ) bya myaaka nga 200,000 egiyise. Omuntu kalimagezi (Homo sapiens) kitegeeza “omuntu alina obwakalimagezi (intelligent man) era abantu ab’omulembe guno bali mu kikula kino. Omuntu kalimagezi yeeyubula kuva mu muntu omutambuze.( Homo erectus).Okweyubula kuno kusuubirwa okuba nga kwali mu afirika .

Omuntu omusenguse:
Omuntu Omutambuze oba omuntu omusenguse (Homo eructus)
Ekikula ky’omuntu ekyasooka okwabulira afirika okudda e Bulaaya ne Azia T kyali kya Omuntu omutambuze(Homo eructus) . 
Komagenda ye yadda mu kifo kya komenkujukujju . Homegenda yali wa kigero kya muntu ow’omulembe guno era nga yali atambulira ddala bulungi nga yesimbye . Obwongo bwe bwali bunene okusinga obw’ebikula by’omuntu ebyasookawo .
Ebikola bya komagenda byaali bya mulembe okusinga ebya komenkujukujju. Komagenda alabika nga ye yasooka okuyigga n’okukunganyiriza eby’okulya era ateeberezebwa okuba nga kye kikula ky’omuntu ekyasooka okukozesa omuliro. Alabika nga yateekawo n’empuliziganya omuli okuweereza obubaka

1 Gwakutaano:
Lunaku Lwabakozi mu nsi yoona. Uganda Elukuza era buli mwaaka, gavumenti entegeka emikolo elukuza.

Mount Everest:
Mount Everest Lwe Lusozi Olusinga yo obuwanvu munsi yoona.

God:
Katonda abantu gwe basinza

Nelson Mandela:
Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela yali Mukulembeze wa South Africa Eyasoka okuba Omudugavu. Yasimbwa emyaka 27 mukomera olwokuvumirira abazungu or abagwira okufuga bubi South Africa nga bajooga abadugavu.

Ekifumbekero (Acid):
"Ekifumbekero" (Acid)
Omugeye Muwanga Charles akusosootoledde omulamwa gwa "ekifumbekero"(acid).Weetegereze:
(ii) Ekifumbekero (Acid).
Okiraba nti bwe tusalira omulamwa gwa "ekifumbekerayidologyeni"(hydrogen concentration) tufuna "ekifumbekero:(acid). Mu butuufu singa ekikulukusi(liquid) kiba kifumbekeddemu(having a concentration of) obuzitoya bwa ayidologyeni(hydrogen molecules), kino kiba "kifumbekero"(acid).Kuno kugaziya makulu(semantic extension).
Ekitali kifumbekero kiba "kijjulungo"(base). Kino kiva mu kusalira kigambo "ekijjulungayidologyeni"(hydrogen dilution).
"Ekipimiso ky'ekifumbekero"(PH Scale). 
Kino kipima bufumbekevu(acidity) bwa kikulukusi(liquid).

Ekijjulungo (Base):
"Ekijjulungo" (Base)
Mu essomabuziba(chemistry) , bwe twogera ku "kifumbekero n'ekijjulungo" (acid and base)tuba tulaga obufumbekevu(hydrogen concentration, acidity ) oba olujjulungu(hydrogen dilution) lwa ayidologyeni olubeera mu kikulukusi(liquid).
(ii) Ekijjulungo(Base).
Okiraba nti bwe tusalira omulamwa gwa "ekijjulungayidologyeni"(hydrogen dilution ) tufuna "ekijjulungo":(base). Mu butuufu singa ekikulukusi(liquid) kiba kirimu ayidologyeni wa lujjulungu(having a low concentration of hydrogen ) , mu essomabuziba kiba "kijjulungo"(acid).Kuno kugaziya makulu(semantic extension).
Ekitali kijjulungo(base) kiba "kifumbekero"(acid). Kino kiva mu kusalira kigambo "ekifumbekerayidologyeni"(hydrogen concentration).
"Ekipimiso ky'ekifumbekero"(PH Scale). 
Kino kipima bufumbekevu(acidity) bwa kikulukusi(liquid).

Ekipimiso ky'Obufumbekevu(PH Scale):
"Ekipimiso ky'Obufumbekevu" (PH Scale)
"Ekipimiso ky'Obufumbekevu" oba "ekipimiso ky'ekifumbekero"(PH Scale) kiba kipimo kya ayidologyeni afumbekedde mu kikulukusi(hydrogen concentration in a liquid). 
Kino kipima bufumbekevu(acidity) oba ekijjulungo(base) mu kikulukusi(liquid).
Jjukira nti Omugeye Muwanga Charles akusosootoledde omulamwa gwa "ekifumbekero"(acid).Weetegereze:
(ii) Ekifumbekero (Acid).
Okiraba nti bwe tusalira omulamwa gwa "ekifumbekerayidologyeni"(hydrogen concentration) tufuna "ekifumbekero:(acid). Mu butuufu singa ekikulukusi(liquid) kiba kifumbekeddemu(having a concentration of) obuzitoya bwa ayidologyeni(hydrogen molecules), kino kiba "kifumbekero"(acid).Kuno kugaziya makulu(semantic extension).
Ekitali kifumbekero kiba "kijjulungo"(base). Kino kiva mu kusalira kigambo "ekijjulungayidologyeni"(hydrogen dilution).

Munnassomabusirikitu(Microbiologist):
Munnassomabusirikitu (Microbiologist) ye kakensa eyakuguga mu bulamu obusirikitu (microbes oba microorganisms). Obulamu obusirikitu bwe bulamu obusingayo okuba obusirikitu era nga bwe busingayo okuba n’obuzimbe obwangu. Obumu ku bulamu buno nga vayiraasi, bubuusibwabuusibwa oba nga ddala bubalibwa mu biramu nga bwe bisonjolwa

Ababalanguzi abaatiikirivu(Famous mathematicians):
Albert Einstein (1879-1955)
Eggwanga lye : Mugirimaani, Mumerika, Muyudaaya
Mwatiikirivu olwa Nakyenkanyampuyi ey’Obusinziiro:
Isaac Newton (1642-1727)
Eggwanga lye : Mungereza
Mwatiikirivu olwa:Ebigoberero by’Ekibalangulo ebya Firosoofa ow’Obutonde 
( Mathematical Principles of Natural Philosophy) ekitabo ekyayongeza obwangu mu kitambuzo(engineering) .Era y’ali emabega w’eggereeso lya nnyingobbiri ( binomial theorem).
Leonardo Pisano Bigollo (1170-1250)
Eggwanga lye : Muyitale
 Thales (c. 624 – c.547/546 BC)
Eggwanga lye: Mugereeki / Muyonaani
Pythagoras (c. 570 – c. 495 BC)
Eggwanga lye: Mugereeki/Muyonaani
Yayatiikirira mu: Eggereeso lya Payisoggolaasi mu kibalangulo René Descartes (1596-1650)
Eggwanga lye : Mufaransa
Archimedes (c. 287 – c. 212 BC)
Eggwanga lye: Mugereeki/Muyonaani
 John Forbes Nash, Jr. (1928)
Eggwanga lye: Mumerika
Blaise Pascal (1623-1662)
Eggwanga lye: Mufalansa
Yayatiikirira lwa: Mpetosatu ya Pasikaali(Pascal’s Triangle)
Euclid (c. 365 – c. 275 BC)
Eggwanga lye : Mugereeki/Muyonaani
Yayatiikirira kuba : Ye Taata w’essomankula/essomampimo(geometry)
Aryabhata (c. 476 – c. 550)
Eggwanga lye : Muyindi
Ptolemy (c. 90 – c. 168 AD)
Eggwanga lye: Mulooma
Naawe yongerayo abalanguzi abalala

Roubaix:
Roubaix kye ekibuga mu bukiikakkono bwa Bufalansa, ekisangibwa okumpi n’ensalo ya Bubirigi. Mu mwaka gwa 2013, ekibuga ekirimu abantu nga .

Bubirigi:
Bubirigi, oba Obwakabaka bwa Bubirigi, kiri ensi mu Bulaaya. Ekibuga ky'ensi ekikulu kiyitibwa Brussels.

Bufalansa:
Bufalansa, oba Ripablik kya Bufalansa, kiri ensi mu Bulaaya. Ekibuga ky'ensi ekikulu kiyitibwa Paris.

Brussels:
Brussels kye ekibuga kya Bubirigi ekikulu. Ekibuga kyirimu abantu (2017) era kyekisinga obune mu Bubirigi.

Okulambika ebirowoozo(Inductive reasoning):
Okulambika ebirowoozo(inductive reasoning) kwetaagisa okulambika ensonga (inductive logic)kuba kunoonya nsonga n'ojijjayo bulungi ku lulwo nga osengeka ebirowoozo.
Okulambika ensonga oba okulowooza nga olambika ensonga mu lungereza kiba “inductive reasoning”. Okuyita mu kukozesa obwongo ng’olambika ensonga, omuntu kalimagezi:
• Alambika ebirowoozo bye okuva wansi okudda waggulu.
• Atuuka ku kuvumbula oba okumanya ebipya.
• Kimusobozesa okuyigiriza abalala okwevumbulira oba okwezuulira okumanya okupya.
• Okulambika ensonga kitendeka omulengera (the mind) n’okukulaakulanya enkola z’omulengera (mental processes) mu bato nga bayiga okwevumbulira ebipya.
• Kimwetaagisa okukozesa ensonda ez’enjawulo
Okulambika ensonga oba okukozesa obwongo ng’olambika ebirowoozo (inductive reasoning) kiringa kutema kkubo awatali kkubo kubanga otandika tolina ky’omanyi wabula n’okozesa okwekebejja, okwekenneenya, n’okwefumiitiriza okutuuka ku kipya.
Engeri y’okusomesa oba okuyiga ng’olambika ensonga kiringa kutema kkubo awatali kkubo okutuuka ku kigendererwa (okuzuula ekituufu). Mu kutema ekkubo awatali kkubo mulimu okuyita ku busozi n’ebikko ate awo n’okyusaamu okufuna aw’okuyita awatuufu ate nga buli w’otema ogenda olambawo (olambikawo). Okusomesa okulambika ensonga kiyamba nnyo mu baana abato okukulaakulanya enkozesa z’obwongo bwabwe, naddala okwefumiitiriza n’okwetuukira ku kituufu ku bwabwe.
Okulambika ebirowoozo kitegeeza kuyamba muyizi kwetemera mpenda zituuka ku kumanya ekituufu kwekyo kyonoonyerezaako, ng’okozesa obwongo mu kifo ky’omuntu omulala okukubuulira ye ky’amanyi.
Ekituufu kiri nti abato basinga kuganyulwa mu kubayamba okulambika ensonga, omuli okubayigiriza okwezuulira ekituufu mu kifo ky’okubagamba obugambi nti kino oba kiri kye kituufu kubanga obwongo bwabwe buba bukyaalina obusobozi bwa maanyi.
Mu kinonoozo(engineering) kyetaagisa okunnyonnyoka n’okunonooza amateeka ga sayansi ez’ensibo (natural sciences)kikusobozese okuzimba ennyanguyirizi(machines) , ebizimbe, enguudo oba ennongoosereza ezetaagisa. Obutafaanana na kulambulula, okulambika kikolwa kya kwevumbululira (okukwekula) na kukozesa mateeka ga sayansi okuyiiya tekinologia omupya nga okola okunoonyereza eno nga bw’ogenda olambika buli mutendera gw’oyitamu naddaala okukola ennongoosereza mu tekinologiya aliwo oba okuvumbula tekinologiya omupya.

Okulambika ensonga(Inductive Logic):
Okulambika ebirowoozo(inductive reasoning) kwetaagisa okulambika ensonga (inductive logic)kuba kunoonya nsonga n'ojijjayo bulungi ku lulwo nga osengeka ebirowoozo.
Okulambika ensonga oba okulowooza nga olambika ensonga mu lungereza kiba “inductive reasoning”. Okuyita mu kukozesa obwongo ng’olambika ensonga, omuntu kalimagezi:
• Alambika ebirowoozo bye okuva wansi okudda waggulu.
• Atuuka ku kuvumbula oba okumanya ebipya.
• Kimusobozesa okuyigiriza abalala okwevumbulira oba okwezuulira okumanya okupya.
• Okulambika ensonga kitendeka omulengera (the mind) n’okukulaakulanya enkola z’omulengera (mental processes) mu bato nga bayiga okwevumbulira ebipya.
• Kimwetaagisa okukozesa ensonda ez’enjawulo
Okulambika ensonga oba okukozesa obwongo ng’olambika ebirowoozo (inductive reasoning) kiringa kutema kkubo awatali kkubo kubanga otandika tolina ky’omanyi wabula n’okozesa okwekebejja, okwekenneenya, n’okwefumiitiriza okutuuka ku kipya.
Engeri y’okusomesa oba okuyiga ng’olambika ensonga kiringa kutema kkubo awatali kkubo okutuuka ku kigendererwa (okuzuula ekituufu). Mu kutema ekkubo awatali kkubo mulimu okuyita ku busozi n’ebikko ate awo n’okyusaamu okufuna aw’okuyita awatuufu ate nga buli w’otema ogenda olambawo (olambikawo). Okusomesa okulambika ensonga kiyamba nnyo mu baana abato okukulaakulanya enkozesa z’obwongo bwabwe, naddala okwefumiitiriza n’okwetuukira ku kituufu ku bwabwe.
Okulambika ebirowoozo kitegeeza kuyamba muyizi kwetemera mpenda zituuka ku kumanya ekituufu kwekyo kyonoonyerezaako, ng’okozesa obwongo mu kifo ky’omuntu omulala okukubuulira ye ky’amanyi.
Ekituufu kiri nti abato basinga kuganyulwa mu kubayamba okulambika ensonga, omuli okubayigiriza okwezuulira ekituufu mu kifo ky’okubagamba obugambi nti kino oba kiri kye kituufu kubanga obwongo bwabwe buba bukyaalina obusobozi bwa maanyi.
Mu kinonoozo(engineering) kyetaagisa okunnyonnyoka n’okunonooza amateeka ga sayansi ez’ensibo (natural sciences)kikusobozese okuzimba ennyanguyirizi(machines) , ebizimbe, enguudo oba ennongoosereza ezetaagisa. Obutafaanana na kulambulula, okulambika kikolwa kya kwevumbululira (okukwekula) na kukozesa mateeka ga sayansi okuyiiya tekinologia omupya nga okola okunoonyereza eno nga bw’ogenda olambika buli mutendera gw’oyitamu naddaala okukola ennongoosereza mu tekinologiya aliwo oba okuvumbula tekinologiya omupya.

Obugobansonga (Dialectics):
Gakuweebwa Muwanga !! Obugobansonga kitegeeza ky'ekimu n'eggobansonga . Obugobansonga kiraga "enneeyisa ey'okugabensonga (okunoonya amazima oba ekituufu ) . Eggobansonga(Dialectics) kiva mu bigambo bya Luganda "essomo erigoba ensonga".Eggobansonga kwe kukontana okutwala entabaganya mu Maaso.Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okugoba ensonga kitegeeza:
Eggobansonga(dialectics) n’olwekyo ssomo erikwata ku nsonga ezo waggulu.
Toyinza kunnyonnyoka mulamwa gwa “ntabaganyabantu”( society) nga tofunye kutegeera mulamwa gwa ggobansonga (akakwate ak’ensonga akali ku buli kintu n’ekirala mu butonde). Eggobansonga (dialectics) kikwata ku bumu bwa kukontana okuli mu butonde ne mu ntabaganya, ekikuumira buli kintu awamu.

Ensonga (Premise):
Mu essomansonga (Logic) , ensonga (premise) eba fakikya(fact) oba amazima (truth)

Fakikya (fact):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga , fakikya(fact) kitegeeza mazima(truth) , ekyo ekiriwo ekirabika, oba ensonga(premise).

Okusengekensonga okw'ekibalo(Mathematical logic):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga , kino kye kimu n'okusengeka ensonga okw'ekibalangulo(mathematical logic)

Ebiwunziko n'ebikubampawa(Inferences and arguments):
Muwanga agamba nti ekikozesabwongo oba okukozesa obwongo(reasoning) kikolwa kya mulengera (mental activity) eky'enjawulo ekirimu " okujjayo ensonga"(indicating premises) n'okuwunzika oba okukola ebiwunziko(making inferences).

Sayansi omwekebezzi(Imperical science):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga, sayansi omwekebezzi(empirical science) ye sayansi alimu okweyambisa akalombolombo ka sayansi(the scientific method) mu kwekebejja obutonde oba ekintu kyonna ky'aba yekebejja mu ngeri eya sayansi.

Rome:
Rome kye kibuga kya Yitale‎ ekikulu.

Riga:
Riga kye kibuga kya Latvia‎ ekikulu.

Dättlikon:
Dättlikon, ekibuga, Switzerland.

OMWEGAYIRIZI YANI?:
OBUWEREZA BW’OKWEGAYIRIRA
Omwegayirizi ye muntu yenna Katonda gwe yalonda okuyimirira mu kituli ku lw’abantu abalala okwenenya ekibi ekikolebwa mu masekkati gabwe, n’okwegayirira kwe bintu ebyo abantu bye bagala Katonda abakolere. [ Ezekiel 22:30, Isaiah 59:16 ]
Omwegayirizi ayawukana ku mulokole oba omu’Kristayo owa bulijjo. Omwegayirizi afukibwaako amafuta agenjawulo agawanirira obulamu bwe kkanisa nga mwotwalidde n’abasumba, ba nnabbi, abatume, abasomesa ba baibuli n’ababulizi be njiri. [ John 15:13] Tewali alina kwagala Kunene okusinga kuno omuntu okuwayo obulamu bwe olwa mikwano gye. Katonda akuteeka ko okwagala kuno mu ngeri ey’amafuta. Omwegayirizi akolera mu kwagala okutali kwa bulijjo nebatuuka n’okugamba nti “Gwe okikola otya?” Olina OMUTIMA OGW’OMWEGAYIRIZI?

OMUGASO GW’OMWEGAYIRIZI:
• Okwesaddaka – wewayo newelekereza ebibyo n’okolera abalala. Wakiri ebibyo byogobako bifa naye ebyabalala ne biyitamu. Okugeza Musa yatuuka okugamba Mukama ebigambo bino; “Naye kaakano, bwonosonyiwa ekyonoono kyabwe; naye bwo’tobasonyiwe, ONSANGULE NZE, nkwegayiridde mu kitabo kyo kye wawandiika. [Exodus 32:32
Kabaka Daudi agamba Mukama nti “….ai Mukama Katonda wange omukono gwo gube kunze ne ku nnyumba ya kitange.”[1Chron.21:17
• Okukuuma n’okwekuuma ekigambo kya Katonda n’obuvumu era n’obumalirivu. 4:16 Kola nga Katonda bw’ayogera era bw’akulagira so ssi nga enkola yabayivu bweri. Tosanyusa bo buulira kigambo naye yogera nga Katonda bwakikutadde ku mutima.
• Beera omukozi wobwa nnakyewa nga mu kyokola tosuubira ku kusasula naye nga olindirira empeera okuva eri Mukama Katonda.
NOTE: Akamwa k’omwegayirizi kalian kuberako ssaasira sonyiwa buli kaseera. Oba oli mu kinaabiro onaaba, oba oyoza ngoye, oba ofumba mmere njagala oyogere nga ebigambo bino wamanga buli ddakiika;
“Yesu Kristo nsaba otusaasire otusonyiwe olw’obutali butukirivu bwaffe.”
Amannya gange nze Kenneth Kizito nga ndi Mwegayirizi. Nsaba onkubireko ku ssimu ku +256752076796 oba +256787846995 otegeere OBULAMU BW’OMWEGAYIRIZI Abalala basomye Ekitambo,EKIKOLIMO,OBULOGOnebabitegeera.

OBULAMU BW’OMWEGAYIRIZI:
• Katonda ateeka Omugugu ku bulamu bwo nga omugugu ogwo kye kigambo kye eri abantu be oba omuntu gwa ba akutumyeko okumwenenyerezaako oba okwegayirira ku lw’ekyetaago kyaba alina. 11:29 ne 30 Mwetikke ekikoligo kyange…….vs30- Kubanga ekikoligo kyange ssi kizibu, N’OMUGUGU GWANGE MWANGU. Ekyo kye kigambo ekikujjira ne kikuteganya n’obulwa emirembe ppaka nga okoze kye kiragira.
• Tokola kintu nga bwolowooza oba nga bwe kikolebwa bulijjo wabula okola ebintu nga Omwoyo Omutukuvu bwalungamya obulamu. Okukkiriza kwo kutekebwa mu kugezesebwa osobole okulinnya ku ddaala eriddako. Abantu abakwetoolodde balabira ku KUKKIRIZA kwolina nabo ne banywera mu Katonda. Nabwekityo kikugwanira okusaba essaala eno nti “Yesu Kristo okwagala kwo n’ebisuubizo byo bibeere okufumitiriza kw’omutima gwange bulijjo – Amiina.” Okwagala kwa Katonda kujja kkukozesa ebitakirizika mu maaso g’abantu.
• Omwegayirizi tatekeddwa kukola mirimu gireeta sente nga abantu babulijjo n’abalokole gyebakola nga biziness ze midaala, oba mirimu gya w’office. Oli MWAWULE eri Katonda okukola emirimu gye so ssi ejiijo gyoyagala kubanga gino gitwala obudde bunji n’omala ebiseera nga omutima gwo gutegana mu bintu ebitagasa. Ffe abegayirizi bwetuzukuka tunaaba olumala nga tukwata EKTABO EKITUKUVU nga tusoma nyiriri era nga bwe tusaba nokwegayirira. Oyera oluggya, ofumba emmere, ogenda mu katale okugula ebintu naye tewenyigira mu mirimu egikukooya, tewenyigira mu mirimu egikumalira ebiseera negitwala obwongo bwo n’endowooza yo.
• Omwoyo wo alina kubeera mu Katonda essawa zonna ez’olunaku. Tolina kulaba oba kuwulira bintu oba mboozi ezijja omwoyo mu kuberawo kwa Mukama Katonda. Nyweza Omwoyo Omutukuvu ku lusegere lwo obe ng’owuliza ekigambo kye. Jjukira nti ne Sitaani asobola okwefuula Malaika ow’ekitangala nakuletera ekigambo ekyefananyiriza okuva ewa Katonda songa bulimba.
• Ebiseera ebisinga Omwegayirizi yesanga nga yetoloddwa abantu abali mu bwetaavu okugeza; abalwadde, abalema, abakadde ba jjajja. Amafuta golina ku bulamu bwo n’omutima Katonda gwa kuwadde bisikiriza abantu be kikula kino mu bulamu bwo kubanga y’entekateeka ya Katonda eri obulamu bwo okuwereza abantu be.
• Omwegayirizi akolerawo ekigambo ekiba kimutumiddwa Katonda. Nga Yeremiya bwayogera nti ekigambo kya Katonda muliro, kimwokya mu ndaye tasobola ku kyebeera wabula okukifulumya. Towa bbanga Sitaani ayinza okukikubbako oba n’akugamba nti tokikola kati ogira olindako…….hhhmm ow’oluganda tokiwa ndowooza yakubiri, buuza Omwoyo Omutukuvu engeri gy’oba okola ekigambo kya Katonda naye anakuyamba.
• Entalo ez’omwoyo kitundu ku bulamu bw’omwegayirizi. Omwegayirizi alina okumanya entalo abantu ze balwaana. Olina okumanya EKITAMBO kye ki, EKIKOLIMO kye ki, OBULOGO bwe buki? Kubanga bino biri ku bantu Katonda bayagala oyambe. 
• Abantu babulijjo balaba abegayirizi nga abasazi be misango, abakambwe, abatagumikiriza, abamalala mbu bamanyi nnyo naye ekyo kyoli mu Katonda. Tokola era teweyisa nga ensi bweyagala. Tewetowaza eri omwana w’omuntu wabula wetoowaze eri ekigambo kya Katonda.
• Okusiiba kitundu kubulamu bw’omwegayirizi. Mu kusiiba mwetufuna amaanyi, amafuta, ekisa okukola ebyo Katonda bya tutuma okukola. Obulamu bwo bujjuze okusiiba okuva January ppaka December oba mu wiiki siiba ennaku ttaano oba mukaaga okusinziira nga Omwoyo Omutukuvu bwakulungumya. Okusiiba kukuletera okugenda ebuziba ne Katonda n’okufuna amaanyi okukuwanguza entalo z’olwana.
Amannya gange nze Kenneth Kizito nga ndi Mwegayirizi. Nsaba onkubireko ku ssimu ku +256752076796 oba +256787846995 okutegeera EBIRABO BY’OMWEGAYIRIZI Abalala basomye Ekitambo,EKIKOLIMO,OBULOGOnebabitegeera.

EBIRABO BY’OMWEGAYIRIZI:
• Omwegayirizi alina ebirabo nga bwebilambikiddwa mu KITABO EKITUKUVU. Ebirabo biri mwenda naye buli omu aweebwa nga Katonda bw’asiima. Cor. 12:1ff
Nabwekityo abegayirizi balina ebirabo okusinzira ku mirimu Katonda gy’eyakutekera tekera okukola. Olina ekirabo eky’okukkiriza, ekirabo ekyokuwonya, nebirala nga bwobisoma mu nyiriri. Oyinza okuba nga ku mwenda olinako bisatu, oba bina oba bitaano tomanya naye nkusaba osabe Omwoyo Omutukuvu wezuule omanye nga bwosobola okukozesa ebirabo Katonda byakuwadde. Bino ebirabo ssi bibyo kutereka wabula kuganyulwa omubiri gwa Kristo.
Abantu bonna batunuulidde gwe okuleetawo enjawulo mu mbeera yabwe bwatyo ne Katonda naye atunuulira gwe mu kukozesa ebirabo bya kuwadde eri abantu be. Kozesa ekirabo kyo, tewetya.
Amannya gange nze Kenneth Kizito nga ndi Mwegayirizi. Nsaba onkubireko ku ssimu ku +256752076796 oba +256787846995 okutegera ABEGAYIRIZI MU BAIBULI Abalala basomye Ekitambo,EKIKOLIMO,OBULOGOnebabitegeera.

ABEGAYIRIZI MU BAIBULI:
1. Abraham – Genesis 18:19-33 ne Genesis 19:20
Ibulayimu yenenya ne yegayirira ku lwekibi ky Sodoma ne Gommorah. Ibulayimu agamba Katonda nti “Singa wabamu abatukirivu ataano, onokikzikiriza?” Olaba nti enjogera ya Ibulayimu ya kwegayirira. “Singa wabamu kkumi onobazikiriza?”
2. Lot – Genesis – 19:13 ne 2 Peter 2:7
“….Kubanga okukaaba kwabwe kweyongedde nnyo mu maaso ga Mukama.” Lot yenenya ne yegayirira n’akabira Mukama ku lwe kibi ekikolebwa mu Sodoma ne Gommorah.
3. Moses – Psalms 106:23
Singa Musa omulonde we teyayimirira mu maaso ge mu kituli, okuzaayo obusungu bwe aleme okubazikiriza.
4. Abigail – 1 Sam 25: 18 – 39
Omukyala ono yayimirira mu kituli okuziyiza obusungu bwa Daudi okugwa ku Nabal. Yasaba ekisonyiwo mu ngeri eyokutekateka ebyo Daudi bye yali asabye n’abimutwalira namugamba yekube mukifuba ku lwekiruyi kyeyali alina. Bwoba nga olina amafuta ag’okwegayiria ekigambo kyo tekiganibwa, kiwulirizibwa.
Amannya gange nze Kenneth Kizito nga ndi Mwegayirizi. Nsaba onkubireko ku ssimu ku +256752076796 oba +256787846995 otegeere EBIKA BYA BEGAYIRIZI Abalala basomye Ekitambo,EKIKOLIMO,OBULOGOnebabitegeera.

EBIKA BYA BEGAYIRIZI:
1. Abegayirizi ekika kye’ngango.
Omwegayirizi ono alina amaanyi, obbuyinza n’amafuta okusaba ekigambo, okwogera ekigambo, okuleeta ekiteeso eri omuntu yenna oba eri Katonda omuntu oyo gwebegayiririra mu kituli nafuna ekyo kyeyetaaga. Okugeza Esther mu Esther 5:7 ne 8 ne Abigail mu 1Sam 25:27 ne 28 ne Joseph. Awo okusinziira ku kigambo omwegayirizi owekika kino kyaba asabye, omuntu oyo ali mu massanganzira go kusalawo afuna ekigambo oba amagezi agamutwala mu maaso era enziji ziggulwawo kwekyo kyaba agobako oba ne ziggalwa kwekyo kyaba akooye mu bulamu bwe.
2. Omwegayirizi akusookerayo mu kukola ku nsonga zo.
Omwegayirizi owekika kino abeera n’omutima omuvumu okukukubira ekkubo w’ogenda okuyita. Gwe omuntu owa’bulijjo oyanjulira omwegayirizi ensonga zo nekiggwa. Gwe olaba bulabi nga biteredde tomanya bifaayo mu kwegayirira. Bewayo neberekerza ebyabwe okukola ku nsonga zo. Omwegayirizi ono alaba akabi akagenda okuggya nadduka mangu mu maaso ga Mukama aziyize ekiruyi kyaba agenda okuleeta eri abantu. 
3. Omwegayirizi owakabonero
Waliwo abegayirizi nga batekebwa ku nsi oba nga bazalibwa nga akabonero. Obulamu bwabwe bwe batambula lubeera lugero eri abalala. Obulamu bwabwe bwoleka ekigambo kya Katonda. Okugeza obulamu obwo’bwetowaze n’okugonda mu mbeera ezenjawulo ezitakkiriziganya na diina oba nzikiriza. Ekyokulabirako Hosea yawasa Malaya, Isaaya yambula bukunya era nga tali mu ngatto.
4. Abegayirizi abalina omwoyo wa Eriya ku bbo. [ Malachi 4:6]
Omwegayirizi owekika kino azimba olutindo wakati w’omulembe ogw’okusatu, okusobozesa abaana abo okusala olutindo obulungi bafune obusika bwabwe. Katonda awalana eggwanga okuva ku mulembe ogusooka ppaka ku gw’okuna era tasanyukira mu kufa kw’omubi kyava atekawo omwegayiriza ono atabaganye abaana ne b’akitaabwe ng’ayita mu kwenenya n’okwegeyirira kulwe butali butukirivu bwabwe.
5. Abegayirizi abekika kyobwakabona.
Nga Yesu bwe yali omwana wa Katonda butereevu nga kiri mu musaayi gwe okwegayirira. Bano batera kusangibwa mu kkanisa nga begayirira kulw’abasumba mu kkanisa eyo mwaba atereddwa okwegayirira. Mu butukirivu ne mu butukuvu mwe bayima okukola emirimu gyabwe.
6. Omwegayirizi Omununuzi.
Okugeza Musa ne Eriya mu kugondera ekigambo kya Katonda baawakanya amaanyi g’abafuzi ne bakabaka ba mawanga 7:12, 8:18, ne 1Kings 18 :36 -39. Ba Katonda ba mawanga ganobawangulwa Musa ne Eriya okusobozesa abaana ba Israel okuva mu busibe. Abegayiriza bano bakikola mu kulwana entalo ez’omwoyo ku lwabalala nga Katonda aleese obulokozi eri omuntu oyo oba n’akikola mu kulangirira omukisa eri obulamu bwa bantu abo Katonda babeera amutumyeko. Tewali kyebasobola kukola kulwabwe nga bbo nga Katonda tabatumye. Era bwebagezaako okwetumikiriza okukola Katonda kyatabagambye kukola, bakubibwa.
7. Omwegayirizi Omukuumi w’omulyango.
Abegayirizi ab’ekika kino baweebwa obuyinza okuggulawo n’okuggalawo enziji ku bulamu bwa bantu. Obagerageranya ku bakabaka nabalamuzi b’ensi eno. Okulamula n’okusalawo kwe bakola kuva mu nneyisa yabwe n’okutambula n’Omwoyo Omutukuvu mu bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo. Okusalawo kwabwe kuva mu kuba nti baleese ensi eno byeyagala era byetambulirako nebatambulira mukwagala kwa Mukama Katonda.
Amanya gange nze Kenneth Kizito nga ndi Mwegayirizi. Nsaba onkubire ku ssimu ku +256752076796 oba +256787846995 otegeere OMWEGAYIRIZI BYATEKEDDWA OKUKOLA. Abalala basomye Ekitambo,EKIKOLIMO,OBULOGOnebabitegeera.

Eby'obutonde:
Obutonde bw’ensi Ebintu ebiri ku nsi ng’ensolo, ettaka, ebibira, emigga, ensozi, emponko, n’ebirala.

Amasannyalaze:
Amasannyalaze
Ekigambo masannyalaze kiva mu kigambo "okusannyalaza".

Ekitangaala:
Ekitangaala
Ekitangaala kitusobozesa okulaba. 
Bannasaayansi batugamba nti ekitangaala kika kya jjengo n’akantu akatono ennyo.
Ekitangaala kitambula ku ssipiidi ya 3 x 108 m/s (mmita buli katikitiki)

Eddoboozi:
Eddoboozi
Lino jjengo lye tusobola okuwulira

Earth science:
Ssaayansi W'ensi

Ensi:
Ensi (akabonero: ) ye sseŋŋendo ow'okusatu okuva ku musana gwaffe
Ensi eno etwala omwaka (100) mulamba okwetooloola omusana gwaffe.
