Ennyanja Nalubaale:
Nnyanja Nalubaale
Eno ennyanja esangibwa mu afirika y’ebuvanjuba, mu nsi za Yuganda, Kenya ne Tanzania. 
Ye nnyanja esinga obunene ku ssemazinga Afirika.

Omugga Kiira:
Mugga Kiira
Guno gwe mugga ogusinga obuwanvu mu nsi yonna (mayiro 4150). 
Guviira ddala mu nnyanja Nalubaale (mu Yuganda) ne gutuuka mu ssemayanja Mediterranean (ku lubalama lwa Misiri).

Langi:

Abantu:
Abantu

Sembuya Christopher Columbus:
Christopher Columbus Sembuya, CC, (yazaalibwa 1937 - yafa 11 Gusooka 2022), munnamakolero, musuubuzi, mulimi, amanyindwa ennyo mu nsi naddala mu Yuganda.
Yasinga ku manyikibwa olwa omulimu omunene gwe yakola mu kutandika n’okuddukanya kkampuni eziyitibwa Sembule. 
Bino bye bimu ku bitongole ebinene oba kkampuni ebya sooka okuteekebwawo abaddugavu mu Yuganda.
Emyaka Egyasooka.
Sembuya yazaalibwa mu 1937 e Nkokonjeru mu Kyaggwe. Kitaawe, Omugenzi Yafesi Magulu yali mulimi wa Kooko era ffaamu ye ye yali esinga obunene mu Afirika y'ebuvanjuba. Maamawe yali Omugenzi Rachel Magulu. Sembuya yasomera Kako Primary School ne St. Leo's College, Kyegobe e Fort Portal. Sembuya yatandikira okutunda ebikozesebwa mu kuzimba mu dduuka (mu Ndeeba) lya Maamawe omugenzi Rachel. Era yeegatibwako mugandawe Omugenzi Michael Mayanja n'oluvannyuma Mugandawe Omugenzi Henry Buwule. Oluvannyuma Sembuya yakolerako mu Gavumenti ya Yuganda mu bifo eby’enjawulo nga Disitulikiti kamisona (DC) e Madi n'e Karamoja (mu myaka gy'enkaaga, 1960s) ne mu minisitule y’ebyenfuna nga Senior Finance Officer. Bwe yava mu gavumenti, Sembuya yeegatta ku mugandawe Buwule ne baddukanya edduuka lya Ndeeba Hardware Stores mu Ndeeba, Lubaga, Kampala.
Famire.
Yafumbirwa Omugenzi Sembuya Nalumu Mary mu 1964 ne bazaala abaana bataano. Nga 8 omwezi gw'omukaaga omwaka 1979, mukyalawe Mary, yattibwa abaserikale ba Tanzania abaali bazze okubba emmotoka ye n'essente.
Ddiini.
Sembuya yali mukulisitaayo.
Sembule.
Sembuya ne mugandawe Henry Buwule batandika kkampuni eya Kkalwe, Sembule Steel Mills Limited. Baatandikira ekkolero lino mu Ggalagi y'enju yaabwe era nga balina masiini enkadde bbiri ezikola emisumaali. Oluvannyuma baagulayo ebyuma by'emisumaali ebikadde okuva mu kkampuni ya Wafios. Eno Sembule Steel Mills Limited ye yakula n'evaamu amakolero amalala, bbanka ne Kkampuni ya yinsuwa. Sembule ye Kkampuni y'abaddugavu eyasooka okukola amabaati ga "color", obutimba bw'embalama, n'ebirala. Sembuya ne Buwule be baddugavu abasooka okukola bbanka y'obwananyini mu Yuganda, Ttivi sitenseni (CTV) ey'obwananyini, Kkampuni ey'obwananyini eya Yinsuwa, Leediyo, Essimu z'amapeesa, ettaala z'amasannyalaze "balubu" ne Ttivi za "color".
Emidaali.
Mu mwaka 2020, Sembuya yaweebwa omudaali gw'obuzira (Golden Jubilee). Omudaali gw'amukwasibwa omukulembeze wa Yuganda, Yoweri Museveni.
Obugabi.
Sembuya yalina omutima omugabi era yakola kinene mu kukulaakulanya ekibuga Nkokonjeru n'ekyalo Kikwayi. Yaweererera n'okusomesa abantu bangi nnyo.
Omwoyo gw'eggwanga.
Mu myaka gy'ekinaana, Sembuya yawagira n'assa n'ensimbi mu bayeekera ba NRM ng'ayita mu mugenzi Samson Kisekka.
Okufa.
Omugenzi Sembuya yafa nga 11 Gusooka 2022 mu ddwaliro lya Kampala Hospital e Kololo. Yazikibwa mu kijja kya kitaawe Magulu ku kyalo Kikwayi mu disitulikiti ye Buikwe.

Kabegyi:
Kabegyi.
Tufuna ebiriisa ""vitamini""A,C, ne kalisiyamu okuva mu Kabegyi era emanyiddwa nga emboga. Ebiriisa bino byona byetagibwa mu mubiri gyaffe. Emboga zamugaso nnyo, zilongoosa embuto zaffe.
^ref:uganda@viagroforestry.org/^

Endiisa y'ebisolo:
Endiisa y'ebisolo.
Okuliisa ekisolo kyonna nga mwotwalidde enkoko, embizzi, ente,embuzi nebirala, bwetuba tuliisa ensolo ezo, tulina okuziwa emmere n'enva. Bino wamanga by'otwala ng'emmere ate era ne by'otwala okuba enva.
Emmere tutwaliramu:
Ate mu enva, tutwaliramu bino:
Emmere n'enva bibeera ne kipimo. Emmere y'esinga obungi olwokukusa ensolo. Enva zo nga ntonotono olwokusobozesa ekisolo okuwoomerwa emmere gyekiridde.
^ref:wwf/lvceep/^

Essomamakulu:
Omuzimbi w'ebigambo Muwanga Charles mu Kitabo kye "Essomamakulu (Semantics)" asonjola ekigambo "essomamakulu" nga essomo ly'amakulu agabeera mu buli kigambo okukyawula ku bigambo ebirala byonna. Linda ebiddako wano

Amakulu g'emiramwa(Lexical Semantics):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles Mu kitabo kye "Essomamakulu(Semantics)", "amakulu g'emiramwa"(lexical semantics) ly'ettabi ly'essomamakulu eriraga akakwate akali mu makulu g'ebigambo eby'enjawulo.

Ennanda y'amakulu(Lexical relations):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles Mu kitabo kye "Essomamakulu(Semantics)", "ennanda y'amakulu"(lexical relations)kikwata ku kulaga engeri ebigambo gye bikwataganamu mu makulu , empandiika, enjatula, oba okwawukana mu makulu, empandiika n'enjatula. Ennada y'amakulu .

Ebifaananyampandiika(Homographs):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles, mu kitabo kye "essomamakulu(Semantics)", "ebifaananyampandiika"(homographs) bye bigambo ebiwandiikibwa mu ngeri y'emu naye ng'ate amakulu gabyo si gegamu.

Ebifaananyanjatula(Homophones):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye "Essomamakulu (Semantics)", "ebifaananyanjatula"(Homophones) bye bigambo ebirina enjatula y'emu naye ate nga empandiika n'amakulu bya njawulo.

Ebyawukanyanjatula(Heterophones):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye "Essomamakulu(Semantics)", "ebyawukanyanjatula"(Heterophons) bye bigambo ebiwandiikibwa mu ngeri y'emu naye nga enjatula za njawulo.

Ebifaananyamakulu(Synonyms):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye "Essomamakulu"(Semantics), ebifaananyamakulu(synonyms) bye bigambo nga birina empandiika za njawulo naye ng'amakulu ge gamu oba nga galiraaniganye nnyo.

Ekirandiro(the root of a word):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye "Essomamakulu"(Semantics), "ekirandiro"(the root of a word) ky'ekitundu ky'ekigambo ekisigalawo nga okikekejjuddeko akawango akasookeso (prefix) n'akawango akavannyuma(suffix).Ekirandiro era oyinza okukiyita "ekimerukiro"(stem).

Ekimerukiro (the stem of a word):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye "Essomamakulu(Semantics), "ekimerukiro"(the stem of a word) ky'ekigambo nga okikekejjuddeko "akawango akasookeso"(prefix) n'akawango "akavannyuma"(suffix).Ekimerukiro ky'ekigambo era oyinza okukiyita ekirandiro ky'ekigambo.

Akazimba=Akazimba = atomu(atom):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye "Essomabuzimba(Chemistry), akazimba ke katoffaali akasirikitu akazimba ekintu oba ebintu byonna ebiri mu bwengula. Akazimba , akaziba, ne atomu bifaananyamakulu(are synonyms).

Essomabuzimba = Essomabuziba(Chemistry):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye "Essomabuzimba(Chemistry), essomabuzimba ly'essomo erikwata ku butoffaali obusirikitu obuyitibwa "obuzimba" oba "obuziba" (atoms) , n'engeri gye bwegatta mu bipooli by'enkyusabuziba(chemical compounds)okuzimba ebintu eby'enjawulo, ebiramu n'ebitali biramu.Essomabuzimba n'essomabuziba bifaananyamakulu(are synonyms).

Okusonjolera(Paraphrasing):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye "The Methods of Creating Scientific Neologisms in Luganda", "okusonjolera"(paraphrasing) kwe kunnyonnyola oba okusonjola ekigambululo(statement) mu ngeri endala awatali kukyusa makulu gakyo. Mu njogera ennayngu "okusonjolera kye kikolwa eky'okusonjola era oba okusonjola nate mu ngeri endala awatali kukyusa makulu gali mu kigambululo ky'osonjodde nate.

Ekirandaggo(Circumlocution):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye "the Methods of Creating Scientific neologisms in Luganda" , ekirandaggo kiva mu kikolwa kya kulandagga, okukozesa ebigambo ebingi okujjayo omulamwa.Eky'okulabirako , mu kifo ky'okuwandiika "obuwangaaliro"(environment) n'ogamba:
(i) Obutonde bw'ensi , oba 
(ii) Obutonde bw'ensi mwe tuwangaalira
Ekyo kikolwa kya kulandagga era ekivaamu kiyitibwa "kirandaggo"(circumlocution)

Ekibabiro=Ekigambululo ekikwata omubabiro(Catchphrase):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye "The Methods of Creating Scientific Neologisms in Luganda", "ekibabiro"(Catchphrase) kye kigambo ekikwata omubabiro, ekitegeeza omuntu n'aba ng'akijjukira, akyogera era n'akitegeera mangu.

Ekigattikakibabiro(Circumblending):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye "The Methods of Creating Scientific neologisms in Luganda", "ekigattikakibabiro"(circumblending, blending the words in a catchphrase), kye kikolwa eky'okugattika(blending, amalgamation) ebigambo ebiba mu "kibabiro" , ntegeeza ekigambululo ekikwata omubabiro (catchphrase) okugunjaawo ekigambo kimu ekimpi nga kirimu aamakulu ge gamu agali mu kigambululo. Eky'okulabirako ekibabiro "amaanyi agasobozesa" kiggattikibwa ne kivaamu ekigambo kimu "amasoboza"(energy). 
Ekigattikakibabiro era oyinza okukiyita "engattikakibabiro", ekitegeeza "engeri ey'okugattika ekibabiro( a method of blending a catchword). Engeri eno ey'okuzimba emiramwa gya sayansi okuyita mu kugattikakibabiro (circumblending) egunjiziddwawo omunoonyerezi w'enzimba yebigambo bya sayansi Muwanga Charles yennyini.

Essomansonga(Logic):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye "Esssomansonga"(Logic) , omulamwa "essomansonga" (logic) kisonjolwa nga essomo erikwata ku nsengeka y'ensonga oba ensengeka y'ebirowoozo .Ekitabo ekyo n'ebirala bisangibwa mu Uganda Book Shop ne Mukono Book Shop mu Kampala.

Ekigewukano(irony):
Ekigewukano kigattiganyo(word formed by combining more two or more words) kya "ekigambo nga amakulu gakyo ago ku ngulu gawukana n'amakulu gakyo ag'ebuziba.

Olufaananyamuntu(personification):
Olufaananyamuntu lwe lulimi olukozesebwa mu kutontoma oba katemba nga kazannyirizi(character) atali muntu azannyisibwa nga omuntu yennini

Kazannyirizi(Character):
Mu binyukuto ebiyiiye (fiction literature) , kazannyirizi(character) be bantu oba ebitali bantu ebikozesebwa okusobozesa ekinnyonnyolo okugwa amakerenda nga mu ngero , obugero emizannyo , ebitontome ne katemba owa buli kika.

Olunaawuzo(legend):
Olunaawuzo luba lugero oba akagero akanyuvu akajja "kanaawuzibwa" nga kannyonnyolwa mu buli mulembe oguddawo olw'okubaako kye kayigiriza abantu naddala abato

Essomabuntu(Humanities):
Essomabuntu ssomo lya buli ekikwata ku lubu lw'omuntu nga enneeyisa, ebirowoozo, eddiini, obuzzi bw'emisango, ennimi n'ebyobuwangwa, n'ebirala.

Essomannimi:
Mu kitabo kye "Essomamakulu (Semantics), Muwanga Charles ayogera ku "Essomannimi"(Linguistics)nga essomo lya sayansi w'ennimi ezoogerwa abantu ab'obuwangwa obw'enjawulo.
Ekitundu ky'esssomannimi ekyekuusiza ku buzimbe bw'olulimi kirimu amasomi ag'enjawulo omuli :

Essomampandiika:
Mu kitabo kye "essomamakulu"(semantics), Muwanga annyonyola "Essomampandiika"(Orthography)nga omugereko gw'ebigoberero(rules) ebigobererwa mu kuwandiika olulimi .Mu bigoberero bino mulimu okunyukukya(spelling) , okuleka amabanga okuva ku kugambo ekimu okudda ku kirala , ebigambo ebirina okutandika n'ennukuta ennene ng'amannya g'abantu , okukkaaatiriza, n'enjatula.
Buli lulimi lulina amateeka g'empandiika n'enjatula erwawula ku nnimi endala. Bino bye bisangibwa mu "essomampandiika"(orthography).

Essomanjatula:
Essomanjatula ("Phonology") ly'essomo ly'engeri ebigambo gye byatulibwamu mu lulimi olumu oba olulala.

Essomabigambo:
Mu essomannimi, Essomabigambo ("Lexicology") ly'essomo ly'enzimba, amakulu, n'enkozesa y'ebigambo oba emiramwa egy'enjawulo.

Okulambulula tekinologiya(reverse engineering):
"Okulambulula tekinologiya" era ekiyitibwa "okunonooza ekiddannyuma" (reverse engineering) kikwata ku busobozi bw'abanonooza(engineers) okuzimbulula ennyanguyirizi okusobola okulaba engeri gye yazimbibwamu mu ggwanga eryebweru gye yazimbibwa.Kino kiba kiyamba abanonooza ab'eggwanga erimu okusobola okuzimba ennyanguyirizi y'emu ku bwabwe. Eno ngeri ya kubba tekinologiya.Jjukira nti:
(i) ekinonoozo =Engineering kubanga kinponooza amateeka ga sayansi n'ekibalangulo(mathematics) okuzimba ennyanguyirizi(machine).
(ii) Omunonooza = Engineer , no nga ye mukugu anonooza amateeka ga sayansi n'ekibalangulo(okubala) okuzimba ennyanguyirizi.

Okunonooza ekiddannyuma(Reverse engineering):
"Okunonooza ekiddannyuma" oba "ekinonoozo ekiddannyuma" kitegeeza "okulambulula tekinologiya" okulaba engeri ennyanguyirizi gye yazimbibwamu abo abagizimba.

Nnabuzaale ennemu(Mutated genes):
Laba "endagabuzaale ennemu"(mutated genes).Zino z e nnabuzaale eziriko obulamu era eziyitibwa nnabuzaale ennema(Lame genes).

Essomabidduka(Vehicology):
Okusinziira ku kitabo kya Muwanga Charles "Essomabidduka"(Vehicology), lino ly'essomo erikwata ku ntondeka(manufacture, production), enkozesa, n'enkanika y'ebidduka omuli ennyonyi,ebizungirizi , n'ebiddukira ku ttaka.

Essomansi:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga, Essomansi ("Geography") kitundu kya sayansi ekikwata ku kunoonyereza oba okusoma ku mazinga/enkalu(lands),endabiko oba enkula y’Ensi (features), ebiwangaalirizi oba abawangaalizi (inhabitants), ne kalonda w’obutonde (natural phenomena) bw’Ensi.
Essomansi, sessomo eggazi eriruubirira okutegeera Ensi ne kalonda ow’abantu (human complexities/phenomena) awamu ne kalonda w’ obutonde (natural complexities /phenomena) bwayo-si bintu we bisangibwa kyokka; wabula engeri gye bizze bikyukamu n’ensibuko yabyo.
Essomansi ssessomo eritera okusonjolwa (defined) okusinziira ku matabi abiri: 
Essomansi ey’abantu (human geography) lisoma ku bantu n’entabaganyo oba entababuvo (their communities) zaabwe, obuwangwa ,ebyenfuna n’entabagana yaabwe (their interaction) n’obuwangaaliro (with the environment) okuyita mu kunoonyereza ku mikwanaganyo(relations) gy’ebifo awamu n’obwengula.
Essomansi ery’endabiko (physical geography) likwata ku kunoonyereza ku mitendera (processes) n’emisengeko (patterns) mu buwangaaliro obw’obutonde(of the natural environment) nga :
Weetegereze:

Essomabusimu(Neurology):
Mu kitabo kye "Essomabiramu"(Biology),Kalungi Christiano annyonnyola essomabusimu(Neurology) nga ettabi ly'essomabiramu erinoonyereza ku birwadde by'ensengekera y'obusimu(disorders of the nervous system).

Essomanampewo(Meteorology):
Essomanampewo(Meteorology) ly'essomo ly'embeera ya nampewo eya buli lunaku. Essomanampewo liyamba "bannassomanampewo"(Meteorologists)okulagula "embeera y'obudde"(weather forecast).

Embeera y'Obudde:
Embeera y'Obudde(Weather)
Embeera y'obudde y'enkyukakyuka mu mbeera y'obudde eya buli lunaku .Embeera y'obudde eyinza okuba 
(a) ey'omusana
(b) ey'enkuba
(c) ey'omuzira
(d) ekinnyikaggobe

Ekigeranyabudde:
Ekigeranyabudde (English: climate) kiba kigeranyo (average) kya mbeera ya budde okuyita mu kiseera ekiwanvu (average weather condition measured over long periods of time).

Aligebbula:
Era Muwanga ayongedde okusosootola ng'atutegeeza nti "essomabigoberero" kitegeeza kye kimu ne aligebbula (EN: algebra). Weetegereze:
(ii) Okubalira (arithmetic) ly'ettabi ly'ekibalangulo erikwata ku bigoberero ebyetaagisa nga okola okubalirira okw'amangumangu.Okubalirira okwamangumangu kwetaagisa kugatta mangu, kwawuza mangu, kukubisa mirundi egy'amangu, n'okugabiza amangu. 
Oli bw'akugamba nti "kola okubalirira okw'amangu" okivvuunula nti "do simple arithmetic". Mu kubaliria oba ekibalirizo tewetaagisa kkalaamu na lupapula wabula obalanguliza mu mulengera gwo (your mind). Okubalilira kulina kuba "kibalo kya mulengera (mental math).
Kino kitegeeza nti okusomesa omwana okubaliria kuba kumusomesa "kibalo kya mulengera" (mental math)oba ka tugambe nti "essomakubala ery'omulengera" (mental math). 

Nanfumbekera(candela):
Mu kitabo kye "The methods of Creating Scientific neologisms in Luganda, Muwanga ayogera ku namunigina eno gy'ayisa "nanfumbekera" bwati :
• Base quantity: Luminous intensity (ekifumbekero ky’ekitangaala). Name of Unit : candela
• Simple definition of unit in English : unit of light intensity 
• Definition in Luganda : Namunigina y’ekifumbekero ky’ekitangaala
• Borrow or blend ? Blend : Nanfumbekera

Nabuzitoya(Mole):
Mu kitabo kye "Methods of Creating Scientific Neologisms in Luganda", Muwanga Charles annyonnyola omulamwa gwa "nabuzitoya"(mole) bwati:
• Base quantity: Amount of substance (Obungi bw’enzitoya ). Name of Unit : mole
• Simple definition of unit in English :Unit of amount of substance 
• Definition in Luganda :Namunigina y’obungi bw’enzitoya
• Borrow or blend ? Blend : Nabuzitoya

Nanziring'ana(hertz):
• Derived quantity: Frequency (Enziring’ana). Name of Unit : hertz 
• Simple definition of unit in English :Unit of frequency 
• Definition in Luganda :Namunigina y’enziring’ana
• Borrow or blend? Blend : Nanziring’ana

Nannyigirizi(pascal):
• Derived quantity: Pressure (akanyigirizi ). Name of Unit : pascal 
• Simple definition of unit in English :Unit of pressure 
• Definition in Luganda :Namunigina y’akanyigirizi 
• Borrow or blend? Blend : Nannyigirizi

Nansobozeso(joule, unit of energy):
• Derived quantity: Energy (Amasoboza). Name of Unit : joule
• Simple definition of unit in English :Unit of energy 
• Definition in Luganda :Namunigina y’amasoboza 
• Borrow or blend? Blend : Nansobozeso

Namaanyi(watt ,unit of power):
• Derived quantity: Power (amaanyi ). Name of Unit : watt 
• Simple definition of unit in English :Unit of power 
• Definition in Luganda : Namunigina y’amaanyi
• Borrow or blend? Blend : Namaanyi

Nakisannyalazo (coulomb, Unit of electric charge):
• Derived quantity: Electric charge (Ekisannyalazo). Name of Unit : coulomb
• Simple definition of unit in English :Unit of electric charge 
• Definition in Luganda :Namunigina y’ekisannyalazo
• Borrow or blend? Blend : Nakisannyalazo

Nanterefu(volt,unit of electric potential):
• Derived quantity: Electric potential (Obuterefu bw’amasannyalaze ). Name of Unit : volt
• Simple definition of unit in English :Unit of electric potential
• Definition in Luganda :Namunigina y’obuterefu bw’amasannyalaze 
• Borrow or blend? Blend : Nanterefu

Nangugubiro(ohm, unit of electric resistence):
• Derived quantity: Electric resistance (Ekigugubiro ky’amasannyalaze ). Name of Unit : ohm
• Simple definition of unit in English :Unit of electric resistance 
• Definition in Luganda :Namunigina y’ekigugubiro ky’amasannyalaze
• Borrow or blend? Blend : Nangugubiro

Nabwoki eza serisiyaasi(degrees Celsius):
• Derived quantity: Celsius temperature (nabwoki mu serisiyaasi ). Name of Unit : degree Celsius 
• Simple definition of unit in English :Unit of Celsius temperature 
• Definition in Luganda :Namunigina ya nabwoki eza serisiyaasi
• Blend or circumlocution : Nabwoki eza serisiyaasi
Nabowki = namunigina z'obwoki

Nampeto(measure of angles in degrees):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga mu kitabo kye "Namunigina z'Ebipimo(Units of Measurement), "nampeto"( the unit of angles in degrees) kiva mu kugattika bigambo "namunigina z'empeto"(unit of angles).Tusobola okwogera ku
- eppeto erya nampeto 50 (fifty degree angle)
-eppeto erya nampeto 180 (an angle of one eighty degrees)

Namungina z'ebipimo:
Table of Luganda Units of Measurement Neologisms 
"Namunigina ezisookerwako"(Basic Units)
Obungi obusookerwako Erinnya lya namunigina Akabonero
Obuwanvu Miita m
Enzitoya Kiroggulaamu kg
Ebiseera Sikonda/katikitiki s
Omugendo gw’amasannyalaze Nangendo/namugendo A
Obwoki Nabwoki K
Obungi bw’enzitoya Nabuzitoya mol
Ekifumbekero ky’ekitangaala Nanfumbekera cd
"Namunigina ezibbulule"(Derived Units)
Namunigina ezibbulule(Derived Units)
Obungi obusookerwako Erinnya lya namunigina Akabonero Obwenkanu ne Namunigina ezisookerwako
Namunigina ez’enziring’ana Naziring’ana Hz s-1
Empalirizo Nampaliriza M m.kg.s-2
Akanyigirizi Nannyigirizi Pa N/m2
Amasoboza Nansobozeso J N.m
Amaanyi Namaanyi W J/s
Ekisannyalazo Nakisannyalaza C s.A
Obuterefu bw’amasannyalaze Nabuterekero V W/A
Ekigugubiro ky’Amasannyalaze Nangugubiro V/A
Obwoki mu Serisiyaasi Nabwoki eza serisiyaasi 0 C K*
Namunigina y’obubumbulukufu Nakibumbulukuko
(Becquerel) Bq 
Namunigina y’ekibumbulukuko Nammumbulukuko(Curie) ci 
Namunigina y’enzitoya y’akazimba Nakazimba (Dalton) Da

Essomabwengula:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga mu kitabo kye ,Sayansi w'Obwengula, Essomabwengula y'essomo lya sayansi erisoma obwengula omuli okuyiga ku sengendo eziri mu bwengula nga:

Ensibukula y'ebigambo(Etymologisation):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye "Essomannimi n'Essomamakulu"(Linguistics and Semantics), ensibukula/Okusibukula(Etymologisation) kiva mu bigambo by'oluganda "okukola ensibuko y'ebigambo naddala ebya sayansi mu Luganda.
Bino bifaanayamakulu(Synonyms):
• “ensibuko y’ekigambo” (etymologisation of word )
• “Ensibukula”(etymology)
• “Okusibukula”(etymologisation)

Okusibukula(Etymologisation):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye "Essomannimi n'Essomamakulu"(Linguistics and Semantics), Okusibukula(Etymologisation) kiva mu bigambo by'oluganda "okukola ensibuko y'ebigambo naddala ebya sayansi mu Luganda.
Bino bifaanayamakulu (Synonyms):

Ensibukula:
Ensibukula ("etymology"), ky'ekyo ekiva mu kusibukula ebigambo ("etymologisation"), naddala ebya sayasi ebipya mu Luganda.Buli kigambo oba omulamwa gwa sayansi guba n'ensibukula yagwo.

Okuzimbulula Omulamwa(terminology decomposition):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye "essomannimi & Essomamakulu"(Linguistics and Semantics)omuyizi yenna ow'ebyobunyukufu(literature) oba sayansi yetaaga okuyiga akakodyo k'okuzimbulula ekigambo oba kiyite "okuzimbulula omulamwa"(terminology decomposition) gw'aba asomako okulaba engeri gye gwagunjizibwawo okuviira ddala mu ntandikwa.

Essomankuluze:
Mu kitabo kye "Essomannimi & Essomamakulu"(Linguistics and Semantics), Muwanga annyonnyola nti "essomankuluze" ly'essomo erikwata ku kuwandiika ,okusunsula , n'okusengeka ebigambo ebinnyonnyolwa mu "nkuluze"(dictionary) oba "senkuluze"(enkuluze ennene, encyclopedia)

Munnasomankuluze(Lexicographer):
Munnassomankuluze (Lexicographer) ye mutendeke "essomankuluze" mu kuwandiika ,okusunsula , n'okusengeka ebigambo ebinnyonnyolwa mu "nkuluze"(dictionary) oba "senkuluze"(enkuluze ennene, encyclopedia)

Essomanzimbo(Morphology):
Mu kitabo kye "essomannimi & essomamakulu(Lingustics and Semantics) Muwanga agamba nti "essomanzimbo" lyessomo ly'engeri ebigambo gye bizimbibwamu.

Ekigegeenyo(Mememe / meme):
Muwanga agamba nti mu essomannimi(linguistics) , "ekigegeenyo"(mememe or meme) kyekuusiza ku mbeera ey'okugegeenya oba okukoppa.Kiba kintu ekikoppe oba ekigegeenye.

Akannamakulu(Seme):
Mu kitabo "essomannimi & essomamakulu", "akannamakulu"(seme) ye "namunigina y'amakulu esembayo obutono"(smallest unit of meaning)ate "akanyego"(morpheme)ky'ekyatulo(utterance)ekisembayo.
Ekigambo kiyinza okubaamu akanyego kamu(single morpheme) nga “obu.., ent..,obw’.Okiraba nti akanyego tekasobola kukola makulu nga kayimiridde kokka nga ekigambo ekyetongodde .

Kanyego(Morpheme):
Mu kitabo "essomannimi & essomamakulu", "akanyego"(morpheme)ky'ekyatulo(utterance)ekisembayo ate "akannamakulu"(seme) ye "namunigina y'amakulu esembayo obutono"(smallest unit of meaning).
Ekigambo kiyinza okubaamu akanyego kamu(single morpheme) nga “obu.., ent..,obw’.Okiraba nti akanyego tekasobola kukola makulu nga kayimiridde kokka nga ekigambo ekyetongodde .

Sensalire(Luganda words formed by Clipping):
Mu essomannimi , waliwo ekigambo ekimu ekiba ekiwanvu kyokka nga bwe kiba kisobose oyinza okukisalako obuwanvu ne kiba kimpi. Kino bwe kiba kikoleddwa amakulu tegakyuka.Gaba ge gamu n'ekyo ekisoose(ekiwanvu) era bino byombi biba "bifaananyamakulu"(synonyms).Eky'okulabirako :
Ebyo bigambo bya "sensalire" ,ekitegeeza nti ekimu kivudde mu kusalira oba okusala ku kirala ekibadde ekiwancu.
Soma ekitabo "Essomannimi & Essomamakulu" ekya Muwanga Charles

Ebisookesannene ne Ebisookesantono (Capitonyms &amp; Smonyms):
Ekisookesannene (Capitonym) kiba kigambo nga kirina amakulu ag'nkizo agetaagisa okutandika n'ennukuta ennen.Eky'okulabirako ge Mannya ga Kabaka nga Mpologoma oba amannya ga Katonda nga Kiwamirembe.
Ekisookesantono(Smonym) ky'ekigambo ekisookesanne nga bwe kiba kitandise n'ennukuta ntono amakulu nago gakyuka.Eky'okulabirako Mu kifo ky'okuwandiika maasomoogi oba Kiwamirembe bw'owandiika "maasomoogi" oba "kiwamirembe" ebitandika n'ennukuta entono biba tebikyategeeza makulu ge gamu.Waliwo ne "Buganda" ne "buganda".Amakulu ga njawulo.
Bivudde mu kitabo kya Muwanga Charles "Essomannimi n'Essomamakulu"(Linguistics and Semantics)

Ekyekebejjo (Empiricism):
"Ekyekebejjo" (Empiricism) ky'ekigereeso (theory) ekigamba nti okumanya kwonna kuva mu kumanya kwe tufuna okuyita mu kwekebejja kye tuba tunoonyerezaako n'enketteso z'omubiri (body senses). Ekyekebejjo kyava mu sayansi ow'engezeso (experimental science) okusopbola okutuuka ku nkakaso (proof) okuba eyo mu kya sa kya 17 ne 18.

Daniel Kaluuya:
Daniel Kaluuya (* 24 Gwakubiri 1989, London) kiri munnakatemba omusajja, United Kingdom ne Yuganda.

Mowzey Radio:
Yazaliwa jinja,musoga
Moses Nakintije Ssekibogo (25 Gatonya 1985 – 1 February 2018), amanyidwa nnyo nga Mowzey Radio, oba oluusi yayitibwa Moses Radio, yali muyimbi munayuganda. Ye awamu ne muto wa Jose Chameleone amanyidwa nga Weasel Manizo (amanya amatuufu Douglas Sseguya), bebaali abasanyusa abenkizo mu kibiina kya Goodlyfe. 
Career.
Radio yafulumya oluyimba lwe olusooka lweyatuuma "Tujja Kuba Wamu" mu 2004 bwe yali akyaali muyizi e Makerere University gye yatikirwa diguli mu psychology. Mu 2005 yegatta ku Leone Island Music Empire. Yatandika nga omuyimbi wa backup ya Jose Chameleone. Backup yagiyimba ne Weasel. Mu mwaka gwegumu 2005 yasobola okufulumya oluyimba  lwa reggae lweyatuuma "Jennifer". Akatambi ka video ka oluyimba luno kakolebwa munayuganda promoter DJ Erycom.
Mu 2006, Mowzey Radio yafulumya aluyimba olulala lweyatuuma "Sweet Lady", olwayagalwa nnyo banayunganda nelumusobozesa okwongera okumanyibwa. Mu gw'ekumi 2007, Mowzey Radio, Weasel ne Jose Chameleone batambula mu United States ne Caribbean. Naye bwebadirayo eka, Radio ne Weasel bali bafunye obutakaanya ne Chameleone. Era oluvanyuma lw'enkayana wakati w'ababiri bano ne Chameleone, baava mu kibiina kye ne batandikawo Goodlyfe Crew. Goodlyfe Crew yafuuka ya ttutumu. Yafulumya akayimba akasooka akayitibwa "Nakutadata", ne kudako "Ngamba" n'obulala bungi. Goodlyfe Crew yayimbirawamu n'abayimbi bangi okwali Rabadaba mu luyimba "Ability", olwafulumizibwa producer Just Jose.
Mowzey Radio yakolagana nabayimbi bangi aba Uganda ne ensi z'ebweru era nawangula awaadi nyingi and mwemwali ne BET nominations.
Radio ne Weasel bayimba enyiba nyingi nga: "Ability", "Akapapula", "Bread and Butter", "Hellenah" ft David Lutalo, "Juice Juicy", "Lwaki Onnumya", "Magnetic", "Mr DJ", "Mukama Talya Mandazi", "Ngenda Maaso", "Nyambula", "Nyumbani", "Obudde", "Potential", "Sitaani", "Zuena", ne "(Tukikole) Neera", olwakyaaka enyo ku maleedio ne terefayina mu Africa mu mwaka gwa 2014.
Ebirala Ku Bulamu Bwe N'Okufa.
Radio yafa nga 1 Ogwokubiri 2018 ku Case Clinic e Kampala, Uganda, oluvanyuma lw'omusaayi okutonya ku bwongo. Ennaku ntonoko emabega, Radio yafuna obuzibu ku bwongo oluvanyuma lwokufuna obutakaanya ne Maneja w'ebbaala lya Da Bar e Entebbe ekyavirako kanyama omu omukuba wansi nalumizibwa bubi nyo. Nya 21 ogusooka, Radio yayiira abantu mu bbaala omwenge gwa Black Label maneja, ayitibwa Egesa, gweyamugulira. Egesa yamulagira afulume, naye olwerema nalagira bakanyama okumufulumya ku kifuba. Yaziikibwa e Nakawuka mu Wakiso District.

Ssekalowooleza Kiwanuka:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye Bassekalowooleza ne bannakalowooleza ba Buganda Abedda, ono yali munoonyerezi ku laddu n'ekimyansuko.

Ssekalowooleza Mukasa:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye Bassekalowooleza ne bannakalowooleza ba Buganda Abedda, ono yali munoonyerezi ku mbeera y'Obudde nga bwekyuka ku nnyanya nalubaale(Victoria).

Ssekalowooleza Kayikuuzi:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye Bassekalowooleza ne bannakalowooleza ba Buganda Abedda, Kayikuuzi yali munonnyerezi ku buzimbe bw'amagombe era ng'aysima okulaba ekiri wansi eyo olw'okwagala okuvumbula obuzimbe bw'amagombe g'ensi n'enjazi eziri eyo,

Ssekalowooleza Ggulu:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye Bassekalowooleza ne Bannakalowooleza ba Buganda Abedda, Ggulu yali munoonyereza ku Sayansi w'obwengula, seng'ndo na buli ekiri mu bwengula , ye lyeyayitanga eggulu.

Nakalowooleza Nakayima:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye Basseakalowooleza ne Bannakalowooleza ba Buganda abedda, nakayima yali mukyala omujjanjabi, eyanoonyerezanga ku ddagala erivumula endwadde ez'enjawulo awo e Mubende.

Nakalowooleza Kitinda:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye Bassekalowooleza ne Bannakalowooleza ba Buganda Abedda, Kitinda yali mukyala, omujjnjabi era omunoonyerezi ku ddagala eriwonya endewadde ez'enjawulo e Nkumba mu Busiro , ekifo ekyamubbulwamu kati ekiyitibwa Kitinda.

Ssekalowooleza Muwanga:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Chales mu kitabo kye ,Bassekalowooleza ne Bannakalowooleza ba Buganda Abedda, Muwanga yali anoonyereza ku mbeera za byabufuzi era ng'awabula abakulembeze kutuuka ku Kabaka ku mbeera z'obukulembeze n'okusooomoozebwa okwaberangawo mu bukulembeze bwa Buganda .

Ssekalowooleza Kawumpuli:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Chales mu kitabo kye ,Bassekalowooleza ne Bannakalowooleza ba Buganda Abedda,Kawumpuli yali anoonyereza ku kirwadde kino era okufanana ne Dr.Lukwyiya eyafa Ebola, ne Kawumpuli yafa kirwadde kino kye yali alwanyisa.

Ssekalowooleza Kintu:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Chales mu kitabo kye ,Bassekalowooleza ne Bannakalowooleza ba Buganda Abedda, Ssekabaka Kintu yali mufirosoofa ku mbeera z'ebyobufuzi era yagereesa nti omukulembeze alina okutambula mu bitundu by'eggwanga lye layfuga byonna okusobola okunyweza obukulembeze obwawakati..

Ssekawooleza Ddungu:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Chales mu kitabo kye ,Bassekalowooleza ne Bannakalowooleza ba Buganda Abedda, Ddundu yali anoonyereza ku nsolo za mu nsiko era omuyizzi kayingo .

Ssekalowooleza Kibuuka Omumbaale:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Chales mu kitabo kye ,Bassekalowooleza ne Bannakalowooleza ba Buganda Abedda, Kibuuka Omumbaale yali anoonyereza ku bukodyo bwa kijaasi era yalwaniranga mu bbanga mu miti gye yateegeranga omulabe n'amulasa obusaale ng'asinziira mu gabira agaali gajjudde wonna mu BUganda ey'edda.Olw'obwetaavu bw'okukuuma ebyama by'obyokwerinda, Abaganda baali bagezi ne bagamba nti alwanira waggulu mu kire okwewala okutegeeza omulabe ekituufu.

Ssekalowooleza Matayo Kisuule Omubundu:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Chales mu kitabo kye ,Bassenkozesa ne Bannakalowooleza ba Buganda abedda ,Matayo Kisuule ,Jajjawe we, yali mubundu(gunsmith) wa Bassekabaka Mutesa I ne mwanga II ng'anoonyereza ku kalonda okwata ku mmundu omuwalabbu gye yali areetedde mu Buganda nga ekyokulwanyisa eky'omulembe .Soma ku Matthew Kisuule ,the Royal gunsmith , mu katabo k'abajulizi, "The African Holocaust"

Ssekalowooleza Musoke:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Chales mu kitabo kye ,Bassekalowooleza ne Bannakalowooleza ba Buganda Abedda, Musoke yali anoonyereza ku kkala oba langi za Musoke ezeraga nga eggabo mu lubaale nga enkuba ebadde egenda kutonnya.Bannasayansi ab'omulembe gguno bakimanyo bulungi nti ekitangaala eklyeru kibaamu kkala musanvu z'oyinza okwabuluzaamu nga weyambisa ekirawuli ekigulumivu(ekigulumiro kya kkala)

Eddiini ya Buganda:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Chales mu kitabo kye ,Bassekalowooleza ne Bannakalowooleza ba Buganda Abedda, Buganda eyedda yalina enzikiriza eya Katonda ow'obwa namunigina (monolithic God) ng'owabayudaaya oba abazungu . Katonda ono abaganda baali bamuyita amannya manji omuli:
- Namugereka
-Kiwamirembe
-Ddunda
n'amalala
Abazungu we bajjira wano, mu BUganda mwonna mwalimu Amasobo ga Katonda asatu , gonna mu Kyaggwe, nga Essabo Lutikko lyali mu Ggulu e Mukono.
Abanganda abedda oluvannyuma baatandika okusoosowaza Bassekalowooleza ne bannakalowooleza abaafa nga balowooza ntii kagezimunyu ne bwaba afudde asigaza obusoboze okukola eby'amagezi by'abadde akola mu biseera bye eby'obulamu.
Kino kye kyabaleetera okutandika okusooosowaza Bassekalowoolezabe bano baayitanga Balubaale nga Muwanga, Kiwanuka, Ggulu, Kayikuuzi,Mukasa era ne babazimbira masabo mu kifo ky'okusinza Katonda omutonzi w'eggulu n'Ensi.
Okuba ng'abaganda baali basinza Katonda y'ensonga lwaki bajjumbira eddiini empya ezisinza katonda ow'obwa namunigina okuva ebweru. Zaali tezikontana ne Katonda waabwe gwe Baali basinza.
Tuleme kusinza bafu wabula tubajjukirirekoera tubayigireko eby'amagezi bye baakola mu biseera byabwe eby'obulamu .Tusinza Katonda ow'obwa namunigina eyatonda obwengula bwonna na buli ekibulimu.

Donald Trump:
Donald John Trump (yazaalibwa ogwomukaaga 14, 1946) ye pulezidenti wa Amerika  afuga era nga wa 45 mu baplezidenti abali bafuze mu Amerika. Yayingira ekkakkalabizo nga 20 Ogusooka, 2017. Nga tanayingira byabufuzi, yali munabizineesi era nga musanyusa ku terefayina.

Vladimir Putin:
Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin (/ˈpuːtɪn/; Russian; yazaalibwa 7 Ogwekumi, 1952) Munabyabufuzi Omuluusi era nga ye Pulezidenti wa Russian Federation okuva nga 7 Ogwokutaano 2012, gyebuvudeko emabega yali mukibo kino okuva 2000 okutuusa 2008. Yali katikkiro wa Russian Federation okuva 1999 okutuusa 2000, era n'okuva 2008 okutuusa 2012. Mu kisanja kye ekyokubiri ku bwakatikkiro ye yali ssentebe w'ekibiina ekifuzi ekya United Russia.

Yoweri Museveni:
Yoweri Kaguta Museveni (; yazaalibwa 15 Ogwomwenda c. 1944) munabyabufuzi munauganda era Pulezidenti wa Uganda okuva 1986. Museveni yetaba mu buyeekera obwajjako abakulembeze ba Ugandan Idi Amin (1971–79) ne Milton Obote (1980–85). Mu myaka gy'ekyenda, Museveni yayogerwangako abazungu (ab'ebugwanjuba) ng'omu ku bakulembeze ba'Afirika abomulembe omujja. Mu bukulembeze bwa mwami Museveni, Uganda efunye ku dembe n'okula kw'ebenfuna. Obukulembeze bwe bwattattanibwa bwe yetaba mu lutalo e Democratic Republic of the Congo n'entalo endala mu Great Lakes region. Olutalo mu mambuka lwa abeyekera ba Lord's Resistance Army lwa letawo  embeera y'okubonaabona. Okunyigiriza banabyabufuzi ab'oluda oluwabula gavumenti n'okukyusa ssemateeka w'eggwanga okujja ekomo ku bisanja bya pulezidenti mu 2005, ekyamusobozessa okwongera okufuga,zeezimu ku nsonga ezogerwako enyo abatunulizi be byobufuzi mu Uganda n'ebweru.

Embaziso(Number):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu kitabo kye "Embaziso": Ekigereeso ky'Embaziso(Numbers "Number Theory), embaziso (number(s)kivudde mu kugattika bigambo "Erinnya ly'embonero ezibala"(the name of a counting numeral).Kati nno tuyinza okwogera ku:
Ekifaananyamakulu(Synonym) : Namba
Manya :Embonero (Numeral) ekiva mu kugattika ebigambo "endaga y'obubonero obubala"(Mark for counting sysmbol)
Akatabo "Embaziso"(Numbers) kati weekali .Ke kamu ku butabo 24 obw'ekibalangulo(mathematics) obufuluma omwaka guno 2018. Buno butabo bwa byafaayo mu nkulaakulana y'Olulimi Oluganda.

Emikwanaganyo gy'ebyenfuna (Econimic Relations):
Okusinziira mu kitabo kye "Ebyobufuna"(Political Economy),Muwanga ayogera ku miramwa esatu:
Linda ebiddako !!!

Essomabirowoozo(Psychology):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga mu kitabo kye "Essomabirowoozo" oba "Ebyebirowoozo"(Psychology) ,essomo lino lisoma embeera z'ebirowoozo ez'enjawulo n'engeri omuntu gy'ava mu mbeera na biki ebireetera omuntu okuva mu mbeera.
Waliwo n'Ebyebiriwoozo mu Essomabusomesa(Education psychology)

Essomabibuuzo:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga mu Kitabo kye "Essomabibuuzo"(Philosophy), lino ssomo erikwata ku kwebuuza ku:
(a) Kumanya
(b)Obulungi
(c)Ebyobufuzi
(d)Okubaawo
(e)Empisa

Essomabulungi(Esthetics):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga mu Kitabo kye "Essomabibuuzo"(Philosophy), essomabulungi oba essomabirungi(esthetics), ttabi lya Ssomabibuuzo, eribuuza ku bulungi.Laba na bino:
Amatabi ga essomabibuuzo ataano galimu:
(i) Essomakubaawo (Metaphysics) . Lino ssomo lya bibuuzo ku kuba( Existence).Libuuza :Ki ekiriwo ? 
(ii) Essomakumanya (Epistemology). Lino ssomo lya bibuuzo ku kumanya( Knowledge).Libuuza 'Omanya otya nti omanyi ?
(iii)Essomampisa(Ethics).Lino ssomo lya bibuuzo ku mpisa.Libuuza .Nkola ki oba nkole ntya ? 
(iv)Essomabyabufuzi (Politics). Lino ssomo lya kuwaliriza bikolrwa.Libuuza :Ki ekikkiriibwa okukola ? 
((v)Essomabirungi(Esthetics) . Lino ssomo eribuuza k ekitondekabirungi ( Art).

Essomabirungi(Easthetics):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga mu Kitabo kye "Essomabibuuzo"(Philosophy), essomabulungi oba essomabirungi(esthetics), ttabi lya Ssomabibuuzo, eribuuza ku bulungi.Laba na bino:
Amatabi ga essomabibuuzo ataano galimu:
(i) Essomakubaawo (Metaphysics) . Lino ssomo lya bibuuzo ku kuba( Existence).Libuuza :Ki ekiriwo ? 
(ii) Essomakumanya (Epistemology). Lino ssomo lya bibuuzo ku kumanya( Knowledge).Libuuza 'Omanya otya nti omanyi ?
(iii)Essomampisa(Ethics).Lino ssomo lya bibuuzo ku mpisa.Libuuza .Nkola ki oba nkole ntya ? 
(iv)Essomabyabufuzi (Politics). Lino ssomo lya kuwaliriza bikolrwa.Libuuza :Ki ekikkiriibwa okukola ? 
((v)Essomabirungi(Esthetics) . Lino ssomo eribuuza k ekitondekabirungi ( Art).

Essomakubaawo:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga mu Kitabo kye "Essomabibuuzo"(Philosophy), essomakubaawo ("Metaphysics"), ttabi lya Ssomabibuuzo, eribuuza ku kuba(existence).Laba na bino:
Amatabi ga essomabibuuzo ataano galimu:
(i) Essomakubaawo (Metaphysics) . Lino ssomo lya bibuuzo ku kuba( Existence).Libuuza :Ki ekiriwo ? 
(ii) Essomakumanya (Epistemology). Lino ssomo lya bibuuzo ku kumanya( Knowledge).Libuuza 'Omanya otya nti omanyi ?
(iii)Essomampisa(Ethics).Lino ssomo lya bibuuzo ku mpisa.Libuuza .Nkola ki oba nkole ntya ? 
(iv)Essomabyabufuzi (Politics). Lino ssomo lya kuwaliriza bikolrwa.Libuuza :Ki ekikkiriibwa okukola ? 
((v)Essomabirungi(Esthetics) . Lino ssomo eribuuza k ekitondekabirungi ( Art).

Essomakumanya(Epistimology):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga mu Kitabo kye "Essomabibuuzo"(Philosophy), "essomakumanya"(Epistimology) ), ttabi lya Ssomabibuuzo, eribuuza ku kumanya(knowledge).Laba na bino:
Amatabi ga essomabibuuzo ataano galimu:
(i) Essomakubaawo (Metaphysics) . Lino ssomo lya bibuuzo ku kuba( Existence).Libuuza :Ki ekiriwo ? 
(ii) Essomakumanya (Epistemology). Lino ssomo lya bibuuzo ku kumanya( Knowledge).Libuuza 'Omanya otya nti omanyi ?
(iii)Essomampisa(Ethics).Lino ssomo lya bibuuzo ku mpisa.Libuuza .Nkola ki oba nkole ntya ? 
(iv)Essomabyabufuzi (Politics). Lino ssomo lya kuwaliriza bikolrwa.Libuuza :Ki ekikkiriibwa okukola ? 
((v)Essomabirungi(Esthetics) . Lino ssomo eribuuza k ekitondekabirungi ( Art).
Muwanga agamba nti esomakumanya libuuza omanya otya oba omanya otya nti omanyi?
(a)Okwatako
(b) Olegako
(c)Owunyako
(d)Olabako n'amaaso go gennyini
(e)Owulira n'amatu go

Essomampisa:
Okusinziira ku Muwanga mu Kitabo kye "Essomabibuuzo"(Philosophy), "essomampisa"(Ethics) ), ttabi lya Ssomabibuuzo, eribuuza ku mpisa(ethics or morals).Laba na bino:
Amatabi ga essomabibuuzo ataano galimu:
(i) Essomakubaawo (Metaphysics) . Lino ssomo lya bibuuzo ku kuba( Existence).Libuuza :Ki ekiriwo ? 
(ii) Essomakumanya (Epistemology). Lino ssomo lya bibuuzo ku kumanya( Knowledge).Libuuza 'Omanya otya nti omanyi ?
(iii)Essomampisa(Ethics).Lino ssomo lya bibuuzo ku mpisa.Libuuza .Nkola ki oba nkole ntya ? 
(iv)Essomabyabufuzi (Politics). Lino ssomo lya kuwaliriza bikolrwa.Libuuza :Ki ekikkiriibwa okukola ? 
((v)Essomabirungi(Esthetics) . Lino ssomo eribuuza k ekitondekabirungi ( Art).

Munnassomabibuuzo(Omufirosoofa):
Munnassomabibuuzo era ayitibwa omufirosoofa y'oyo kakensa mu esomabibuuzo.

Embonero(Numerals):
Embonero(Numerals) kiva mu kugattika bigambo bya Luganda "erinnya ly'endaga y'obubonero obubala".Embonero ke abonero akabala ate embaziso(numbers) ly'erinnya ly'embonero.

Namunkanga(Helicopter):
Namunkanga (Helicopter) )kiva mu kugaziya makulu(semantic extension) g'erinnya ly'ekiwuka ekibuuka mu bbanga era nga kiyinza okuyimirira mu kifo kimu mu bbanga nga ennyanguyirizi eyo yennyini bw'ekola.

Ennyonyi(Aircraft,Earoplane):
Mu kitabo kye "Essomabibuuka"(Aeronautics) , Muwanga annyonnyola emiramwa ennyonyi ne namunkanga . 
Ennyonyi(Aircraft,Earoplane) kiva mu kugattika bigambo bya Luganda "ennyanguyirizi ebuuka nga ekinyonyi".
Ekinyonyi(bird) kigerageranye n'ennyonyi mu ngeri y'emu "namunkanga"(helicopter) bw'egeraageranyizibwa n'ekiwuka ekyitibwa namunkanga.

Essomamisango(Criminology):
Mu kitabo kye "Essomamisango"(Criminology),Muwanga annyonnyola embeera ezireetera abazzi b'emisaango oba abamenyo b'amateeka okuzza emisanga oba okumenya amateeka.

Essomampozesa(Jurisprudence):
Mu kitabo kye "essompozesa" (Jurisprudence), Muwanga annyonnyola kalonda akwata ku mpozesa n'ensala y'emisanga mu bwenkanya.Kino era oyinza okukiyita "ebyempozesa".

Ekijjanjabiro(Hospital):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga ,eddwaliro by'ebimu ku bigambo ebirina okusigala mu kkaddiyizo kubanga tekikwatagana na mulamwa gu kinnyonnyola.
Eddwaliro kitegeeza ekifo we balwalira. Tewali muntu amanya nti agenda kulwala agenderewo mu ddwaliro era tewali gwebagoba waka kubanga alwadde alyoke asigale mu ddwaliro.
Omulamwa omutuufu mu luganda olutuufu kirina kuba "ekifo we bajjanjabira abalwadde", "ekijjanjabiro"(hospital). Mu bungi kiba "ebijjanjabiro"(hospitals), ekitegeeza ebifo we bajjanjabira abalwadde. Obulwadde tebulinda bantu kutuuka mu ddwaliro ne bulyoka bbubalumba.Ggwe olowozaaki ?

Ekizungirizi(Rocket):
Minisita Hajj Abdulu Nadduli bwe tumutwalira ebimu ku nzivuunulo zaffe nga tuli ne Mw.Mukiibi Akireewo, naye n'atutegeeza nti omuganda eyagunjawo omulamwa gw'ekizungirizi yamala kukitegeera nti "Rocket" nzirusi ebuuka mu bbanga , eyambuka mu bbanga oba mu bwengula nga ezungirira(okuva mu "kuzunga") .
Ekibuuka ekyesolossa mu bwengula nga bwe kizunga ku misinde egya yiriyiri , omuganda ono eyakigunjaawo n'akiyita "ekizungirizi" nga muwanga bwe yagunjaawo emiramwa "omubalanguzi"(mathematician, okubalangula(to culculate), okubalanguza(to solve) , okubaza(to compute) , ekibalanguzo(formula), okuva mu kigambo ky'oluganda ekyekuusiza ku kuwagala,"ekibalangulo"(the subject that sharpens the mind",mathematics).
Omuganda oyo yatuwonya okukyewola tukiyite "loketi". naawe kola nga bwotyo ! ebigambo bigunje okuva mu bikolwa ebiriwo mu Luganda ! Lulimi lugagga mu bigambo ! Temulunyooma !

Okugunja ebigambo(Conceptualisation):
Okusinziira ku Muwanga mu kitabo kye "Essomannimi", okugunja ebigambo(conceptualisation), kye kintu omuzadde ky'akola nga yakazaala omwana omuwere n'amutuuma erinnya. Mu butonde bwe , omuzadde bw'aba awa omwana erinnya asooka kumutuuma eryo eriri mu njogera ey'obuwangwa bwe , so si kusookera kw'eryo nga Yowaana oba kamaadi amewole okuva ku buwangwa obugwira.Bw'amala okumutuuma erinnya ery'obuwangwa olwo aba waddembe okumwongerezaako erinnya eryewole okuva mu buwangwa obugwira.
Erinnya eryo eriva mu buwangwa bw'omuzadde lye lisinga okukola amakulu eri omwana oyo n'abantu ab'obuwangwa bwe era lye lisinga okwawula omwana oyo ku bantu abalala bonna,abalina endabika n'enneeyisa ez'enjawulo. Kati nno bwe kiba nti bajjajjaffe babadde bazimba emiramwa nga bawa abato amannya agabaawula ku bantu abalala enkuyanja, lwaki abantu baffe ab'omulembe guno nga n'abamu bayizi balowooza nti okugandawaza 'ekibalangulo"(mathematics) n'ekimanyo(sayansi) tulina kwewola bwewozi bigambo okuva mu nnimi ez'ebunaayira.
genda mu Uganda Book Shop, Mukono Bookshop, ne Buganda Tourism Center ogule ebitabo ebifudde oluganda olulimi olwa sayansi ate nga ebigambo by'okubala(ekibalangulo) ne sayansi ebisinga Muwanga abigunjizzaawo nga yeyambisa ensibuko, ntegeeza ebigambo ebiriwo mu Luganda, n'akugambo nto "okwebiriga" oba "okubiriga" embaziso kivvuunula eky'olungereza "to square a number" , okuva mu mbaziso bbiri(2) ate n'akugamba nti "okwesatuza" oba "okusatuza" embaziso kivvuunulwa "cubing a number)okuva mu mbaziso satu(3).
Ate laba muwanga bwajja n'akugamba nti "embaziso" , namba ezibala" kye kivvuunula eky'olungereza "number" ate bw'amala n'akugamba nti "zero" mu luganda y'enkuumakifo(placeholder) ate bw'amala n'akugamba nti kyokka embaziso era oyinza okugiyita "namba" mu Luganda era "enkuumakifo(zero) era oyinza okujiyita "zziro" oba "zzeero" mu Luganda.
laba Muwanga bw'akugamba nti "angle" mu luganda liba "eppeto" mu bunji "amaweto" oba "empeto" ekiyinza okutegeeza "ensonda oba ekkoona. Laba bw'ajja n'akugamba nti "line" eky'olungereza era oyinza okukiyita "layini" ekyewole mu Luganda oba "olukoloboze" oba "omusittale". Olulimi lugaggawala bigambo ebirina amakulu ge gamu oba agaliraaniganye .
Abaganda mulekere awo okwewugguusa nga mugamba nti emiramwa gy'okubala ne sayansi tugyewole bwewozi okuva mu nnimi engwira. Wegatte ku Muwanga tugaggawaze olulimi lw'obujajja !!Alaze nti ebigambo bye tuyinza okweyambisa okugunjawo emiramwa egya sayansi n'ekibalangulo(Okubala) egisinga obunji tubirina mu Luganda !Ssabasajja kabaka awangaale ne Nabagereka agarekere Obuganda.

Ssessomabuntu(Humanities):
Lino lye ssessomo ly'amasomo g'obuntu .Gano ge masomo agakwata ku bwo muntunga ennimi oba Sessomanimi(the discipline of lingustics), essomabibuuza, n'amalala

Olunnyonnyolo(Circumlocution):
Olunnyonnyolo lwe lulimi olugunja ebigambo nga tweyambisa ebigambo bingi okujjayo amakulu g'omulamwa.Eky'okulabirako by'ebigambo ebigunjiziddwawo eby'olunnyonnyolo:
(a) Obutonde bwe nsi 
(b) Ekifo ekiramu we kiwangaalira
(c)Obutonde bw'ensi mwe tuwangaalira
Bino bypnsatule biyinza okuvvuunula eky'olungera za "environment" oba "habitat"
Kyokka nga twetoloola ne tugattika ebigambululo bino(circumblending) ,tuyinza okubijjamu omulamwa ogw'ekigambo kimu nga :
-Obuwangaaliro(environment)
-Ekiwangaaliro(habitat)

Okugattika ebigambo ekyetoloola(Circumblending:
Tusobola okuddira ebigambo eby'emiramwa egy'olunnyonnyolo ne tubigattika okufuna ekigambo kimu . Olunnyonnyolo lwe lulimi olugunja ebigambo nga tweyambisa ebigambo bingi okujjayo amakulu g'omulamwa.Eky'okulabirako by'ebigambo ebigunjiziddwawo eby'olunnyonnyolo:
(a) Obutonde bwe nsi 
(b) Ekifo ekiramu we kiwangaalira
(c)Obutonde bw'ensi mwe tuwangaalira
Bino bypnsatule biyinza okuvvuunula eky'olungera za "environment" oba "habitat"
Kyokka nga twetoloola ne tugattika ebigambululo bino(circumblending) ,tuyinza okubijjamu omulamwa ogw'ekigambo kimu nga :
-Obuwangaaliro(environment)
-Ekiwangaaliro(habitat)

Okuwangowaza(Affixation):
Okuwangowaza ngeri ya kugunjawo bigambo nga tweyambisa obuwango(affixes) obulina amakulu ag'enjawulo.Eky'okulabirako k'akawango akasookeso(prefix) "essoma-" akategeeza "essomo lya..."(study of..) oba "ssessoma-" akategeeza "ssessomo lya..." (the discipline of...). Ebyokulabirako:
"Essoma-"(Sub-disciplines):
"Sessoma-"(Disciplines):

Balubaale(the Departed Thinkers/Wisepersons of Buganda):
Plato,Socrates, Aristotle,Galileo ,Copernicus, Isaac Newton, Charles Darwin bonna omuganda aba abayita "ba Lubaale" b'e Bulaaya.Lwaki ?
Mu kitabo kye Bassekalowooleza ne Bannakalowooleza ba Buganda abedda ,Muwanga Charles agamba nti "Lubaale" mulamwa gwa Luganda ogutegeeza omwoyo gw'omuntu avudde mu bulamu bw'ensi ng'abadde kagezimunyu, Ssekalowooleza, Nakalowooleza, omuyiiya, oba omufirosoofa mu biseera bye eby'Obulamu.
Balubaale n'olwekyo tebasaana kusamirira wabula tubajjukire okubayigirako ebintu eby'amagezi bye baakolera entabaganya(society) mu biseera byabwe eby'obulamu era tuzimbe amatendekero ag'enjawulo aga sayansi n'obukulembeze nga tugababbulamu buli awali ekiggwa kya buli lubaale .
Ekiggwa kitegeeza ekifo lubaale we yakoleranga emirimu gye egy'amagezi mu biseera bye eby'obulamu.Teririna kuba ssabo.Ku mulembe Omutebi , buli awali ekiggwa tuzimbewo ettendekero erimubbuddwamu mu by'amagezi ag'ekikugu ag'omulembe ogwa sayansi.
Bwe twogera ku Lubaale Muwanga, Kiwanuka, Ndaula,Kintu, Nagaddya, Kibuuka, ddungu,Ggulu, Kayikuuzi, Kawaali, n'abalala tuba tutegeeza abantu abaali bakagezimunyu , Bannakalowooleza ne Bassekalowooleza mu biseera byabwe eby'obulamu.Bano baali bantu nga Bakakensa be tulina kati mu matendekero ne Ssettendekero.
Okikkiriza nti Lubaale kayikuuzi yali muntu eyali anoonyereza ku njazi n'okuyiga ku buzimbe bw'amagombe g'Ensi? Ate Lubaale Ggulu eyali anoonyereza ku bwengula?Bano baali bantu abanoonyereza ku butonde obw'enjawulo.Tubayigireko mu kifo ky'okubasamirira.

Charles Muwanga Foundation for Intellectualisation of African Vernaculars:
"Charles Muwanga Foundation for Intellectualisation of African vernaculars" kawefube wa Ssekalowooleza Muwanga agenderera okulaba nga Olulimi Oluganda luyitimuka mu magezi ag'ekikugu gonna mu masomo ag'enjawulo.
Kawefube ono yava mu kunoonyereza kwa mwami Muwanga Charles n'akizuula nti tewali nsonga lwaki abaddugavu tetusobola kugunjaawo bigambo ebirimu amakulu agali mu bigambo by'Olungereza eby'ekibalangulo oba essomakubaza ne sayansi.
Muwanga agamba nti kye tulina okusooka okukola kwe kuvaamu endowooza nti ebigambo bya sayansi n'ekibalangulo(essomakubala) tulina kubyewola bwewozi ! Tulowooza nti bwe tugunjawwo ebigambo nga tweyambisa ebigambo bye tulina mu nnimi zaffe nga Oluganda , amakulu gaabyo gaba tegavaayo!Okwo kwebuzaabuza na kwewabya kubanga n'ebyolungereza ebyekikugu bye tukozesa tetwasooka kunnyonnyoka butegeerekefu bwabyo , wabula twasooka kubikwata bukusu n'ensonjola zaabyo.
Ekikulu si kigambo wabula amakulu gaakyo amekusifu agakyawula ku birala. Omunyankole agamba "shitama" okutegeeza "okutuula" mu Luganda kyokka Omuganda bwaba ayogera Olunyankole kino tekimwesittaza kuba aba akimanyi nti mu Lunyankole "okushitama si kusitama wabula kutuula. 
Omusoga bwagamba nti twenda President Mulala aba tategeeza nti Pulesidenti aliko tebakyamwagala wabula aba ategeeza nti twagala pulesudenti omu yekka. Omuganda bw'ayiga okwogera Olusoga kino atandika okukimanya nti mu Lusoga "kirala" kitegeeza "kimu", si kintu eky'enjawulo nga bwe kri mu Luganda.
Tweyunge ku kaweefube wa Muwanga okuzimba oluganda olw'ekikugu mu sayansi , ekibalangulo ne tekinologiya nga tugoberera ebiwandiiko bye .
Muwanga yatandikawo IALI okulaba nga ennimi zonna endala eza Uganda ne Africa zikulaakulana nga Oluganda ye lweyekwatiddemu nga ekyokulabirako!!

Ebisukkulumiso(Supernyms):
Ekisukkulumiso(Supernym) kiba kigambo ekiraga obusukkulumu. Okusinziira ku Muwanga Charles mu katabo ke "Essomannimi n'Essomamakulu(Linguistics and Semantics),ekisukkulumiso mulamwa ogutondekeddwawo okuva mu kikolwa eky'okusukkuluma.
Ebimu ku bisukkulumiso mu Luganda mulimu :
(i) Ebisukkulumiso ebiraga omuntu asukkulumye ku balala nga:
(ii) Ebisukkulumiso eby'ebitongole:

Embugaano (Matter):
"Embugaano"(Matter)
Okusinziira ku Muwanga ,embugaano ky'ekyo ekibugaana ekibangirizo(space) ate nga kirina enzitoya(mass).
Embeera z’embugaano
Embugaano(matter) ebeera mu mbeera ssatu : Enkalubo(Solid),Enkulukusi(Liquid), ne ggaasi, okusinziira oku bwoki(tempulikya) n’akanyigirizi(pressure) embugaano mw’eba eri.
Okubugaana kitegeeza okufumbekera oba okujjura mu kifo .Weetegereze:
(c)Enzitoya (Mass).Enzitoya y'embugaano ebugaana mu kifo ng'evaamu okuzitowa oba obuzito.
(d) Ekibangirizo(Spacious three dimensional area.
Weetegereze bino ebyekuusiza ku mbugaano(Matter):
-Enkalubo ey’ekikulekule
Eno eba nzitoya efaanana ekikulukusi eky’ekivululo(coagulated/congealed liquid)nga obuzimba bwakyo tebulina nsengeka
Ggaasi
Eno eba mbugaano nga erina enzitoya(mass) kyokka nga obuzimba bwayo bwetadde buli kamu okuva ku kalala.
Obwesengeko
Okwesengesa
Eno eba nkyukakyuka ya mbugaano okuva mu kikulekule okudda mu bwesengeko.Kino kiva mu kuwola,ekieetera obuzimba okwesengeka(to become ordered).
Ekitondowalo
Embugaano ekyuka okuva mu mbeera eya ggaasi(omukka) okudda mu y’amatondo oba amazzi.Kino kiva mu kuwola.
Ekifumuuko
Embugaano ekyuka okuva mu kikulukusi oba enkulukusi okudda mu ggaasi,Kino kiva mu kwokya oba kubuguma
Okumerenguka kw’enkulukusi
Kino kiba kukyuka kwa mbugaano okuva mu mbeera ey’enkalubo okudda mu mbeera ey’enkulukusi.Kiva mu kwokya oba okubuguma.
Okukwata okw’enkulukusi
Ekyebalama
Ekyebalama kibaawo ng’embugaano ey’enkalubo yebalamye enkulukusi n’efuuka butereevu ggaasi.Kino nakyo kireetebwawo kwokya okuba okubugumya.

The list of the titles of 77 Muwanga 's coming primers of Mathematics and Science in Luganda:
Reference is made to Intellectual property Copy Right Certificate Number 76/2016 of the Uganda Registration Services Bureau reigistered in the names of Muwanga Charles in a work titled "The Taxonomic Structures of Luganda Scientific Concepts: The making of a Blafrican Language of Science ".All the coming publications by Muwanga were condensed in that big publication and therefore covered by the same referenced copyright certificate.The vernacularised terminologies highlighted in that Luganda scientific literature are all posted on Luganda Wikipedia for your possible editing and consumption in accordance with the laws governing Wikipedia as well as those covering Copyright within the borders of Uganda.

This is the first Intellectual Revolution in Sub-saharan Africa . Be part of the first African Intellectual revolution !

Essoma-words(The Logy words of Luganda):
According to Charles Muwanga , the Luganda language prefix "essoma-" is equivalent to the
English suffix "-logy" .
They both mean "study of-" . Muwanga's list of "essoma-constructions"
include disciplines(fields of study) 
or sub-disciplines (sub-fields of study) such as :
• Essomabibuuka (Aeronautics) - Essomampetossatu(Trigonometry)
• Essomabuzaale (Genetics) -Essomabisolo(Zoology) 
• Essomansi (Geography) -Essomamiddo(Botany)
• Essomabutonda (Divinity) -Essomabutonzi(Theology)
• Essomabutonde (Physics, Science of Nature)
• Essomabuzimbe (Physics , study of physical structures in the universe )
• Essomabiramu (Biology)
• Essomabutonzi (Divinity)
• Essomabinyunyunsi (Parasitology)
• Essomaddagala (Medicine)
• Essomabuyambi (Nursing)
• (Essomabiwuka ebireetendwadde Entomology 
• Essomampima (Geometry, the study of dimensions)
• Essomankula (Geometry, the study of mathematical shapes)
• Essomampuyissatu /Essomampetossatu (Trigonometry)
"Sessoma-"(Disciplines):
Essoma-denotes “study of..”, “science of “ . It is the equivalent of the English "-logy" words .Charles Muwanga has been able to build Luganda concepts for most academic disciplines and sub-disciplines using "essoma-" prefix which also has the same function as Eby-" prefix. Examples of academic Luganda disciplines formed using "essoma-"prefix include: 
• Essomampimo or Ebyempimo (Geometry, Study of Geometry)
• Essomansi (Geography
• Esomanjazi (Geology)
• Essomabutonde ( Science of Nature, Physics)
• Essomabuzimbe (Physics)
• Essomampuyisatu (Trigonometry)
• Essomabiramu (Biology)
• Essomabutonzi (Divinity)
• Essomabinyunyunsi (Parasitology)
• Essomaddagala (Medicine)
• Essomabuyambi (Nursing)
When forming academic disciplines in Luganda, Muwanga has used the Luganda prefix “essoma-“which is Luganda for “-logy”, meaning “essomo lya- (the study of. or the science of.. ). 
The list of academic disciplines we now have in Luganda , thanks to Muwanga's innovative terminology research is long .Other disciplines and sub-disciplines formed using "essoma-" prefix are:
• Essomabikuyege (Acarology)
• Essomalubugumu (Actinibilology)
• Essomakitangamiko Actinology):
• Essomabupempewo (Aerobiology)
• Essomannampewo (Aerology)
• Essomabulimiro (Agrology)
• Essomattakalikuza (Agrobiology)
• Essomansibukoyandwadde (Aetiology)
• Essomabiddo Agrostology)
• Essamaliga (Algology)
• Ekifukuuko (allergy)
• Essomakifuukuuko (Allergologi) 
• Essomakisajjalaato (Andrology)
• Essomakisiriso (Anesthesiology)
• Essomansolomuntu (Anthropology)
• Essomanjuki (Apiology)

• Essobbakitiriya , (Bacteriology) Essomo lya bbakitiiriya: the study of bacteria.
