Mu mwezi Ogwokusatu mu mwaka gwa 2018, bammemba 32 abatuula ku kakiiko akamanyiddwa nga Busoga parliamentary caucus baatuula era ne basalawo okuwera Persis Namuganza okuva ku kakiiko olw'okweyisa mu ngeri gye baalaba nga tesaanidde. Akakiiko kaavunaana Persis Namuganza olw'okukunga abalonzi be bakube era batuuse obuvune ku Kyabazinga William Gabula Nadiope IV n'omukubiriza w'olukiiko lw'eggwanga Rebecca Kadaga bwe yali ku lukuŋŋaana lwe yakuba mu kitundu ekimanyiddwa nga Ivukula mu ddisitulikiti ya Namutumbamu mwezi Gwokusatu ogw'omwaka 2018.
Nga 12 Ogwokusatu 2018, Daily Monitor yafulumya eggulire eryali ligamba nti kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti, Irene Mulyagonja yali anoonyereza ku Namugaza okuzuula oba nga talina biwandiiko bya buyigirize ebimukkiriza okubeera mu kifo kye yali aweerezaamu mu kiseera ekyo. Okunoonyereza okwo kwatanulwa okwemulugunya okwaweebwayo abantu abamu mu kitundu kye gy'asibuka ekya Busoga, nga 7 Ogwokusatu 2018.
Laba ne.
Busoga
Akakiiko ka Uganda

Beti Kamya-Turwomwe:
Beti Olive Namisango Kamya-Turomwe, abangi gwebaanyi nga Betty Kamya oba Beti Kamya, mukyala muna byabusubuzi ate munabyabufuzi mu Uganda, egwanga eryokusatu mubyenfuna mu kwegata kwamawanga ga buvanjuba bwa Africa ( East African Community.) ye minista we byetaaka, ebya mayumba ne nkula kulana yebibuga okuva nga 14 ntenvu 2019.Nga tanaba minista webyetaka, okuva nga 6 Sebo aseka 2016 okutusa Ntenvu 2019, yawereza nga minista wensonga za kampala capital city authority.
Entandikwa neby'okusoma kwe.
Kamya yatandikawo era ye mukulembeze wa Uganda Federal Alliance(UFA) ekimu ku bibiina byebyobufuzi mu uganda. yali omu kubesimbawo mu kalulu kokulonda omukulembeze wegwanga aka 2011, yakwata kifo kya kutano ngalina obululu 52,782. yakikirirako esaza lya Lubaga North mu lukiiko lwa Uganda nga'akyali mukibiina kya Forum for democratic change(FDC) okuva 2006 okutusa 2010.
Bamuzalira Nakuru mu Kenya nga 30 Musenene 1955. kitaawe ye George Wilson Kamya, ate mama we ye Margaret Wairimu Kamya, omuna Kenya. Beti yali wa'kuna mubaana mwenda. mu 1961, nga Beti alina emyaka mukaga, famile ye yakomawo mu Uganda.
Yasomera McKay memorial school mu kamapala ne St. Hellens primary school mu bugwanjuba bwa Yuganda. Yagenda Wanyange Girls school weyasomera siniya esoka paaka ku yokuna namala nagenda Kings college Budo weyasomera siniya yo'kutaano neyo'mukaga weyava nayingira Setendekero ye Makerere okusoma ebyobusubuzi nobutaale.
Obumanyirivu Bwe.
mu myaka gye' 80 , Yayingira Uganda Leather and Tanning Industries Limited mu Jinja mu kitongole ekinnonya akatale , gye'yakolela okutusa 1988. yayingira Nyanza Textiles Industries Limited, nakolerayo nga akulira ebyokunonya akatale okutusa 1992. 
okuva 1996 okutusa 1999, yakola nga omukulu wakabondo akanonya akatale ku Uganda Breweries Limited mu Port Bell, okuva 1999 okutusa 2004, yali akulira Uganda Wildlife Education Centre (UWEC) mu Entebbe abangi gyebamanyi nga zoo, esangibwa kumpi ne Lake Victoria.
mumakati ga 2001 ne 2004, bweyali akyakola ku UWEC, yafuka mutongole mu kibiina kya Reform Agenda, ekyamala nekivamu ekibiina kyebyobufuzi ekya Forum for Democratic Change(FDC). okuva 2005 okutusa 2010, Yawereza ngo'mukungu owenjawulo owo'mukulembeze wa FDC Kizza Besigye. Yawereza ngomubaka wa Lubaga north ku kakonge ka FDC. mu Gatonya wa 2010, ya'yabulira FDC nakolawo Uganda Federal Alliance(UFA) nafuuka omukulembeze wakyo.
Okulondebwa kubwa Minista.
Nga 6 Sebo aseka 2016, yalondebwa nga Minista omugya owa Kampala Capital City Authority. mu'kukyusa kwaba minista okwaliwop nga 14 Ntenvu 2019, yalondebwa nga minista we'byetaaka, amayumba ne'nkulakulana y'ebibuga, kyeyakyusa ne Betty Amongi, eyamudira mubigere ku Kampala Capital City Authority.
Obulamu bwe.
Kamya yali mukyala wa Spencer Turwomwe eyali omusilikale mumagye ga Yuganda eyafa mu 2003. balina wamu abaana mukaga.

Hellen Obura:
Hellen Abulu Obura, muna Yuganda omulamuzi mu Kooti ejulirwamu, Kooti eno yedirilira Kooti ensukulumu mu'gwanga, era yekola nga Kooti ya semateeka. nga tana'londebwa mu Kooti ejulira, Yawereza ng'omulamuzi mu Kooti enkulu eya Yuganda.
Ebyafayo n'obuyigirize bwe.
Yazalibwa era yasomeera mu Yuganda nga tanagenda ku Yunivasite. Yafuna digulli mu By'amateeka okuv'e Makerere University, eno ye Univasite esinga obukaade nobuganzi mu gwanga. yafuna dipuloma mu kwegeza mu by'okulamula okuva ku Law Development Centre mu Kampala. okumala emyaka kumi na musanvu okuva 1993 kutusa lwe bamulonda ng'omulamuzi mu Kooti enkulu eya Yuganda, omulamuzi Obura yali awereza mu minisitule yeby'obwenkanya nensonga za semateeka. yali muwandiisi w'akakiiko keby'amateeka mukaseera bweyayitiibwa okufuka omulamuzi mu mwaka gwa 2010.
Gyenvudde'we mu byobulamuzi.
Hellen Obura yawereza ng'omulamuzi mu Kooti enkuulu eya Yuganda okuva mu mukulukusa bitungotungo owa 2010, kutusa mutunda 2015 bweyalondebwa okweyunga ku Kooti ejulirwamu

Angelline Osegge:
Angelline Asio Osegge, Bangi gwebamanyi nga Angelina Osege (Yazaalibwa nga 8 ntenvu mu mwaka gwa 1969) muna'byabufuzi muna Yuganda, kaakano akoola ng'omubaaka omukyala akikiilira Disitulikiti ya Soroti ku kakonge ka Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) mu palamenti ya Yuganda ey'ekumi (2016 to 2021). Ye sentebe w'akakiiko akalondola enkozesa ya sente z'egwanga mu palamenti yegwanga.
Gyenvudde wamu n'okusooma kwe.
Bamuzaala nga ye "Angelline Asio", nga 12 muwakanya 1969, mu Soroti District, mubu'vaanjuba bwa Yuganda . Yasoomera mu masoomero g'omukyalo nga tanayingira Yunivasite. mu 1991 yaweebwa ekiffo ekweyunga ku Makerere University Ssetendekero asinga obukaade nobuganzi mu gwanga, ya yambala digulli ya Bachelor of Arts mu Social Science mu mwaka gwa 1994. mu mwaaka gwa 2007, ya'yingira Ssetendekero Uganda Martyrs University, weya'yambalira Dipuloma ya Diploma in Microfinance. Osege mufumbo.
Obukugu bwe.
Nga tanayingira byabufuzi, yakoola ng'omukoozi wenkulakulana mubitundu abantu mwebabeera kulwa World Vision International atte yakoola nga Credit Officer ku Pride Microfinance Limited lino ttelekero lya sente e'ntono elya gavumenti ngaliwereza abantu ba'wansi abatasobola kwewoola sente mu ma'terekero ga sente ama'nene. Ng'akola wano, yakuzibwa okutuuka ku daala ly'akulila etaabi ly'eterekero lino. okuva 2006 okutusa 2008, yeyali omukulu owokuntiiko owa "Local Enterprise Assistance Programme", ekiibina mu Yuganda ekitakolera magooba (non-profit organization)
Gyenvude'we mu by'obufuzi.
Osegge yasooka kulondebwa okuyingira olukiiko lwa Yuganda (Ugandan parliament) mu 2011, ku kakonge k'ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekiwakanya Gavumenti ekya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC). mu 2016 yesigaliza ekifo kye mu palamenti. ngali mu palamenti, yawereza nga sentebe w'akakiiko akalondola enkozesa ya sente z'egwanga. okuva mutunda wa 2016, akola ng'adilira senteebe wekitongole ky'Africa ekigatta obukiiko obulondola enkozesa ya sente z'egwanga (African Organisation of Public Accounts Committees. AFROPAC).
Ebyenyamiiza ku'ye.
Osege mwogezi owenkizo atte owamanyi ow'kibinja ekiwakanya Gavumenti mu palamenti. mu muwakanya wa 2013,Jacob Oulanyah adirila omukubaganya wolukiiko lwa uganda yagoba Osege mu palamenti okumaala enaku satu kulw'okusingayo okuyombera mu palamenti. Mu mutunda wa 2017, nga banjula enongosereza mu semateeka ku ky'okuja ekoomo ku myaka gyomukulembeze wegwanga, Angeline Osege yakosebwa mu kulwana okwaliwo mu kisenge kya palamenti natwalibwa mudwaliro.

Cornelia Sabiiti:
Cornelia Sabiti Kakooza, abalala gwe bamanyi nga (née Cornelia Sabiiti),Muna'Yuganda eyasooma amateeka era mulamuzi mu Kooti enkulu eya Yuganda. yalondebwa omukulembeze wegwanga Yoweri Museveni okweyunga ku Kooti eno, nga 8 Mukutulansanja 2018.
Ebyafayo ne'byokusooma kwe.
Yatikirwa ku tendekero ly'amateeka e' Makerere University, Ssetendekero asinga obunene nobuganzi mu gwanga, ngayambala digulli mu mateeka emanyikidwa nga (Bachelor of Laws) mu lungereza. , omwaka ogwadako, yawebwa dipuloma mu kwegeza mu ku'lamula nokuteeka munkola esoomo lyamateeka mulungereza kyebayita (Diploma in Legal Practice) okuva ku tendekero elibangula banamateeka elya (Law Development Centre), mu Kampala. alina ne Dipuloma eyokubiri mu kugula ebintu mu'lungereza gyebayita (Postgraduate Diploma in Procurement), gyeyasomera ku kitongole ekigatta abakozi munsi yoona (International Labour Organization), ku tendekero lyayo e' Turin mu Italy.
Gyenvudde'we mukukoola.
Mu myaka egyasooka ng'amaze okusooma, Ms Sabiiti yakola nga muna'mateeka omuwi wamagezi ow'ekitongole kya gavumenti ekivunanizibwa ku kugula nokutunda ebintu byomuwi w'omusoolo ekimanyikidwa nga (Public Procurement and Disposal of Public Assets Authority (PPDA), gyeya'kolera okumula emyaka musanvu. Yamala nalondebwa okukola ng'omuwandisi wa kampuni era mukiseera kyekiimu Nankuulu avunanizibwa ku kugoberela amateeka mu bulongoofu bwago ku PPDA (company secretary and director of Legal and Compliance at the PPDA). mu mugulansigo wa 2011, yalondebwa ku kisanja ekyemyaka omukaga okukulira ekingole kya Gavumenti kino. Ngali kumulimu guno, yafumintiriza nyo ku kulongosa engeli gavumenti gyegulamu ebintu nga mu buli ndagano yogula ebintu, wakiiri ebitundu asaatu kubuli ki'kumi biwebwa ebitongole ebi'nansi. Mu 2017, Sabiiti yasalawo obutaza bugya endagano ye ne PPDA nasalawo adeyo mu mulimu gw'okuwoza amateeka.
Mu 2018, Cornelia Sabiiti yalondebwa okweyunga ku Kooti enkulu eya Yuganda, mu taabi lya Kooti eno eri'kwasaganya eby'etaaka.

Barbara Nekesa Oundo:
Barbara Nekesa Oundo Munabyabufuzi era Omukungu, akola ng'omukulu wekitebe ekikulu ekya Yuganda mu South Africa, ekisangibwa e' Pretoria. Mukifo kyekiimu, akiikirira Uganda mu South Africa, wamu namawanga agali mu maserengeta nga semazinga wa Afirika aga Botswana, Namibia, Lesotho ne Swaziland.
Yakolako nga minista w'ensonga za Karamoja, ekifo kino yakiyingiramu nga 27 muzigo 2011. yadda mubigere bya Janet Museveni, . Oundo Yawerezako ng'omubaka omukyala owa Disitulikit wa Busia mu palamenti eyomwenda (2011 to 2016).
Ebyafayo bye N'okusooma.
Yazalibwa mu Disitulikit wa Busia mu buva'njuba bwa Uganda nga 06 sebo aseka 1984, maama we ye Mary Hadudu, maama w'abawala mwenda n'omulenzi omuo; Edward Wabudi, omukulembeze ku'kyalo. Yasomera Bubulo Girls School mu Mbale okuva ku siniya esooka paaka kuyo kuna (O-Level) ne Mbogo High School mu Kawempe gye yasooera siniya ey'okutaano neyo'mukaaga (A-Level). mu 2009, yatikirwa diguli e' Makerere University mu nkozesa y'abantu mulungereza gye bayiita (Bachelor of Human Resources Management).
Gyenvude we n'amaaka.
Mu 2007, Nekesa yafumbirwa Charles Oundo, omukungu wa Uganda munsi ez'ebweru gweyali yasisinkana ng'akyasoomera Makerere Univasity era balina abaana babiri. mu 2011, yesimbawo era nawangula akalulu k'omubaka omukyala owa Busia ngali ku kakonge ka National Resistance Movement (NRM). Mu muzigo wa 2011, yalondebwa okubera minista wensonga za karamoja ng'azilopela minista w'ensonga za karamoja owokuntiko Janet Museveni.
Mu 2017, ya'yawukana ne bba Charles Oundo era mu ntenvu wa 2018, yafumbirwa Hajji Suleiman Lumolo Mafabi, omusubuzi akolera e' Mbale, mu buva'njuba bwa Yuganda. Omukolo gwabela mu maka gabwe e Muyenga mu Kampala.
Okufirwa ebifo byobufuzi.
Mu musenene wa 2015 mu kalulu ko'kusunsula anakwatira NRM bendera mu kalulu ka boona, Oundo yafuna obululu 28,750 atte eyamudirira, Nina Irene Nekesa Wandera, yafuna obulului 25,443. Wandera yatwala okwemulugunya omukakiiko k'ebyokulonda nga agamba nti Oundo yagula mu bu'kyamu.
Mu kalulu k'okulonda ababaka mu 2016, Oundo yawangulwa Jane Nabulindo Kwoba, ng'ono yesimbawo nga talina kibiina. mu lukalala lwa ba'minista aba'gya olwafulumizibwa wofisi yo'mukulembeze we gwanga nga 6 sebo aseka 2016, Oundo yali talimu.

Evelyn Anite:
Evelyn Anite Kajik, bangi gwebamanyi nga Evelyn Anite, muna'mawulire era muna'byafuzi omuna'Yuganda. Ye minista we'gwanga ow'ebyensimbi, okusiga sente nokuza ebintu mubwa nanyiini, mulungereza gwe bayita (State Minister of Finance for Investment and Privatization) mu Yuganda okuva nga 6 sebo aseka 2016. Yawerezako nga minista w'abavubuka., Yalondebwa mu'kifo kino nga 1 mugulansigo 2015 bwe'yadda mubigere bya Ronald Kibuule, gwe'balonda okubela minista we'gwanga ow'ebyamazi. Anite era akola ng'omubaaka wa Koboko Municipality, mu bugwa'njuba bw'omugaa Nile mu mambuka ga Yuganda.
Ebyafaayo n'okusoma kwe.
Anite yazalibwa nga 11 musenene 1984, mu kyalo Adakado ekisangibwa mu Koboko District, kitaawe ye Steven Dravu, omukoozi wa Gavumenti atte maama we ye Sarah Wokoru Dravu, ali mu'byobusubuzi .
Anite asibuka mu bana'uganda abogeera olulimi olu Lugbara era ekifo kyabwe kiyingira ne'mu gwanga lya Democratic Republic of the Congo. Ayogera bulungi olu'Lugbara nolu'Kakwa. Yasoomera Arua Hill Primary School mu kusooma kwe okwa'sooka, Nasoomera ne Saint Mary's Ediofe Secondary School okuva mu siniya esooka okutusa ku y'okuna. Yamala nada Muni Girls' Secondary School, gyeya'somera siniya ey'okutaano kutusa ku y'omukaga. Alina diguli mu by'amawulire gye yasomera Uganda Christian University mu 2008.
Mu Gatonnya wa 2018, Anite yawebwa ekifo okusomera Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy eya Tufts University, mu Medford, Massachusetts, mu Amerika okusooma diguli eyokubiri mu nkolagana z'amawanga, mulungereza gyebayita (Master in International Relations and Diplomacy Programme). Mu Kasambula wa 2019, Anite yatikirwa diguli okuva mu Tufts University ng'amaliliza okutukiriza byona ebyetagisa okutikirwa diguli eno.
Gyenvudde'we mu kukola.
Nga yakamaliliza siniya yomukaga mu 2005, Anite yatandika okukola ng'omukozi wa radio mu Arua okutusa mu 2007 okuva 2006 okutusa 2010 yali akola ku Uganda Broadcasting Corporation (UBC) mu Kampala ekibuga ekikulu mu Yuganda. okuva 2008 okutusa 2010, yali akola ku Uganda Media Centre aga kiyambi w'ensonga za buli'omu kulw'enkolagana z'amawanga (Public Affairs Assistant for International Relations). Mu 2011, yesimbawo ku ntebe y'akiikilira abavubuka bomu'mambuka ga Yuganda. Yasinga abantu mwenda okwediza ekifo kino. Nga 6 sebo aseka 2016, yalondebwa kubwa minista bw'egwanga kulw'okusiga sente n'okuteka ebintu mubwa nanyini.
Ebitakwatagana.
Mu 2014, Anite yawanyisiganya ebiganbo ne Margaret Baba Diri ng'ono agamba nti Anite ayagala okutwala entebbe ye' mu Koboko. Baba Diri yayongera nagamba nti Anite mugwira ayagala okusiga oku'buzabuza mu Koboko ne NRM. Ng'amudamu, Anite yagamba nti anonya kalulu mu Koboko okuyamba ku maama we Baba Diri omugugu gw'ebyobufuzi omuziito".
mu mukutula nsanja wa 2014, mu kefubo k'ababaka ba NRM, ng'akalulu ka 2016 kabinda binda, Anite yaleta ekiiteso ekiirangilia President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni ng'anakwatira NRM bendera mu kalulu ka boona. Ekiteeso kino ekyagya nekimanyikibwa nga Ekiteeso kya Kyankwanzi ( Kyankwanzi Resolution), kyasanga akaseera akazibu mu ku'kyiyisawo.
Ng'alaga lwaki awagilla okukyusa mu semateeka ku kugya ekomo ku myaka y'omukulembeze w'egwanga, Anite yagamba nti yali afunye aba'mutisatisa oku'muta. Kino kyawaliliza Gavumenti okumuwa abamu'kuuma. Yayitta babaka bane abali bawakanya ebago lino abasiru abeyagaliza.
Ng'ayogera mu kuwagira okugya ekomo ku' myaka, Anite yagamba nti NRM elina ababaka bangyi N'amagye gegwanga ku lusegere lwabwe. Amagye ga Yuganda aga UPDF gegana bino ebyayogerwa.
Mu baluwa ng'egenda wa President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni mu Kasambula wa 2018, "Hamilton Telecom" ya'wababira Anite olw'okuvola ekitongole ky'ebyempulizigana kino oku'kiremesa oku'gula Uganda Telecom (UTL).
Mu kasmbula wa 2018, kigambibwa nti Anite yali adduse mu gwanga, olw'okunonyelezebwako ebigambibwa nti yali asabye enguzi ya buwumbi 28 obwa Yuganda ku ba'musiga nsigo abawarabu. naye yamala natwala olupapula lwamawulire luno mu mbuga z'amateeka olw'okumuwandikako ebiwandiko ebikyamu.
Nga bamuwadde ekifo ku Tufts University, ekitundu kya bana Yuganda aba'beera mu Amerika batandiika okwe'mulugunya n'okwekalakasa nga basaba okuwebwa'kwe ekifo mu Yunivasite eno kusazibwemu.
Baagamba nti Amerika telina kuwa bubudamo abbali benguzi nga bekweka mu by'okwongerayo emisoomo. Tufts University yagaana okusaba kuno ng'egamba nti Anite tewali nsobi gyeyali akoze. Nebongelako nti ng'omusomi ku someero ly'amateeka, eddembe lye lilina okukumibwa mu.
Obulamu bwe.
Anite yafumbirwa Allan Kajik, eyali akiikirira omukulembeze w'egwanga mu Kampala. Bagatibwa mu 2011 era balina abaana babiiri.

Edith Mary Bataringaya:
Edith Mary Bataringaya "Kaijuka" (1929–1977) yali Munnayuganda ow'ettutumu, omulwanirizi w'eddembe ly'ebyobufuzi ate munnabyabufuzi omuggumivu nga Uganda emaze okufuna obwetwaze. Yali omu ku baatandikawo ebibiina ebigatta abakyala ebya (Ugandan Women's Union) ne (Uganda Council of Women) ng'akolagana ne Rhoda Kalema wamu ne Theresa Mbire. Yafumbirwa Basil Kiiza Bataringaya nga naye munnabyabufuzi omukuukuutivu mu Uganda naddala mu gy'enkaaga.
Entandikwa y'obulamu bwe.
Edith Mary Kaijuka yazaalibwa mu 1929 e Kabale, ekibuga ekisangibwa mu Bugwanjuba bwa Uganda. Kitaawe ye yali Reverend Kaijuka, Omubuulizi w'enjiri mu Kkanisa ya Uganda (Anglican)era omusomesa mu kaalo ku Kasozi Bugongi.
Gyenvudde we mu byobufuzi.
Edith Mary Kaijuka yafumbirwa Basil Kiiza Bataringaya, mutabani wa Marko Kiiza eyaliko omukulu w'Essaza lya Bunyaruguru, kwe kukyusa erinnya lye ne lifuuka Edith Mary Bataringaya. Mu budde bwe baafumbiriganwamu, Basil Kiiza Bataringaya yali akyasoma kkoosi ya Busomesa mu Makerere University - Kampala Uganda.
Basil Kiiza Bataringaya yafuuka munnabyabufuzi omuganzi mu Uganda mu kiseera eky'amangu. Bataringaya yeesimbawo ng'Omubaka mu kibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekya DP (Democratic Party of Uganda) ku ntebe y'okukiikirira Disitulikiti ya Ankole mu Paalamenti ya Uganda mu Gavumenti ey'akabanga ey'okukyusa obukulembeze okuva mu Bangereza okudda mu Bannansi mu kalulu ka bonna akaasooka mu Uganda akaaliwo mu 1961. Yafuuka akulira oludda oluvuganya Gavumenti mu Gavumenti eyali ekulirwa Apollo Milton Obote. Basil Kiiza Bataringaya yasala eddiiro n'ava mu DP n'adda mu kibiina kya Apollo Milton Obote ekya UPC (Uganda People's Congress) nga bali mu Paalamenti. Ye yali munnabyabufuzi ow'embavu eyasooka okwabulira ekibiina kye eky'ebyobufuzi mu byafayo bya Uganda. Basil Kiiza Bataringaya yafuuka Minisita ow'esonga ez'omunda era n'ayanguwa okufuuka omu ku basajja Apollo Milton Obote eyali Ssaabaminisita wa Uganda be yali yeesiga ennyo era yafuuka omu ku abo abaawanga Obote amagezi n'afuuka omu ku Baminisita ab'amaanyi mu Gavumenti ya Obote.
Edith Mary Bataringaya yafuuka wankizo mu Gavumenti ya Apollo Milton Obote nga bba Basil Kiiza Bataringaya amaze okweyunga ku UPC n'okubeera Minista w'ensonga ezoomunda. Yatambulanga ne bba era ng'ayogera ng'omukulu w'akakiiko k'abakyala ba Uganda (Uganda Council of Women) ng'ali n'abakungu b'amawanga ag'ebweru. Mu lumu ku ng'endo ezijjukirwa ez'amaanyi, yagendako mu Amerika n'asisinkana n'ababaka b'ensonga ez'omunda mu Amerika era n'akyalako ne mu Disneyland.
Okulwanilila edembe.
Edith Mary Bataringaya yali mulwanirizi wa ddembe lya byabufuzi ow'amaanyi. Bataringaya Yatandikawo ekiibina ekigatta abakyala ba Uganda wamu n'akakiiko k'abakyala ba Uganda ng'ali wamu ne Rhoda Kalema ne Theresa Mbire. mu 1960, wansi w'obukulembeze bwa Bataringaya, akakiiko k'abakyala ba Uganda kayisa ekiiteso nga kakubiriza nti amaateka goona agakwata ku bufumbo, okwawukana, n'okusikira ebintu gawandikibwe era gabunne egwanga lyonna nga eddala erisooka mu kutereza amateeka agaliwo kati nag'enono. Mu myaka kumi egyasooka nga Yuganda emaze okwenunula, akakkiko k'abakyala kano kayongera amanyi mu kusaba nti waberewo enongosereza mu mateeka nga gakiriza abakyala boona okubera n'enintu wamu nokusigaza abaana babwe bwe'waberewo engyawukana mu'maaka. Omulimo gw'akiiko k'abakyala kano wansi w'obukulemmbeze bwa Bataringaya gwaletawo enkyukakyuka mu mateeka g'okwawukana mu maaka mu Yuganda, ekyaleeta okuwandika amateeka gano mu bulungi bwago nga gayisa omukaazi n'omusaja kyenkanyii nga wabadewo okwawukana.
Okufa kwe.
Bba wa Edith Mary Bataringaya, Basil Kiiza Bataringaya yakulemberamu okugezako okukwatta n'okusiba Idi Amin, ekyamufula omu ku bana'Yuganda abasooka okukwatibwa gavumenti ya Amin empya. ngali mu komeera e' Makindye, Bataringaya yatulugunyizibwa. bamala nebamusindika mu kibuga ky'embarara we bamutematemera ngali mulamu. Omutwe gwe baguteka ku kiiti nebagwetoloza mu kibuga Mbarara nebamala nebagutwala mu nkambi y'amagye eya Mbarara.
Edith Mary Bataringaya yafuka namwandu nakuza abaana babwe munana yeka ku taaka lyabwe e' Mbarara, nafuka omuntu Amin gweyali yekengera. Bataringaya naye yamala natiibwa mu 1977 mu kiita bantu kya Amin ekyadako, kigambibwa nti yatiibwa Juma Bashir, ayali afuga ekitundu kya bugwa'njuba bwa Yuganda mu gavumenti ya Amin. Omubiri gwe basanga nga bagwokyeza nga bagusude mu taaka lya Bataringaya mu Mbarara. yaleka bamulekwa munana abakuzibwa kooja wabwe, Dr. Emmanuel Kaijuka.
Obulamu bwe.
Edith Mary ne Basil Kiiza Bataringaya balina abaana munana, Dr. Geoffrey Basil Bataringaya, Basil Bataringaya Jr., Grace Bataringaya, Kenneth Bataringaya, Jackie Bataringaya, Janet Bataringaya, Juliet Wavamunno, ne Dr. Aisha Bataringaya-Ssekalala. Abaana bano bafuka ba mulekwa mu 1977 ng'abazadde babwe bamazze okutiibwa Amin. mwanyina wa Edith Mary Bataringaya, Dr. Emmanuel Kaijuka eyamala nafuka omukulu wakakiiko k'ebyobulamu (Ugandan Commissioner of Health), yeyakuza abaana bano.
Mu 1985, abaana badamu nebasisinkana omulundi ogwasooka kuva maama wabwe bweyafa. Abaana bano bamala nebafuna emirimu n'obulamu obusanyusa: Grace Bataringaya musaawo w'ebisoolo era ategeka ebivulu, Kenneth Bataringaya musubuzi era yalabilila emaali y'amaka gabwe, Jackie Bataringaya musawo ng'akola nekitongole kya Action Aid mu Harare, Zimbabwe, Janet Bataringaya akola by'obulamu bya boona mu Boston, Massachusetts mu Amerika, Juliet Wavamunno (née Bataringaya) musawo era akola nekitongole ky'ensi eky'ebyobulamu (World Health Organization), atte Aisha Bataringaya-Ssekalala (née Bataringaya) asoomera ku University of Western Cape mu South Africa.
Ebyenzikiriza/ Ebyeddini.
Bataringaya yali Mukatoliki ate yali yeenyigira mu mirimu gya Eklezia. Taata wa Bataringaya yali musomesa mu kanisa ya Yuganda atte ne bataringaya bamukuliza mu kanisa. Bba wa Bataringaya yasooka kuba musomesa mu ssomero ly'Abakatoliki mu Ankole, era yali mulambuzi wa masomero mu Ankole nga tannayingira byabufuzi. Edith Mary Bataringaya yafuuka Mukatuliki ng'amaze okufumbirwa Basil Kiiza Bataringaya ate yakola n'ebitongole by'Abakatoliki mu bulamu bwe obw'okukola bwonna, ali ne ku lukalala lw'emikwano gy'ebitongole by'Abakatoliki mu Mbarara.

Anita Among:
Anita Among 
Yazaalibwa nga 23 Museenene (Gwakuminagumu) 1973
Obuzaale Munnayuganda 
Obutuuze mutuuze w'e Uganda
Anita Annet Among (yazaalibwa nga 23 Museenene 1973) Munnayuganda omubalirizi w'ebitabo, munnamateeka era munnabyabufuzi, [./Https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parliament%20of%20Uganda Mubaka mu Palamenti] ng'akiikirira Disitulikiti y'e Bukedea ng'omubaka omukazi mu Palamenti ey'ekkumi, (2016–2021).
Gy'ava n'ebyensoma bye.
Among yazaalibwa mu [./Https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bukedea%20District Disitulikiti y'e Bukedea] nga 23 Museenene, 1973. Yasomera mu masomero g'ebyalo by'eyo ku ddaala era Pulayimale ne Siniya. Yatikkirwa ddiguli ye esooka eya Bachelor of Business Administration, ku [./Https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Makerere%20University Makerere University], mu 2005.Mu 2008, yatikkirwa ddiguli ye eyookubiri eya Master of Business Administration, era okuva ku Makerere University.
Mu 2018, Among yatikkirwa ddiguli mu Mateeka eya Bachelor of Laws okuva ku [./Https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kampala%20International%20University Kampala International University]. Mu kiseera ekyo yali akola ku biwandiiko bye okukola nga omubalirizi w'ebitabo ajjudde.
Emirimu gye nga tannayingira byabufuzi.
Okuva mu 1998 okutuuka mu 2006, Among yali akolera mu Centenary Bank, emu ku bbanka z'ebyobusuubuzi ezisinga obunene mu ggwanga. Mu kiseera we yaviirayo mu 2006, yali alinnye amadaala ng'atuuse ku bwamaneja w'ettabi lya bbanka. Mu myaka ekkumi egyakulembera okulondebwa kwe mu Palamenti, yakolanga gwa busomesa mu ssomo ly'okubalirira ebitabo ku Kampala International University.
Mu nsiike ey'ebyobufuzi.
Mu kuvuganya ku ky'omubaka omukazi mu palamenti owa Disitulikiti y'e Bukedea nga yaakatondebwawo, mu 2007 ne 2011, Among yawangulwanga [./Https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rose%20Akol Rose Akol] ow'ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekya National Resistance Movement 
Among, munna ludda aluvuganya omugundiivu mu kibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change , mu 2016 yeesimbawo ku bwannamunigina n'awangula.
Ebirala ku Among.
Mu Palamenti ey'ekkumi, Mukyala Among aweereza ng'omumyuka wa ssentebe w'akakiiko ka palamenti akanoonyereza ku bitongole bya Gavumenti aka (COSASE).

Radoje Domanović:
Radoje Domanović (Mukutulansanja 16, 1873 – Muwakanya 17, 1908) yali muwandiisi omu Sabiya, munnamawulireera omusomesa, eyasingibwa okumanyikibwa olw’engero ze ezisomooza.
Ebirombojja obulamu bwe.
Radoje Domanović yazaalibwa mu kyaalo ekya Ovsište mu masekati g’ggwangalya Sabiya. Yatikkibwamu ssomero eKragujevac, mu Fakaluteya Philosophy ku ttendekero lya Belgrade Univasite, gyeyali asomera olulimi oluSabiya n’emisomo gy’ebyafaayo. Okuva mu 1895 mpaka mu 1898 Domanović yakola nga omusomesa w’olulimi OluSabiya n’ebyafaayo mu maserengeta ga Sabiya.
Mu biseera byeyali omusomesa, yatandika okuwandika engero ze ez’obuliwo. Mu biseera byeyali agolagana n’ab’oludda oluvuganyi, yafiirwa omulimu gwe era nagenda mu Belgrade n’amaka ge. Mu Belgrade, weyatandikira ogw’obunnamawulire mu bibinja by’obufuzi eby’enjawulo nga abawandiikira ebitabo eby’obufuzi nengero ezisomooza era nga omwo mweyayanjaliza obulyake n’obulimba obw’abakulembeze. Radoje yatandika okumanyibwa ennyo weyatongoza engero ze eziyitibwa “Omukulembeze” (1901) ne “Stradija“ (1902). Yamanyikibwa nyo nga omu ku bawakanya ekisinde ekya Obrenović n’obukulembeze bwabwe, olwensonga nti yali teyeluma ntama.
Oluvanyuma lw’amaje okuwamba entebe mu 1903, Domanović yawebwa obubaka okuva mu kitongole eky’eby’okusoma, wamu nne gavumenti empya, era nga bamukiliza okugenda mu Girimane okusoma eby’obukugu okumala omwaka gumu era nga yagumalira mu kibuga kya Munich. Bweyadda eSabiya, eky’ennaku enyingi Radoje teyasanga nkyukakyuka yonna mu ggwanga. Awo weyatandikira okuwandika akatabo ke ak’obufuzi akayitidwa, “Stradija”, nga omwo mweyavumilira obutalibwenkanya ne demokulase ennafu eya gavumenti empya, nga wadde okuwandika kwe teyakussaamu maanyi nga eddako.
Radoje Domanović yafa nga ebulayo dakika asatu okuwela mukaaga ogw’ekiro mu mwezi gwa Muwakanya 17, 1908, ku myaka gya 35, oluvanyuma lw’ebbanga nga alwanyisa ekirwadde kya lubyamira n’akafuba. Ebitabo ebilala byeyawandika ebitaali bitongoze byabulira mu ssematalo w’ensi yonna eyasooka. Olw’omulimu gweyakola ogw’okulwanyisa obulyake, n’amagezi ge, ajjukibwa nga omuwandiisi omuSabiya asingayo mu mulembe ogw’amakumi abiri.
Ebiwandiko.
Ebimu ku biwandiko bya Radoje Domanović biteredwa wano wammanga:
Website.
Ebiwandiko bya Radoje Domanović mubumalirivu

Sarah Najjuma:
Sarah Najjuma, (eyazaalibwa nga 23, 1978), munnayuganda, munnabyabufuzi ate era musomesa omutendeke. Mubaka omukyala ow'ekitundu kya Nakaseke mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga olukulu era nga yajjira ku kkaadi y'ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM). Yalondebwa mu kifo kino mu Gwokubiri gwa 2016. Najjuma ye yaddira Rose Namayanja mu kifo ky'omubaka wa ddisitulikiti ya Nakaseke eyaweereza mu kifo ekyo okuva mu Gwokutaano 2006 okutuuka mu Gwokubiri 2016. 
Background and education.
Mu 1995 yatuula ebibuuzo by'ekibiina eky'omusanvu ku ssomero erimanyiddwa nga Nalinya Lwantale Primary School. Yasomerako ku Nabisunsa Girls School era mu mwaka gwa 1996 n'afuna Uganda Certificate of Education. Mu 1998, yafuna Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education era ku Nabisunsa Girls School. Alina ddiguli mu busomesa (Bachelor of Arts in education), gye yafunira ku Makerere University. Mu ngeri y'emu, alina Master of Arts in Development Studies okuva ku Nkumba University. Mu mwaka gwa 2011, Najjuma yafuna Postgraduate Diploma in Public Administration and Management okuva ku Nkumba University.
Emirimu gy'akoze.
Wakati wa 2004 ne 2005, yaweerezaako ng'Oweebyenkulaakulana mu ddisitulikiti ya Luweero. 
Okuva mu 2005 okutuuka mu 2007, Najjuma yaweereza ng'omukungu w'ebyenkulaakulana mu ddisitulikiti ya Nakaseke. 
Okuva mu 2007 okutuuka mu 2015, Najjuma ye yali ssaabakungu w'ebyenkulaakulana mu ddisitulikiti ya Nakaseke
Okuva mu 2016 okutuusa kaakano, Najjuma mubaka mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga.
Obulamu bwe.
Najjuma mukyala mufumbo era ng'ava mu maka agatambulira ku nnono y'obusiraamu. Ayagala nnyo netball era ng'amuzannya bw'abeera mu kaseera ke ek'eddembe.

Agnes Taaka:
Agnes Taaka (oluusi amanyiddwa nga Taaka Agnes Wejuli) yazaalibwa nga 3 Ogwokuna 1980. Taaka mukyala munnayuganda, munnabyabufuzi ate era munnamateeka. Ye mubaka omukyala akiikirira ddisitulikiti ya Bugiri mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga (Uganda). Aweerezza mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga olw'omwenda. olw'ekkumi n'olw'ekkuminoolumu ng'omubaka mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga ng'ali wansi w'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza, National Resistance Movement. Ye mubaka omukyala omulonde okukiikirira ddisitulikiti ya Bugiri okuva 2021-2026 oluvannyuma lw'okulangirirwa ng'eyanywa mu banne akendo mu kalulu k'okulonda ababaka b'olukiiko lw'eggwanga akaakakomekkerezebwa mu Uganda.
Okusoma kwe n'ebimukwatako.
Mukyala mufumbo. Mu mawaka gwa 1992, Taaka yatuula ebibuuzo ebimaliriza ekibiina eky'omusanvu ku Kigulu Girls Primary school. Bwe yava eyo yeeyunga ku Bukoyo Senior Secondary School gye yafunira Uganda Certificate of Education mu mwaka gwa 1996. Mu mwaka gwa 1999, Agnes yeeyunga ku ssomero lya Iganga Senior Secondary School n'afunirayo Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education (UACE). Mu 2004 yamaliriza ddiguli ya Bachelor of Arts in Social Sciences ku Makerere University. Ekyo nga kiwedde, yagenda ku Law Development Centre n'afuna ebbaluwa mu byamateeka (certificate in Law) mu mwaka gwa 2007.
Wakati wa 2006 ne 2014, Agnes yaweereza ng'omukungu w'ebyenkulaakulana mu disitulikiti ya Bugiri. Okuva mu 2014 okutuuka mu 2015, Taaka yaweereza nga ssaabakungu w'ebyenkulaakulana mu Bugiri Town Council. Okuva mu 2010 okutuuka mu 2012, yaweerezaako ng'omukulembeze w'eggombolola mu ddisitulikiti ya Bugiri. Mu kaseera kano y'akulira Taaka Agnes Wejuli Development Foundation.
Olugendo lw'ebyobufuzi.
Aweerezza ng'omubaka omukyala akiikirira ekitundu kya Bugiri mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga okuva mu 2016 okutuusa kaakano. Mu buweereza bwe ng'omubaka mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga, Agnes era aweerezza ku kakiiko k'ebyobulimi. Ayagala nyo netball, okuzina ate era nga munyiikivu mu kuluŋŋamya ebibiina by'enkulaakulana mu bitundu wamu n'abavubuka. Yeeyunga ku kibiina kya Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA) mu lukiiko lwe'ggwanga olw'ekkumi. Mu Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA), aweereza ku kakiiko akalafubana okutumbula ebyenfuna.

Florence Akiiki Asiimwe:
Florence Akiiki Asiimwe (eyazallibwa mu mwaka gwa 1980) mubaka omukyala omulonde akiikirira ddisitulikiti ya Masindi mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga (Uganda) olw'ekkuminoolulumu. Muyigisa ku ssettendekero ate era munnabyabufuzi wansi w'ekibiina ekirimu buyinza ekya National Resistance Movement.
Okusoma kwe n'ebimukwatako.
Asiimwe Florence Akiiki yazaalibwa ku kyalo ekimanyiddwa nga Namasenene village mu ddisitulikiti ya Luweero. Alina PhD mu Sociology gye yafunira ku University of Cape Town, Master of Arts in Development Studies gye yafunira ku Institute of Social Studies mu Hague, Netherlands ate era ng'alina obukugu mu kuteekerateekera ebibuga, okukomya obutabanguko n'okuzimba enkolaganamu bantu..Muyigisa mu Department of Sociology (Makerere University), muyigisa ow'akaseera obuseera ku University of Western Cape ate era nga munoonyereza ku Kyoto University.
Ebyobufuzi n'emirimu gy'akoze.
Yakulirako Rotary Club of Makerere Rainbow, aweereza nga mminisita w'embeera z'abantu mu bwakabaka bwa Bunyoro Kitara ate era ng'aweerezzaako nga munnakakiiko akaddukanya essomero lya Mary Reparatrix Secondly School ne Bombo Secondary School.

Dorcus Acen:
Dorcus Acen (oluusi amanyiddwa nga Dorcas Acen) munnayuganda, munnabyabufuzi era omubaka omukyala akiikirira ddisitulikiti ya Alebtong mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga. Yeesimbawokko ku kifo ky'omubaka omukyala akiikirira ddisitulikiti ya Alebtong mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga (Uganda) olw'ekkumi. Ku mulundi ogwo yali azze ku bwannamunigina naye n'awangulwa Christine Acen eyali ajjidde ku kkaadi y'ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement. Christine Acen yalondebwa mu mwakagwa 2016 ng'omubaka omukyala akiikirira Alebtong mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga. Christine yamaliriza siniya ey'omukaaga n'atandika okuddukanya emirimu gye.
Mu kalulu ka 2021, Dorcus Acen yajjira ku kkaadi y'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza ekya National Resistance Movement.Bwe yali anoonya akalulu yawaayo emmotoka za ambulence bbiri eri abantu b'omu kitundu kye zisobole okuyambako okutambuza abalwadde ababa bajuliddwa mu malwaliro amalala wamu n'okuyambako abantu be okufufuggza ekirwadde kya COVID-19. Mu ngeri y'emu, yawaayo akawunga n'ebijanjaalo eri bakateeyamba mu kitundu kye, abaakosebwa ennyo olw'omuggalo n'ebiragiro eby'enjawulo ebyayisibwa omukulembeze w'eggwanga mu kaweefube w'okufufuggaza ekirwadde kya COVID-19 mu ggwanga lyonna.
Emirimu gy'akoze.
Yakolerako ku GBV Prevention Network ng'omukulu akwasaganya ensonga ezeekuusa ku kukabasanyizibwa mu nsonga z'omukwano (sexual violence) wamu n'okulwanyisa okukabasanya eri abaana ab'obuwala. Mu 2018, yakolako nga Gender and Protection Adviser mu kitongole kya CARE International mu South Sudan nga muluŋŋamya omukulu mu nteekateeka zonna ezeekuusa ku ntondwa (Gender and Protection programme portfolio).

Mary Karooro Okurut:
Mary Busingye Karooro Okurut (yazalibwa nga 8 ntenvu 1954), bangi gwe bamanyi nga Mary Karooro Okurut, munna Yuganda omusomesa, omuwandisii wa bitaabo era muna byabufuzi. Ye minista w'emirimo mu offisi ya Kattikiro w'egwanga. Yalondebwa mw'ekyo ekifo nga 6 sesbo aseka 2016. Mabega'ko okuva nga 1 mugula nsigo 2015 okutusa nga 6 sebo aseka 2016, yali awereza nga minista w'ebyokwerinda bya Uganda ng'ada mu bigere bya, Wilson Muruli Mukasa, gwe baawa obwa minista bw'enkula wamu nensonga z'abantu ba buligyo ( Minister of Gender and Social Issues). Karooro ye yali mukifo kino nga Muruli Mukasa tana'kigendamu. Yakigendamu mu 2012 ng'adda mu bigeere bya Syda Bumba, eyali alekulide obwa minista. Mary Karoro Okurut era akkikirira abuntu ba Bushenyi Distulikiti nga omubaka w'abakyala mu palamenti ya Yuganda.
Gyenvude wamu N'okusooma kwe.
Bamuzalira mu Bushenyi District nga 8 ntenvu 1954. Yasoomera "Bweranyangi Primary School" ne Bweranyangi Girls' Senior Secondary School okutusa ku siniya eyokkuna. mu 1972, ng'alina emyaka 18, yayingira Trinity College Nabbingo okusooma siniya eyokutaano ne'yomukaga we'yava neyeyunga ku Makerere University, weyasoomera digulli mu ntonda n'okuwandika olulimi olungereza gyebayita (Bachelor of Arts in Literature (BA.Lit) nebamutikkira mu 1977. Oluvanyuma lwe myaka esatu mu 1981, bamutikkira diguli ey'okubiri mu ntonda nokuwandika olulimi olungereza (Master of Arts in Literature (MA.Lit), nga nayo yagisomeera Makerere University. Mu 1982, yayongerako dipuloma mu kusoommesa (Diploma in Education (Dip.Ed), okuva ku Univasite yemu.
Ebyafaayo mu ku'kola.
Mary Karooro Okurut yatandika nga omusommesa e' Makerere, mu kitongole kya Literature mu 1981 nga yakamaala diguli ye eyokubiri. yasigala mu busoomessa okutusa 1993. yafuna omulimu nga omuwandisi w'ebyamawulire (press secretary) w'omumyuka w'omukulembeze w'egwanga okuva 1994 okutusa 1966. wakati wa 1996 ne 1999 yawereza nga munna kakkiko w'akakkiko k'enkola y'ebyobuyigirize mu minisitule y'ebyobuyigirize bya Uganda. okuva 1999 kutusa 2004, yakola nga omuwandisi w'ebyamawulire mu woffisi y'omukulembeze w'egwanga. mu 2004 yayingira ebyobufuzi.
Emirimu gye egy'okuwandika obutabo.
Nga tanayingira byabufuzi, Okurut yali amanyidwa nyo kulw'okutumbula okuwandika mu Uganda ng'omuwandisi w'obutabo era eyatandikawo ekibbina kya Abakazzi ba Uganda abawandisi ekya (FEMRITE), ekitongole kino kyamanyikiibwa nyo mu mawanga g'ebweru era kyafuna n'omu ku bantu abali bawangudeko ekirabo kya Caine Prize, Arach Monica de Nyeko, akagero ke aka "Jambula Tree" lwe kawangula mu 2007.
Ebimu ku bitaabo Karooro Okurut by'awandise walimu obutaabo nga: (a) "The Invisible Weevil" (1998) (ISBN 9789970901029 ) ne (b) "The Official Wife" ( ISBN 9789970024018). yakola enongosereza wamu nokwongera okuwandika mu "A Woman's Voice" (1998) (ISBN 9789970901036 ), nga kano kataabo akagata obbugeero bw'abawandisi abakyala banna Yuganda.
gyenvudde we muby'obufuzi.
mu 2004, Mary Karooro Okurut yesimbawo ng'omubaka omukyala owa distulikiti ye Bushenyi ku kakonge ka National Resistance Movement. Yawangula era akkikilira distulikiti eno mu palamenti ya uganda paaka kati. yawerezako nga minista w'ebyamawulire n'okulungamya egwanga (Minister of Information and National Guidance) okuva mu Muzigo wa 2011 okutusa Muzigo wa 2013. mu kukyukyusa ba minista ba Gavumenti nga 1 Mugulansigo 2015, yalondebwa nga minista w'eby'okwerinda mu Uganda. era esaawa eno akola nga minista w'emirimo mu woffisi ya kattikiro w'egwanga 
ebimukwatako.
Mary K. Okurut yali mufumbo nga baawe ye Hon. Stanislaus Okurut okutusa nga 5 Kafuumuulampawo 2014 baawe lwe yaafa; bbalina abaana munana – abalenzi bataano n'abawala basatu. mu kulisitayo mu nzikiriza.

Winnie Byanyima:
Winifred Byanyima (yazalibwa nga 13 Gatonya 1959), Munna Uganda Yinginiya wenyonyi mulungereza gwe bayita (aeronautical engineer), munna byabufuzi era omukungu. Yy'akulira ekibiina ky'amawanga amagate ku siliimu (UNAIDS) okuva Musenene wa 2019.
Okuva Muzigo wa 2013 okutusa Musenene wa 2019, yali akulira ekiitingole kya Oxfam International. Yawerezako nga omukulu w'ekiibina ekitwala ensonga z'ekikula ky'omuntu mu sige ly'ekibinna ky'amawanga amagate ku byenkulakulana (director of the Gender Team in the Bureau for Development Policy at the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) okuva 2006.
Gyenvudde we.
Byanyima bamuzalira mu Mbarara District mu bugwa njuba bwa Uganda. Kitaawe y'omugenzi Boniface Byanyima, eya kulemberako ekibina ky'ebyobufuzi ekya DP (Democratic Party), maama we ye Gertrude Byanyima, eyali omusoomesa w'esomero eyafa mu musenene wa 2008. Winnie Byanyima yasomera Mount Saint Mary's College Namagunga mu Mukono District. yagenda mumaso natikirwa diguli mu bwa yinginiya bw'enyonyi okuva mu University of Manchester mu bungereza nafuka munna Uganda eyali asose okuba yinginiya w'enyonyi. Yamala nasooma ne diguli eyokubiri mu bwa Yinginiya bw'okukanika obukatiriza ebyuma o'kutereka amanyi (masters degree in mechanical engineering specializing in energy conservation) okuva mu Cranfield University.
Obukugu bwe.
Nga yakamaliliza okusooma obwa yinginiya bwenyonyi, Byanyima yakola nga yinginiya w'enyonyi (flight engineer) ow'ekitongole ky'enyonyi za Uganda ekya Uganda Airlines. Yoweri Museveni bweyatandika olutalo lw'obuyekera okuva 1981 paaka 1986, Byanyima yalekawo omulimu gwe nayingira obuyekera. Museveni ne Byanyima bali bakuzibwa wamu ewaaka w'omugenzi Boniface Byanyima eyasasulila okusooma kwa Museveni.
Museveni, Byanyima, ne bba wa byanyima Kizza Besigye boona bali bayekera ba National Resistance Army (NRA) mu lutalo. Byanyima wamu ne bba we' kati tebakyakolagana bulungi n'omukulembeze w'egwanga Museveni kulw'efuga bbi ekintu ekikotana n'ebyabatwala mu nsiko.
Nga NRA emaze okuwangula olutalo, Byanyima yawereza ng'omukungu wa Uganda mu gwanga lya France okuva 1989 okutusa 1994. Yamala nakomawo mu Uganda okwetaba mu byobufuzi bya Uganda. Yawereza ng'omubaka wa Constituent Assembly eyanonyereza n'okuwandika ebyatekebwa mu ssemateka wa Uganda owa 1995 . Yawereza ng'omubaka wa palamenti akkikirira Mbarara Municipality okuva 1994 okutusa 2004. yamala nalondebwa nga akulira ekitongole ekikola ku nsonga z'abakyala,ekikula kyomuntu wamu nenkulakulana (director of the Directorate of Women, Gender and Development) ku kiteebe ekikulu eky'omukago gwa Africa (African Union) mu Addis Ababa, Ethiopia. Yawereza mukifo ekyo okutusa lwe bamulonda ng'omukulu w'ekkibina ekiikola ku nsonga z'ekikula ky'omuntu mu siga ly'ekibina ky'amawanga amagatte ku nkulakulana (director of the Gender Team in the Bureau for Development Policy at UNDP) mu musenene wa 2006.
Okukulira ekitongole kya Oxfarm 2013-2019.
mu Gatonya wa 2013, Byanyima yalangirirwa ng'omukulu wa Oxfam International, ng'adda mu bigere bya Jeremy Hobbs. Byanyima yatandika omulimu guno ogw'emyaka etaano nga 1 Muzigo 2013. mu ntenvu wa 2017, yakiriza okuwereza ekisanja eky'okubiri ku Oxfam ng'okusaba kw'abakulu ba Oxfarm bwekwali.
Mu Gatonya wa 2015, Byanyima yali omu ku yakubiriza olukiiko lw'ensi yona (World Economic Forum) mu Davos. Yakozesa olukiiko luno okusaba wabewo okwongera amanyi mukulwanyisa obutenkanakana wakati w'abagaga n'abaavu. okunonyereza kwa Oxfam kwali kulaga nti ekitundu kimu ku buli kikumi kya ba'nagaga mu nsi yona basinga ebintundu ataano ku buli kikumi by'abantu abali mu nsi yona obugaga mu 2014. okunonyereza kwa Oxfarm kuno kwakubwamu ebituli abasooma eby'esente.
Mu Musenene wa 2016, Byanyima yalondebwa omuwandisi w'amawanga amagate Ban Ki-moon ku kakiiko ku mpereza nokutukibwako eddagala (High-Level Panel on Access to Medicines), akakubilizibwa Ruth Dreifuss, eyaliko omukulembeze w'egwanga lya Switzerland, ne Festus Mogae, eyaliko omukulembeze w'egwanga lya Botswana.
Obukulembeze bwe ku UNAIDS 2019 paaka kati.
Byanyima yalondebwa ku bukulembeze bwa UNAIDS mu Muwakanya wa 2019, ng'alondebwa Ssabawandisi w'ekibbina ky'awanga amagate, António Guterres, nga abakulu ba UNAIDS bamaze okunonyereza ku muntu asanira ekifo kino. Era mukifo kino, akola natte ng'omumyuka wa sabawandisi w'ekkibina ky'amawanga amagate.
Ng'ogase ku mirimu gye ku UNAIDS, Byanyima awereza natte ng'obmubaka ku kakkiko akawa amagezi banka yensi yena ku ntonda y'omuntu nenkulakulana ku kisangya ky'emyaka ebiri .
ebimukwatako ng'omuntu.
nga 7 Kasambula 1999, Byanyima yafumbirwa Kizza Besigye e Nsambya, mu Kampala. Besigye yaliko omukulembeze w'ekiibina ky'ebyobufuzi eya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) . Byanyima ne Besigye balina omwana omu Anselm Besigye. Byanyima wa kiibina kya FDC, naye ebyobufuzi by'ebibina yakendezako okubyetabamu okuva lwe yafuka omukungu mu 2004. Byanyima alina baganda be bataano okuli: Edith, Anthony, Martha, Abraham, ne Olivia.

Anna Ebaju Adeke:
Anna Ebaju Adeke (Yazalibwa nga 27 musenene 1991) munna Yuganda munna byabufuzi era munna mateeka. Mubaaka mu palamenti ya Uganda ng'akkikirira abavubuka begwanga lyona (2016-2021).
Okusooma Kwe.
Adeke yasomera Kireka Grammar juniour school okuva ku kibbina ekisooka paaka ku ky'omusanvu, yangira Our lady of good counsel Gayaza okusooma siniya esooka paaka ku siniya ey'okuna atte namala neyeyunga ku St. Mary's Kitende okusooma siniya ey'okutano paaka ku y'omukaga Alina diguli mu mateeka (Bachelor of Laws) okuva e Makerere University. alina ne dipuloma mu mateeka (diploma in legal practice) okuva ku Law Development Center.
Gyenvudde we mu kukola.
okuva 2013 okutusa 2014, Adeke yali awereza ng'omukulembeze w'abayizi ba ssetendekero e' Makerere . Ngali makerere, yesimbawo era nawangula ng'ali ku kakonge k'ekiibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekiwakanya Gavumenti ekya Forum for Democratic Change. okuva 2015, lwe yamaliliza diguli ye esooka, yakilizibwa okuwooza emisango mu Yuganda. Akola ne kampuni ewoza amateeka eya M&K Advocates, mu Kampala. 
Mu Mugulansigo wa 2016, Adeke yalondebwa ng'omubaka wa palamenti ya Uganda ow'abavubuka boona mu Uganda mu kalulu akalondelwa mu kibuga kya Uganda ekya Hoima ekiisangibwa mu bugwanjuba bwa Uganda. Mu kalulu kano, Yesimbawo ng'atalina kibbina. Ng'omubaka, yenyigira nyo mu kusaba okutondawo ministule y'abavubuka eyetengerede okuva ku ministule y'enkula yomuntu, abakozi wamu nenkulakulana yabulyomu (Ministry of Gender, Labour, Youth and Social Development). alwanirira nyo nokuluba nti obukiiko bwababuvubuka ku mitendera y'ebyalo wamu n'egwanga lyona bwongerwamu sente. Mukiise ku kakiiko ka palamenti ku Nfuna y'egwa (parliamentary committee on the National Economy).
Ebirala.
Adeke yalabikirako mu kataabo ka baselebu mu Yitale aka in "Vogue Italia" mu Mutunda wa 2017. Mu mugulansigo wa 2017, akatabo ka baselebu aka "Uganda Magazine" kamuteeka ku lukalala lw'abakazi kumi abasinga amanyi mu by'obufuzi bya Uganda mu 20017. Adeke mukatulikii.

Idah Nantaba:
Ida Erios Nantaba munna'byabufuzi wa Uganda. Yeyali minista w'egwanga owebyempuliziganya ne technologiya (Uganda Ministry of Information and Communications Technology). Yalondebwa ku kifo kino ng'enaku zomwezi 6 sebbo aseka 2016. Mabega ko okuva enaku z'omwezi 15 Muwakanya 2012 okutusa nga 6 sebo aseka 2016, Yali minista w'ebyetaka. Nantabba era yemubaka omukyala owa distulikiti ye Kayunga (Kayunga District Constituency).
Gyenvude'we N'okusoma.
Nantaba bamuzalira mu Kayunga District nga 20 Ntenvu 1979. Kitaawe yafa mu 1984 nasigaza maama we yeka eyamulabirila ng'ayambibwako mwanyina (Samuel Kabenge Bamulumbye) eyasikira kiitawe. Yasomera Ndeeba Primary School mu Kayunga Districti okuva 1986 okutusa 1992 bweyatula ebibuzo bye eby'ekiibina eky'omusanvu. 
Maama we ne mwaanyina tebalina sente ezimala okumutwala mu somero elilungi ely'ebeyi kyebava bamutwala Ndeeba Senior Secondary School okusoomerayo siniya esooka mu 1993. Yamala nagenda okubeera ne mwanyina mu kyalo kisoga mu Kayunga District. Banakyalo ba Kisoga bajukira nga mwanyina bweyamuvugiranga ku kagali olugendendo lwa mailo munana buli lunaku okuva ewabwe okugenda kusomero. mu 1994, Maama wa Nantaba yafuna akasente namugya Ndeeba SSS namutwala Katikamu SDA SSS weyasomera siniya ey'okubiri kutusa ku siniya ey'okuna. yamala nawebwa ekifo ku Mukono Town Academy weyasomera siniya ey'okutano paaka ku siniya y'omukaga gyeyamaliliza mu musenene wa 1999
Nantaba yayingira Makerere University, wamu ne mwanyina eyamutwalanga ku somero nasoma diguli mu by'obulambuze. Ku Univasite, yakola okunonyereza ku bimera ebivamu edagala oba bisobola okufuka eky'obulambuze nga agezesereza ku dindiro ly'ebisolo elya Uganda Wildlife Educational Center (UWEC)". yali alungamizibwa Professor J. B. Nyakaana. yamaliliza diguli ye mu 2003.
Obukugu bwe.
2003–2015.
mu 2003, nga bamaze okumutikira e' Makerere, yakola nga ow'eby'obulambuze mu kampuni ya Pearl of Africa Tours and Travel Limited. Omulimo guno naguvako nga 2003 egwawo. Nga 2005 etandika, yali awereza ku kakiiko akafuzi aka Jordan Laboratories Limited, kampuni etunda ebyuma ebyozamu empapula n'ebikuba ebifananyi.
Mu 2010, yayingira eby'obufuzi eby'okwesimbawo nga avuganya ku bubaaka bw'omukyala wa disitulikiti ye Kayunga. Yawangula akalulu k'anakwatira NRM bendera ng'asinga ayali aliko Florence Naiga.
Mu 2011 yawangula akalulu ka boona okufuka omubaka wa palamenti. mu kukyusakyusa kwaba minista nga 15 Muwakanya 2012, Yalondebwa nga minista w'ebyetaaka, ng'adda mu bigere bya Sarah Opendi Achieng. era yakakasibwa ku bwa minista akakiiko ka palamenti akavunanizibwa ku kukasa abalondedwa nga 23 Mukulukusa bitungo tungo 2012.
2015 paaka kati.
Mu 2015 Nantaba yawangulwa mu kalulu k'okulonda anakwatira NRM bendera mu kalulu kaboona. Yayabulira ekiibina kye ng'agamba nti akalulu kano tekaali ka bwenkaya nga bweyali atisatisiza okuva mu NRM singa bamubba mu kalulu. 
Mu kalulu ka boona akakubibwa enaku zomwezi 18 Mukutulansanja 2016, Nantaba eyali yesimbyewo nga talina kibina yawangula n'obululu 86,057 atte gweyali avuganya naye Ruth Nakacwa nafuna obululu 13,184. Eky'okuva mu NRM tekyamulemesa kulondebwa nga minista w'eby'empuliziganya ng'enaku zowezi 6 sebo aseka 2016
Ng'enaku zomwezi 24 Mugulansigo 2019, Nantaba yali mu kanyolaganyo akavilamu polisi okuteka omuntu (Ronald Sebulime) ku mpingu nemukuba amasasi ng'emutebereza okugoberera Nantaba ng'akozesa pikki nekilowozo ky'okumutemula. 
Nga bamaze okudusa n'okukwata Ssebulime, yatekebwa ku mpingu nebamukuba amasasi abiri mu kifuba. Polisi yasoka neyagala ebikirile ekyikolwa kino ng'egamnba nti yali etangira etemu wabula abantu babiganira ddala ekyaletera polisi okukiriza ensobi yayo negulawo emisango ku bapolisi abakuba sebulime amasasi.
Ebirala byakola n'ebimufako.
Aidah Nantaba tanafumbirwa. Mukiriza mu kanisa y'Abadventi (Seventh-day Adventist). Ali mu palamenti ya Uganda ey'ekumi (2016–2021) ng'atalina kiibina. Akola ku bukiiko bwa palamenti buno wamanga:

Lilian Aber:
Lilian Aber ye mubaka omukyala omulonde owa Kitgum disitukulit mu palamenti ya Yuganda eyekumi nemu. Yasinga akalulu ng'ali ku kakonge ka NRM (National Resistance Movement) ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi ekikulemberwa President wa Yuganda, Yoweri Museveni. Mu kalulu ka 2021, Aber yafuna obululu 41,192 ng'asinga Roselyn Alanyo Olobo owa UPC (Uganda People's Congress) Ne Norah Odokorach, a'talina kiibina.
Okusooma kwe.
Aber alina diguli mu lulimi olungereza (bachelor's degree in English Language) wamu nempuliziganya okuva e Makerere University. alina ne diguli eyokubiri okuva kuUganda Christian University.
Emirimu Gyakozeko.
Eby'obufuzi Aber yabitandikira Makerere University. Mu mwaka gwe ogusoka ku Univasite, yasinga akalulu k'omubaaka wabayizi ku lukiiko olufuga abayizi e' Makerere. namala nalondebwa omukulembeze wabayizi Anna Ebaju Adeke okufuka minisita mu mwaka gwegumu. Mu mwaka gwe ogw'okubiri, yesimbawo kubw'omukulembeze wabayizi b'emakerere ng'ali ku kakonge k'ekibbina ky'ebyobufuzi ekya FDC (Forum For Democratic Change), naye nawangulwa Bwowe Ivan, eyamala namulonda ng'omumyuka we.
Ng'akola ng'omumyuka w'omukulembeze wabayizi, yasalawo neyesimbawo ku bukulembeze bwekiibina ekigata abayizi mu gwanga lyona ekya UNSA (Uganda National Students Union) ekifo kyeyawangula mu 2015, ng'adda mu bigere bya Matanda Abubaker (eyali omukulembeze wa UNSA okuva 2013 okutusa 2014). Aber yamala nayabulila ekkibina kya FDC nada mukibbina kya NRM nga yetegeka okwesimba ku kifo ky'omukulembeze w'akakiiko k'abavubuka be gwanga (National Youth Council). ekifo kino nakyo yakiiwangula mu musene wa 2015 ng'alina obululu 119 ng'atte George Abudul eyali amuvuganya nafuna obululu 105.
Aber kati muwi wamagezi eli omukulembeze w'egwanga ku nsonga z'abavubuka ng'atte mubaka wabavubuka mu kiibina ky'awanga amagate (UN youth delegate). Aber era yaliko omubaaka w'ekibbina ekigata abayizi bomumawanga agafugibwako bungereza. Mu 2018, Aber bamulonda ku kakiiko akakola enongosereza mu semaateka (constitutional review team). mu 2016 yesimbawo ku kifo ky'omubaka wa palamenti wa mawanga ga buvanjuba bwa Africa (East African Legislative Assembly(EALA).
Mu Gatonya wa 2021, Aber yawangula ekifo ky'omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti ya Kitgum. yadda mu bigere bya Margaret Lamwaka Odwar eyagenda okukiikirila abe Chua.

Veronica Namaganda Nanyondo:
Veronica Namaganda Nanyondo munnabyabufuzi w'e Uganda mu kibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) eyazaalibwa nga 22 Ogwamusanvu (July) 1986 mu Disitulikiti y'e Bukomansimbi. Nanyondo ebyobufuzi yabitandika mu Gwekkumineebiri /December wa 2015 ng'ali wansi w'ekibiina kya Democratic Party(DP) oluvannyuma lw'okufa kwa muganda we Suzan Namaganda eyali afiiridde mu kabenje k'emmotoka. Nanyondo mu kiseera kino ye mubaka mu Paalamenti owa Disitulikiti y'e Bukomansimbi. Yasalawo okwesimba ku kifo kino olw'okwagala okwongereza ku bya muganda we Suzan Namaganda eyafa nga ye mubaka w'ekitundu ekyo n'alaba nga ye muntu omutuufu okumuddira mu bigere.
Obuyigirize bwe.
Nanyondo yatuula P7 mu 1998 ku ssomero lya Kisojjo Primary School. Yatuula ebya S4 mu 2002 mu ssomero lya Mende Kalema Memorial S.S. Yeeyogerayo ku haaya n'atuula S6 mu 2004 mu St. Andrew Kaggwa S.S oluvannyuma n'afuna ddiguli mu busomesa eya Bachelor of Arts in Education mu Makerere University.
Eby'emirimu gye.
Nanyondo emirimu gye yagitandika mu 2010 ng'akola nga kitunzi mu kkampuni ya Unique Business Systems okutuusa mu 2011. Wakati wa 2011 ne 2013 yali asomesa ku St.John SSS Mukono nga mu kiseera kino Dayirekita mu kkampuni ya Ver Stationaries Limited. Mu kulonda kwa 2021 yategeka olukung'aana olw'awamu ne banne ab'ekibiina kya NUP kyokka ab'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza bwe bavuganya aba National Resistance Movement- (NRM) era kw'olwo poliisi yajja n'erusazaamu.
Ebya Famile ye.
Nanyondo 'mulamu' wa Fred Mukasa Mbidde omubaka mu Paalamenti ey'obuvanjuba bwa Afirika (East African Legislative Assembly - EALA). Noolwekyo Nanyondo muganda w'omugenzi Suzan Namaganda eyali mukyala wa Mukasa Mbidde.

Munnayuganda:
Ye muntu azaaliddwa mu ggwanga lya Uganda. Bw'aba mukulu kimukakatako n'okuba ne densite (ennangamuntu) ya Uganda.

Janet Grace Akech Okori-Moe:
Janet Grace Akech Okori-Moe (eyazaalibwa nga 3 Ogwomenda1966) munnayuganda, musomesa ate era munnamateeka. Mu Gwokutaano 2020, Okori-Moe yafuuka omubaka omukyala akiikirira ddisitulikiti ya Abim mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga (Uganda) olw'ekkumi. Ku ludda lw'ebyobufuzi, Okori-Moe munnakibiina kya National Resistance Movement era nga kye yajjiramu mu kalulu ka 2016. 
Okusoma kwe.
Okori-Moe yatuula ebibuuzo by'ekibiina eky'omusanvu (PLE) mu 1979 ku Abim Primary School. Yasomera ku Kangole Girls Senior Secondary School n'afuna Uganda Certificate of Education (UCE) mu 1983 n'oluvannyuma n'agenda ku Moroto High School gye yafunira Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education (UACE) mu 1986. Okori-Moe era alina ddipulooma mu busomesa gye yafunira ku Makerere University (mu1989) ne Advanced Diploma in Educational Planning and Management gye yafunira ku Kyambogo University (mu 1999).Mu 2000 yafuna ddiguli mu Social Sciences ku Makerere University n'oluvannyuma n'afuna Master of Science in Social Sector Planning and Management mu 2006.
Emirimu gy'akoze.
Okori-Moe yasomesaako ku Moroto Teachers College (1992–1994) nga tannalondebwa kubeera mukiise ku kakiiko akaateekateeka ssemateeka wa Uganda (1994–1995). Yaweerezaako ng'omubaka mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga, 1996–2001 ne 2006–2011. Nga tannalondebwa mu kifo ky'aweerezaamu kaakano, yali muwabuzi wa ppulezidenti ku nsonga z'ebyenjigiriza (2013–2015).
Mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga olw'ekkumi, Okori-Moe ye ssentebe w'akakiiko akakwasaganya ensonga z'ebyobulimi, ssentebe omubeezi w'akakiiko k'ensonga z'ebweru w'eggwanga mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga (Uganda) ate era nga mmemba ku Appointments Committee.

Agnes Atim Apea:
Agnes Atim Apea munnayuganda, munnabbizineesi ate era munnabyabufuzi. Ye yatandikawo ekibiina kya Hope Development Initiative, era nga yafulumira mu lukalala lwa BBC olw'abakyala 100 ab'omwaka 2017. Mu kalulu ka 2021 aka bonna, Apea yalondebwa ng'omubaka omukyala owa ddisitulikiti ya Amolatar, ku kkaadi ya National Resistance Movement.
Emirimu gy'akoze.
Agnes Atim Apea ye ssentebe w'akakiiko ka Local Government Finance Commission ate era nga ye yatandikawo ekitongole kya Hope Development Initiative, ekitumbula abalimi b'omuceere abakyala mu bitundu bya Uganda eby'enjawulo. Eno y'ensonga eyamuleetera okupaatiikibwako erinnya "Mama Rice." Ekitongole kye kiteeseteese ebitongole by'abalimi eby'obwegassi mu Uganda. Ng'oggyeeko omuceere, ebitongole by'abalimi eby'obwegassi era bikola ku nsigo ezikozesebwa okukola butto n'ebintu ebirala ebikolebwa mu muwogo.
Mu ngeri y'emu, Apea ye mubaka omukyala omulonde okukiikirira ddisitulikiti ya Amolatar (esangibwa mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda) mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga.She is also the Woman Member of Parliament-elect for Amolatar District in Northern Uganda.
Mu 2017, Apea yafulumira mu lukalala lwa BBC olw'abakyala 100 ab'enkizo okwetooloola ensi yonna. Apea okutegeera engeri gye yafulumira mu lukalala luno yali agenze mu lusiisira lw'ebyobusuubuzi (7th African Grain Trade Summit) olwategekebwa mu ggwanga lya Tanzania, bwe kyamanyibwa nti olukalala yalugendako lwa kutumbula mazima na bwenkanya wamu n'okusomesa abakyala ebintu eby'enjawulo.
Okusoma kwe.
Apea alina PhD mu byenkulaakulana (Doctor of Philosophy in International Development) gye yafunira ku University of Reading. Alina ne Master's degree mu Development Studies okuva ku Uganda Martyrs University.

Betty Louke Chelain:
Betty Louke Chelain munnayuganda ate era omubaka omukyala mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga. Mu 2021, Chelain yalondebwa ng'omubaka omukyala akiikirira ddisitulikiti ya Amudat mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga (Uganda). 
Chelain munnakibiina kya National Resistance Movement, ekibiina ekiri mubuyinza.

Susan Achola Engola:
Achola Suzan Engola munnayuganda era munnabyabufuzi. Mu 2011, Engola yalondebwa ng'omubaka wa ddisitulikiti ya Apac mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga. Yaddamu n'alondebwa ng'omubaka akiikirira ekitundu ekyo mu kalulu ka bonna aka 2021 akaakubibwa nga 14 Ogusooka, 2021.
Engola munnakibiina kya Uganda People's Congress. 

Resty Nanteza:
Resty Nanteza munnayuganda era munnabyabufuzi. Mu ngeri y'emu, Nanteza era muweereza ku NBS radio esangibwa mu kibuga ky'e Jinja era nga yatandikibwawo eyaliko omubaka mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga, Hon. Igeme Nathan Nabeta. Mu 2021 yali mu lwokaano lw'okuvuganya ku kifo ky'omubaka omukyala akiikirira ddisitulikiti ya Buikwe mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga, oluvannyuma lw'obuweereza bwe nga ssentebe w'ekitundu kya Nyenga. Yafuna obululu 41,561 era n'alangirirwa ng'omuwanguzi mu kulangirira okwasooka. Wabula bigenda okuggwa ng'awanguddwa munnakibiina kya NRM, Diana Mutasingwa eyafuna obululu 43,215. Nanteza yagenda mu kkooti ng'awakanya ebyava mu kulonda.
Nanteza munnakibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change.

Ndamira Atwakire:
Ndamira Catherine Atwikiire (yazaalibwa nga 13 Ogwomunaana / August 1977) Munnayuganda omubazi w'ebitabo, mubaka mu Paalamenti era munnabizinensi.. Yaddamu okulondebwa ng'omubaka omukazi mu Paalamenti ey'e 11 owa Disitulikiti y'e Kabale ng'esangibwa mu ttundutundu lya Kigezi Sub-Region era nga munnakibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekiri mu buyinza ki National Resistance Movement. Yali ku kakiiko ka Paalamenti akabuuliriza ku nsimbi z'omuwiw'omusolo ne ku kakiiko akalondoola ku byobulamu mu Paalamenti ya Uganda ey'e 10. Era mmemba mu The Uganda Parliamentary Forum on Social Protection.
Emirimu gye.
Okuva mu 2010 - 2015, yali akola ng'ewebyenfuna mu kkampuni ya VIDAS Engineering Services Co. Ltd. Oluvannyuma yalondebwa ng'omubaka Omukazi akiikirira Disitulikiti y'e Kabale mu Paalamenti mu 2016. Atwikiire era yalondebwa okutuula ku kakiiko akagoberera ensonga z'omukago gwa Afrika ey'Obuvanjuba aka East African Community. Erammemba wa The Uganda Parliamentary Forum on Social Protection .
Ebimu ku by'akoze.
Ndamira Atwakire yawa aabantu b'e Kabale ebintu ng'ebizzi, ebijanjaalo, kasooli n'emboga. Yayongera amaanyi mu butale bw'omubitundu eby'enjawulo, n'abakolera amazzi ga ttaapu, yatwalayo z'abavubuka ng'okuggulawo SACCO z'abavubuka, Yagula ambyulensi okuyambako ku byobulamu mu kitundu kye ate era yatuukiriza n'ekiragiro eky'okuwanika amataala mu kibuga Kabale. Erayayambako ne mu kusitula ebyemizannyo mu Disitulikiti ye. Yawagira era n'akulaakulanya ebyenjigiriza mu Kabale bwe yeetaba mu kusonda ssente ezaazimba ettendekero lya Kagunga Technical School. Yawaayo eri eggwanga Uganda mu kusonda obuyambi mu kiseera kya COVID-19 nga yawaayo amafuta.

Agnes Nandutu:
Agnes Nandutu mukyala Munnayuganda era munnamawulire, munnabyabufuzi era Minisita omubeezi ow'e Karamoja. Mu 2020 yeetaba mu kalulu k'ekibiina ekya National Resistance Movement kye yafiirwa eri Memba wa Paalamenti omukyala Justin Khainza, era mu kulonda okw'awamu okwa 2021, yeesimbawo ku bwannamunigina, n'alondebwa ng'omubaka omukazi owa Disitulikiti y'e Bududa.
Emirimu gye.
Agnes Nandutu yazaalibwa mu Disitulikiti y'e Bududa mu Uganda. Yali nnakinku mu kuweereza amawulire ag'ebyobufuzi ku NTV Uganda. Nandutu yali aweereza ku mpewo era nga y'akubiriza pulogulaamu ku NTV eyitibwa "Paalamenti y'abantu." yaweereza nga Pulezidenti w'ekibiina kya bannamawulire abasaka aga Paalamenti ekya Parliamentary Journalists' Association okuva mu 2011 okutuuka mu 2016. Ye muwandiisi era omunyumya w'akanyomero akaatiikirivu ennyo ku Lwokutaano aka Point Blank ku NTV Uganda. Mu 2011, yafuna ekirabo kye ekya ssekkukulu okuva mu The Observer ku lwa pulogulaamu ye ku NTV , eya Point Blank.
Obuto bwe n'emisomo gye.
Agnes ava mu buwangwa bwa Babantu obw'Abagisu. Nandutu Pulayimale ye yagisomera ku Bumwali primary school, era yeegatta ku Bbulo girls secondary era oluvanyuma yeegatta ku Blucheke secondary school mu misomo gye egya Siniya eya waggulu. Mu 1997, yeegatta ku Radio Uganda ng'omuweereza w'amawulire. Oluvanyuma, yafuma Dipuloma mu mawulire ku ttendekero lya Uganda Institute of Journalism and Media studies. Yakolerako ku Daily Monitor ng'omuweereza w'amawulire atali mukozi wa nkalakkalira. Wakati wa 2002–2008, Agnes yakolerako ku Impact FM ng'omuweereza w'amawulire omujjuvu nga tanneegatta ku NTV Uganda.
Ebirala.
Mu 2017, Nandutu yammibwa olukusa Dayirekita w'ebyempuliziganya okuweereza amawulire agafa mu Paalamenti y'a Uganda.
Mu 2020 mu kaseera ka kakuyege wa Paalamenti, Nandutu yasabibwa okwanjula omwami we, ekintu ky'ataakola wabula n'asaba akakiiko akakwasaganya eby'okulonda nga ayita ku Ladiyo okumufunirayo amusaanira era n'abeegayirira okufaayo ku buweeereza obulungi mu kifo ky'obufumbo. ensonga y'obufumbo yaleetawo akabuuza mu bantu. Nandutu yakkiriza nti maama w'abaana musanvu newankubadde yasaba aleme kwogera bingi ku nsonga eyo mu kiseera weyali mu kafubo ne munnawulire w'olupapula lwa Observer.

Mary Paula Kebirungi Turyahikayo:
Mary Paula Kebirungi Turyahikayo era amanyiddwa nga Turyahikayo Kebirungi Mary Paula (yazaalibwa nga 15 Gatonnya / January 1961) Munnayuganda nga munnabyabufuzi era eyasoma embeera z'abantu. Ye mubaka mu Paalamenti owa konsitityuwensi y'e Rubabo,mu Disitulikiti y'e Rukungiri wansi w'ekibiina ki National Resistance Movement (NRM). Yavuganya ku kifo kino mu 2021-2026 naye n'awangulwa ng'afunye obululu 20,287. 
Ebyokusoma kwe.
Mu 1974, yatandika okusoma mu St. Theresa Primary School era gye yatuulira ebigezo bya P7, olwo oluvannyuma ne yeegatta ku Immaculate Heart Girls Senior Secondary School era gye yatuulira S4 mu 1978. Kyokka S6 yo yagituulira mu Kibuli S.S mu 1980. Yabeebwa ekifo mu Yunivaasite e Makerere n'asomayo ddiguli mu mbeera z'abantu eya Bachelor's degree of Arts in Social Sciences (Political Science, Sociology) mu mwaka 1984. Mu 1997, yasomayo satifikeeti mu bukulembeze oluvannyuma lwa ddiguli mu ttendekero lya Uganda Management Institute. Mary era yaddayo ku Uganda Management Institute n'afunayo Dipulooma mu by'obukulembeze mu 2000 era oluvannyuma yaddayo n'asomayo ddiguli eyookubiri eya Master of Public Health Leadership mu 2009.
Emirimu gye nga tannatandika byabufuzi.
Yali musomesa era nga y'akulira essomo ly'Ebyafaayo ku ssomero lya Baptist High School, Mombasa, Kenya(1986-1988) ne ku Afraha High School, Nakuru, Kenya (1988-1990). Mu 1994, yeegatta ku puloogulaamu ya Africa Science Technology Exchange nga y'agikulembera oluvannyuma ne yeegatta ku Minisitule y'ebyobulamu gye yaweereza mu kuddukanya emirimu gya Minisitule egya bulijjo (1998-2004). Okuva awo, yakolako ng'amyuka akulira enzirukanya y'emirimu mu kitongole ekiddukanya emirimu gya Gavumenti ekya Public Sector(2004-2005). Era yakolao ng'amyuka akulira eby'emirimu mu kitongole kya Global Fund to fight AIDS, TB, Malaria (2004 - 2005). Yakolako ng'omu ku banoonyereza ku African Energy Policy Research Network, era ng'omusomsa w'essomo ly'Ebyafaayo ne Kayigansi (Geography) mu masomero gy'e Kenya.
ebyobufuzi.
Okuva mu 2006 - 2021, yaweereza ng'omubaka mu Paalamenti ya Uganda okuli Paalamenti ey'omunaana, ey'omwenda n'ey'ekkumi. Mu 2001 yawangula eyali Minisita era aliko cansala wa Makerere University, Prof. Mondo Kagonyera, ku kifo ky'omubaka wa Rubabo Konsitityuwensi.
Mu Paalamenti yeeyongerako obuvunaanyizibwa obulala okubukiiko bwa Paalamenti obw'enjawulo, mu bitongole bya Gavumenti eby'enjawulo ne bizinensi za Gavumenti ez'enjawulo.
Ebyomunda ebimukwatako.
Mufumbo. By'anyumirwa mu biseera bye eby'eddembe anyumirwa okuwuliriza ennyimba ez'eddiini, okukyalira mikwano gye, okutambulako n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo. Ayagala nnyo okutumbula ebyobulamu n'abavubuka abawala mu ggwanga.

Betty Esther Naluyima:
Betty Esther Naluyima
Obuzaale: Munnayuganda
Obutuuze Munnayuganda
Ekitiibwa Mmemba wa Paalamenti
Betty Esther Naluyima Munnayuganda, munnabyabufuzi era mmemba mu Paalamenti ya Uganda. Yalondebwa okufuuka omubaka wa Disitulikiti y'e Wakiso mu Paalamenti ya Uganda ey'e 11 mu kulonda kwa bonna kwa 2021.
Mmemba w'ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekya National Unity Platform.

Christine Tubo Nakwang:
Christine Tubo Nakwang era amanyiddwa nga Nakwang Christine Tubo Munnayuganda era nga munnabyabufuzi ngaye Mubaka omukazi akiikirira Disitulikiti y'e Kaabong mu Paalamentiya Uganda. Christine y'omu ku baali ba kkaada b'ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekyaNational Resistance Movement (NRM) mu kalulu k'okuddamu okulonda omubaka waayo mu 2021 nga kino kyajjawo olwa Rose Lily Akello eyali omubaka omukazi owa Disitulikiti eyo yali asazeewo okugisuulawo yeesimbewo okukiikirira Disitulikiti eyali yaakatondebwawo eya Karenga eyali ekutuddwa ku Kaabong. Nakwang mu kamyufu yawangula Fadouta Ahmed ne Agnes Napio nga nabo baali wansi wa NRM. Yavuganya ne Judith Adyaka Nalibe ow'ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) ng'ono oluvannyuma yasalawo okuva mu lwokaano olw'ebyali biyiting'ana nti ekibiina kye kyali tekimuwadde buwagizi. Ebimu ku by'ayagala okutereeza e Kaabong kwe kutumbula omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza. . 
Gy'ava n'ebyokusoma kwe.
Nakwang yazaalibwa nga 7 Ogwekkuminoogumu / November 1967 mu Disitulikiti y'e Kaabong. Yasoma gwa bubazi bwa bitabo. Yatandikira olugendo lwe olw'okusoma mu ssomero lya Komukuny Girls Primary School era n'atuulirayo ebigezo bya PLE mu 1982. Yeegatta ku Kangole Girls Secondary School era gye yatuulira ebigezo bya S4 mu 1986. Oluvannyuma eegatta ku ssomero lya Moroto High school gye yatuulira S6 mu 1989. Yeeyunga ku Nkumba University gye yasomera era n'atikkirwa Dipulooma mu bubazi bw'ebitabo (Diploma in Accounting) mu 1992. Yeeyongerayo kuKampala International University gye yasomera Ddiguli esooka mu by'okuddukanya Buzinensi (Bachelor's Degree in Business administration (BBA) mu 2006.
Ebyemirimu gye.
Christine yatandikira mubusomesa ku ssomero lya Komukuny boys primary School ne mu Kaabong senior Secondary School. Yafuuka akola ng'omumyuka w'omukulu w'essomero mu Kangole Girls S.S mu mwaka 1990. Okuva mu 1993 -1994 yali akola mu ofiisi y'ebyensimbi ku kitebe kya Eklezia Katolika e Moroto. Mu 1995, Yafuuka omulabirizi era omukuumi w'etterekero lya ly'ekitongole kya Oxfam GB Kotido Field office, oluvannyuma n'afuuka omuwanika wa Dodoth Agro-pastoralist development Organization. Yeeyongerayo ne yeegatta ku Terra Firma Construction Company ng'akulira okuddukanya emirimu gyayo. Mu kiseera kye kimu yali aweereza nga kkansala wa LC5 mu Disitulikiti y'e Kaabong okuva mu 1996 - 2000. Mu bbanga wakati wa 20001 - 2011 yaweereza ng'omubaka mu Paalamenti owa Disitulikiti y'e Kaabong. Mu 2012 - 2015 yafuuka mmemba ku lukiiko oluddukanya emirimu mu disitulikiti y'e Kaabong era n'addamu okufuuka mmemba mu Paalamenti okuva mu Gwomwenda / September wa 2019 okutuusa kati
Ebyobufuzi.
Christine yatandika olugendo lwe olw'ebyobufuzi n'obukulembeze nga kkansala wa LC5 ku lukiiko lwa Disitulikiti y'e Kaabong okuva mu 1996 - 2000. Yavuganya mu kalulu ka bonna akaaliwo mu 2016 era n'awangula eky'Omubaka omukazi owa Disitulikiti y'e Kaabong nga ku luno yeesimbawo ku bwannamunigina. Mu kulonda kuno okwa 2016, Akello Lucy teyamatira ku buwanguzi bwa Nakwang kwe kuddukira mu kkooti n'amuwaabira. Nakwang yaggyibwa mu Paalamenti n'adda ku bbali era okulonda okw'okuddamu akalulu ako okwakolebwa mu mateeka, Akello akuwangula n'adda mu bigere bya Nakwang mu 2017.Akello Lucy bwe yasalawo okukiikirira Disitulikiti y'e Karenga, ekifo kino yakivaamu n'akireka nga kyereere kwe kutegeka okuddamu okulonda mu 2019 okujjuza ekifo kino mu 2019 Nakwag kwe yawangula n'addamu okufuuka omubaka mu Paalamenti owa Disitulikiti y'e Kaabong. Yaddamu okwesimbawo ku kifo kyekimu mu kulonda kwa bonna okwa 2021 ku kkaadi ya NRM era n'awangula.

Emma Boona:
Emma Boona (Eyazalibwa enakuzomwezi 17 omwezi gwa mukutulansanja 1954) musomesa muna Yuganda era muna'byabufuzi. Yaliko omubaaka omukyala owa Mbarara District mu palamenti ey'omunana neye kumi era omukiise wa National Resistance Movement (NRM), ekibbina ky'ebyobufuzi ekifuga Uganda.
Ng'akyali omubaka, yawereza ng'omumyuka wa sentebbe wakakiiko akakwasaganya ebyemilimu ne Gavumenti yamakati atte yali mukiise ku kakiiko k'ebyensimbi, entekateka wamu n'enkulakulana mu byenfuna wamu n'akakiko akalondola ensasanya ya Gavumenti mu palamenti ya Yuganda. 
Yali mukiise ku kiwayi kya NRM mu palamenti era omukise mu kibbina ekigata ababaka abakyala mu palamenti ya Uganda(Uganda Women's Parliamentary Association (UWOPA).
Boona era yaliko Omumyuka wa sentebbe w'olukiiko lwa district y'embarara (Local Council Five (LC5), era yaliko n'omomyuka wa mayor wa Mbarara Munisipali.
Yawerazako ng'omukulu w'esomero lya Mbarara Secondary School era yali musomesa mumasomero agawerako mu bugwa'njuba bwa Uganda.
Obulamu bwe obw'edda n'okusoma kwe.
Boona bamuzalira mu disitulikiti ye Bushenyi, mu Ankole ng'enaku zomwezi 17 mukutulansanja 1954 mu maka g'enzikiriza y'eki kulisitayo. okusoma kwe yakutandikira ku St. Cecilia Girls' School Kitabi-Bushenyi ne St. Helen's Primary School – Mbarara, we'yatulira ebibuzo bye eby'ekina ky'omusanvu (PLE certification) mu 1967.
Yamala neyeyunga ku Maryhill High School okusooma siniya esooka paaka ku y'okuna (O-Level) mu 1971, namala nada Trinity College Nabbingo weyasoomera siniya ey'okutano paaka ku y'omukaaga (A-Level) mu 1973.
Boona yeyongerayo okusooma neyeyunga ku Makerere University weyasoomera diguli ne dipuloma mu byenjigiriza gyeya'tikirwa mu 1977. Mu 2006, yatikirwa diguli ey'okubiri mu kubalirira n'okudukanya eby'enjigiriza okuva mu Ssetendekero wa Mbarara University of Science and Technology (MUST).
Gyenvundde we' mu by'obufuzi.
Nga yakatikirwa digtuli ye esooka mu 1977, Boona ya'somesa mu zi siniya z'omubugwa'njuba bwa Uganda okutusa 1984 lwe yalondebwa okuba omukulu w'esomero lya Mbarara Secondary School lye yakulira okumala emyaka kumi n'enna. Mu 1991, Yafuka omumyuka wa mayor wa munisipali y'eMbarara. yawereza mu kifo kino paaka 1998 bweyalondebwa ng'omumyuka wa ssentebbe wa LC eyokutaano owa disitulikiti y'embarara.
Okuva 2002 okutusa 2008, Boona yali akiikirira Uganda mu kiibbina ky'ensi yona ekikwasaganya eby'okubalilira mu kuzaala (International Planned Parenthood Federation) – Mu kibangirizi ky'africa (IPPFAR) nga nakywewa mu kitingole kya Reproductive Health Uganda (RHU).
Mu 2006, Boona yagenda mumaso nokuwereza abantu b'eMbarara era yesimbawo ng'omubaka w'abakyala ba disitulikiti y'e Mbarara ngali ku kakonge ka NRM era nawangula akalulu k'anakwata bendera ya NRM mu 2005 atte nawangula n'akalulu ka boona mu 2006 okufuka omubaka mu palamenti ya Uganda ey'omunana. Mu 2011, abantu b'e Mbarara bamulonda ku kiisanja eky'okubiri eky'emyaka etaano. 
Mu 2015, Rosette Kajungu Mutambi yasinga Emma Boona mu kalulu k'okulonda anakwatira NRM bendera mu kalulu ka 2016 kubw'omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti y'eMbarara.
Mu palamenti ey'omunnana n'ey'omwenda, Boona yali mukkise ku kakkiko ku by'ensimbi,okubalirira n'ebyenkulakulana wamu n'akakkiko ku nsasanya ya gavumenti mu palamenti. yali mukiise ow'ekiiwayi kya NRM mu palamenti atte wamu n'ekkibbina ky'ababaka abakyala mu palamenti kyebayita (UWOPA).
Mu palamenti eyo munnana, Boona yali awereza ng'omumyuka wa ssentebe w'akkiko akalondola ekitongole kya Gavumenti ekkikwasaganya eby'emilimo wamu n'akakkiko ku Gavumenti ez'ebitundu. Era yali akkikirira bugwa'njuba bwa Uganda mu kibbina ekigata ababaka abakyala mu palamenti ekya UWOPA.
Ebimukwatako Ng'omuntu.
Emma Boona mukyala wa' Chris Boona era balina abaana. akulira wamu nokuwa amagezi ebibbina by'obwegasi ebitereka n'okuwola sente (SACCOs) mu disitulikiti y'e Mbarara era ali ku' bukkiko obudukanya amasomero obw'amasomero mangyi.

Norah Bigirwa-Nyendwoha:
Norah Bigirwa
Yazaalibwa nga: 19 October 1968
Eggwanga: Munnayuganda
Obutuuze: Munnayuganda
Obukulu: Munnabyabufuzi
Ekifo: Mmemba wa Paalamenti
Norah Bigirwa-Nyendwoha (Yazaalibwa nga 19 Ogwekkumi / October 1968) Munnayuganda ate nga mubaka Omukazi mu Paalamenti. Mu 2016, Yalondebwa ng'omubaka Omukazi akiikirira Disitulikii Buliisa. Mu kulonda kwa Uganda okwa bonna okwa 2021 yaddamu okulondebwa akiikirire ekitundu kye kimu.
Mmemba w'ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekiri mu buyinza ki National Resistance Movement.
Ebyokusoma kwe.
Mu 1992, Norah yatikkirwa Dipulooma mu byabizinensi (Business Studies) mu ttendekero lya National College of Business Studies erisangibwa e Nakawa.
Mu 1995, yatikkirwa era n'afuna satifikeeti mu by'okubala ebitabo (Accounting Technician Certificate) okuva ku ttendekero lya Uganda Management Institute. Era mu ttendekerolye limu gye yatikkirwa Dipulooma mu ssomo ly'ebyenfuna (Finance Officers Diploma) nga wayiseewo emyaka ena (4).
Mu 2003, yatikkirwa Ddiguli esooka mu Ndejje University ng'afuna Ddiguli mu kuddukanya bizinensi (bachelor's degree of Business Administration).

Juliet Kyinyamatama Suubi:
SUUBI JULIET KYINYAMATAMA
Obuzaale Munnayuganda
Obutuuze Munnayuganda
Gye yasomera: Uganda Christian University, University of Geneva
Emyaka mw'akyaakidde: 2011 - okutuusa leero
Ekifo: Mmemba wa Paalamenti
Juliet Kyinyamatama Suubi (yazaalibwa nga 22 Ogwekkumineebiri / December 1988) Munnayuganda, munnabyabufuzi era nga mmemba wa Paalamenti. Mu 2011, yalondebwa okubeera omubaka omukazi owa Disitulikiti y'e Rakai mu Paalamenti ya Uganda, n'addamu okulondebwa mu kifo kye kimu mu kulonda kwa bonna okwa 2016 era bwe yeesimbawo omulundi ogwokusatu ku kifo kye kimu yalondebwa mu kwa 2021 n'addayo mu Paalamenti ng'omubaka omukazi owa Disitulikiti y'e Rakai mu Paalamenti ya Uganda.
Yavuganya ku bwannamunigina oluvannyuma lw'okuwangulwa mu kamufu k'ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement.
Ebyobuyigirize bwe.
Yatuulira ebigezo bye ebya Pulayimale (PLE) mu Ronald Ruta Primary School e Lyantonde mu 2001. Mu 2005 yatuula S4 ye ku ssomero lya Valley College erisangibwa e Bushenyi, era ng'eno gye yatuulira n'ebya S6 mu 2008. Mu 2012 yatikkirwa Ddiguli ye esooka eya Bachelor's degree of Social Work and Social Administration ku Uganda Christian University. Oluvannyuma yasoma satifikeeti mu byobulamu eya Global Health okuva mu University of Geneva mu 2013 .

Kevin Ojinga Kaala:
Kevin Ojinga Kaala Munnayuganda , Munnabyabufuzi era mmemba wa Paalamenti. Mu kulonda kwa bonna okwa 2021, yalondebwa okubeera mmemba wa Paalamenti ng'akiikirira Disituliki y'e Paliisa mu Paalamenti ng'omubaka waayo Omukazi.
Mmemba wa kibiina kya byabufuzi ekiri mu buyinza ekya National Resistance Movement.

Maria Mutagamba:
Maria Emily Lubega Mutagamba (yazaalibwa nga 5 Ogwomwenda / September 1952 – n'afa nga 24 Ogwomukaaga / June 2017). Yali Munnayuganda nga munnabyanfuna era munnabyabufuzi. Yaliko Minisita w'Ebyobulambuzi, ebisolo by'omunsiko n'eby'omumazzi mu Kabineeti ya Uganda okuva nga 15 Ogwomunaana / August 2012 okutuuka nga 6 Ogwomukaaga / June 2016.
Okuva mu 2011 okutuusa 2012, ye yali minisita w'amazzi n'Obutonde bw'ensi. Era yaweerezaako ng'omubaka Omukazi owa Disitulikiti y'e Rakai mu Paalamenti okuva mu 2001 okutuusa mu 2016.
Gye yazaalibwa n'obuyigirize.
Mutagamba yazaalibwa mu Disituliki y'e Rakai nga 5 Ogwomwenda / September 1952. Yasomera mu St. Aloysius Senior Secondary School e Bwanda, mu Disitulikiti y'e Kalungu era gye yatuulira S4 u 1970. Yeeyongerayo ku ssomero lya Mount Saint Mary's College Namagunga mu Disitulikiti y'e Mukono gye yatuullira S6 nga yasomerayo wakati wa (1971–1972). Yeeyongerayo mu Makerere University okuva mu 1973 okutuusa mu 1976, n'atikkirwa Ddiguli mu Byenfuna eya Bachelor of Arts in economics. Era yafuna ne Dipulooma mu kompyuta eya computer programming mu ttendekero lya ICL Computer School e Nairobi, Kenya, nga yagifuna mu 1980, n'afuna ne satifikeeti mu byobukulembeze okuva mu ttendekero lya John F. Kennedy School of Government e Cambridge, Massachusetts, mu Bungereza (United States), ng'eno yagifuna mu 1997. Mu 2013, yaweebwa Ddiguli ey'ekitiibwa kya Dokita (an honorary doctorate in law) okuva mu McMaster University e Canada.
Emirimu gye.
Mutagamba yakolako mu Bbanka ng'akolera mu Bbanka ya Uganda Enkulu okuva mu 1976 okutuuka mu 1980 oluvannyuma yafuuka Dayirekita wa Bbanka okuva mu 1991 okutuuka mu 1999. Mu 1999–2000, yafuuka mumyuka wa Ssaabawandiisi w'ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekya Democratic Party. Mu 2000, yalondebwa okufuuka Minisita omubeezi ow'ensonga z'amazzi ate mu 2006 n'alondebwa okufuuka Minisita omujjuvu ow'amazzi n'obutonde bw'ensi, nga yabeera mu kifo kino okutuuka mu 2012. Ye yali Pulezidenti w'olukiiko lwa Baminisita b'ensonga z'amazzi ab'omu Afrika yonna okuva mu 2004 okutuuka mu 2012 era akwataganya ekibiina k'abakazi abafaayo ku mazzi n'obuyonjo mu nsi yonna ekya Global Women Leaders Forum for Water and Sanitation okuva mu 2005 okutuuka mu 2012. Era yamyukako n'akulira ekitongole kya United Nations Task Force on Integrated Water Resource Management. Ajjukirwa nnyo olw'okukola ennyo olw'okulaba ng'amazzi amayonjo gabuna mu bantu ne mu kitongole kya Global Water Harvesting Network.
Mutagamba yaweerezaako nga Minisita w'Ebyobulambuzi, ensolo ez'omunsiko n'ebiramu ebibeera m mazzi okuva nga 15 Ogwomunaana / August 2012 okutuuka nga 6 Ogwomukaaga / June 2016 nga yasikizibwa Ephraim Kamuntu. Bwe yali Minisita, ajjukirwa olw'okutumbula ebyokulya omuli emagi, enva endiirwa ne chapati gye bazingamu eggi emanyiddwa nga Rolex. Yakomyawo n'empaka za Nnalulungi wa w'ebyobulambuzi owa Uganda. Yava mu byobufuzi mu 2016 olw'obulwadde obwali bumubala embiriizi.
Obirala ebimukwatako ng'omuntu.
Yafumbirwa Tarsis Matthew Mutagamba eyali omukozi wa Bbanka enkulu eya Uganda okumala emyaka 17 okutuusa lwe yalekulira mu 1980. Y'akulira ababazi b'ebitabo aba Bbanka Omuddugavu eyasooka mu Afrika. Tarsis yafa ndwadde ya Mutima nga 2 Gatonnya/ January 2004 ng'alina emyaka 70. Yaleka azadde abaana 16.
Okufa kwe.
Mutagamba yafa nga 24 Ogwomukaaga 2017 ku ddwaliro lya Case Medical Centre mu Kampala oluvannyuma lw'okulwala Kookolo w'ekibumba (liver cancer), kyokka nga yalina n'endwadde endala nga gallstones. Yafiira ku myaka 64 oluvannyuma lw'okumala ku kitanda wiiki ssatu ng'olumbe lumubala embiriizi. Ssaabaminisita wa UgandaRuhakana Rugunda bwe yali ayogera ku kufa kwe yagamba nti "Okufa kwa Mutagamba ddibu ddene eri eri Eggwanga lino - Uganda". Yaziikibwanga 28 Ogwomukaaga 2017 ku kyalo Gamba, mu Ggombolola y'e Kakuuto mu Disitulikiti y'e Rakai. Mmisa ey'okusabira omugenzi yakulemberwa eyali Omusumba w'Essaza ly'e Masaka mu Eklezia Katolika, kati naye omugenzi John Baptist Kaggwa.

Winnie Nanyondo:
Winnie Nanyondo (yazaalibwa nga 23 Ogwomunaana / August 1993, e Mulago). Munnayuganda era muddusi. Akiikiridde eggwanga lye (Uganda) mu mpaka ez'enjawulo naddala eziri ku mutindo ogw'ensi yonna omuli: the 2016 Summer Olympics, 2014 , 2014 Commonwealth Games, 2013 Summer Universiade, ne mu 2012 World Junior Championships in Athletics.
2012.
Mu mpaka eza 2012 World Junior Championships, yatuuka ku mpaka ez'akamalirizo mu misinde egya mmita 800 oluvannyuma lw'okuwangula empaka eziddirira ez'akamalirizo era mw'akyasinze okuddukira eddakiika entono (eddakiika 2:02.38). Empaka z'akamalirizo zaawangulwa Omumerika Ajee' Wilson mu ddakiika 2:00.91, nga ye Nanyondo ye yasemba ng'addukidde eddakiika 2:07.23.
2013.
Mu 2013 mu mpaka za Summer Universiade eza mmita 800 , yawandukiramu mu luzannya oluddirira olw'akamalirizo nga yaddukira eddakiika 2:02.96. Mu mbeera y'emu era mu mpaka eza mmita 1500 yawandukirako ku mutendera gwe gumu bwe yaddukira eddakiika 4:28.77.
2014.
Mu 2014, Uganda ye yategeka empaka za Universiade World Cross Country Championships. Wano Nanyondo yakulemberamu ttiimu eyawangulira mu busikonda 30.
Ekiseera ekyaddirira mu mwaka ogwo yayongera ku mutindo n'awangula emisinde egya mmita 800 ng'addukidde eddakiika 1:59.27 mu mpaka za Golden Spike Ostrava.
