Pulezidenti museveni yawagira enteekateeka z'okusaanyaawo Mabira ng'awoza nti ye tagenda kutabulwatabulwa bantu batalaba biseera bijja bya mu maaso ebya Africa we biri. Okusinziira ku ye, abaali beefuula abalwanirizi ba Mabira baali tebategeera biseera bya mu maaso by'amawanga biri mu kuteekateeka nnungamu. Mu mwaka gwa 2007,minisita wa Uganda ow,obutonde bw'ensi yalangirira nti enteekateeka z'okusaanyawo Mabira zaali zikyayimiriziddwa nti era gavumenti ya Uganda yali ekyagezaako okufunira kampuni ya Mehta ettaka eddala eritali lya Mabira. 

Mexico:
Mexico (oba Mexico, "United Mexican States", MX), ensi mu North America.

Enjuba:
Enjuba (akabonero: )

Omwezi:
Omwezi (akabonero: )

Sembuya Nalumu Mary:
Mary Nalumu Sembuya (yazaalibwa 1943 - yafa nga 8 Gwamukaaga 1979) yali musawo mutendeke (Senior Nurse).
Famire.
Omugenzi Nalumu Sembuya yali mukyala w'omugenzi Sembuya Christopher Columbus era baazaala abaana bataano.
Okufa.
Omugenzi Nalumu Sembuya yattibwa ababbi ababayingirira mu maka gaabwe e Kololo nga 8 omwezi ogwoomukaaga 1979. Ababbi abo baali bannamagye b'ensi ya Tanzania.

Yafesi Magulu:
Yafesi Magulu (Yazaalibwa - Yafa 1999) yali mulimi wa kooko e Nkokonjeru, Buikwe. 
Famire.
Yafumbirwa Rachel Magulu ne bazaala abaana basatu. Omugenzi Sembuya Christopher Columbus, Omugenzi Henry Buwule n'omugenzi Michael Mayanja.
okufa.
Yafa mu 1999 ku Sembule Steel Mills Limited e Nalukolongo.

John Chrysestom Muyingo:
 k
abineti ya Uganda.
John Chrysestom Muyingo munnayuganda era musomesa ate munnabyabufuzi. Ye minisita w'ebyenjigiriza ebya waggulu mu kabinenti ya Uganda. Yalondebwa ku kifo ekyo nga 6 Ogwomukaaga 2016.Yasooka kuweereza nga minisita w'ebyenjigiriza ebya pulayimale okuva nga 1 Ogwokusatu 2015 okutuuka nga 5 Ogwomukaaga 2016.
Ng'ekyo tekinnabaawo, okuva nga 27 Ogwokutaano 2011 okutuuka nga 1 Ogwokusatu 2015, yaweereza nga minisita w'ebyenjigiriza ebya waggulu, ng'adda mu bigere bya Mwesigwa Rukutana. Muyingo era yali mubaka wa palamenti ow'essaza lya Bamunanika, mu disitulikiti y'e Luweero. Yawangulwa mu ekifo ky'omubaka wa paalamenti era nga yawangulwa eyeesimbawo ku ludda oluvuganya okuva mu NUP mu kulonda kwa 2021.
Ebyafaayo n'obuyigirize.
Muyingo yazaalibwa nga 22 Ogwokubiri 1960 nga kitaawe ye John Chrysestom Ssekidde ow'okukyalo Kakoola ekisangibwa mu ssaza ly'e Bamunanika, mu disitulikiti y'e Luwero,ate nnyina ye Victoria Nakiwala ow'e Naakulabye, mu divizoni y'e Rubaga, mu Kampala ekibuga kya Uganda ekikulu. Yasomera mu Mulajje Primary School, Kisubi Seminary, ne Makerere College School, nga tannaba kwegatta ku Makerere University mu 1983. Yafuna diguli ye eyasooka mu mwaka gwa1986 mu bya ssaayannsi wamu ne byenjigiriza. Era alina Master of Arts in Educational Management, gye yafuna mu 1996, ne diguli eyookusatu eya Doctor of Philosophy gye yafuna mu mwaka gwa 2004, byombi okuva ku Makerere University. Ekitabo kye yawandiika ekyamusobozesa okufuna ddiguli ye eyookusatu kyali kikwata ku kuteeka ensimbi mu byenjigiriza bya yunivasite mu Uganda.
Emirimu gye..
Muyingo yatandika omulimu gwe ogw'okusomesa ku Ndejje Secondary School gye yasomesa essomo lya chemistry n'okubala. Oluvannyuma yasomesa ku St. Joseph's School Nsambya gye yafuukira akulira eby'ensoma. Oluvannyuma yatwalibwa mu St. Joseph Secondary School Naggalama, e Naggalama, mu disitulikiti y'e Mukono. 
E Naggalama yafuuka omukulu w'essomero ng'essomero likyali lya O-Level yokka (S1 - S4). Yatandikawo ekisulo ky'abalenzi ku kasozi e Naggalama, wadde ng'akakiiko k'essomero kaali tekanakiteeka mu nkola. Oluvannyuma yatandika eddaala lya A-Level (S5 - S6) mu ssomero eryo. Okuva e Naggalama, mu 1992, yakyusibwa n'atwalibwa ku Uganda Martyrs' Secondary School Namugongo, eritunudde mu maasog'ekiggwa ky'abajulizi e Namugongo..
Bwe yatuuka e Namugongo, okusoomoozebwa kwe okwasooka kwali kwa kulaakulanya n'okusitula omutindo gw'essomero, eryali mu mbeera embi ddala. Abasomesa badddanga awaka ku Lw'okutaano ne bakomawo ku Bbalaza, olwo ne baleka abayizi bokka ku wiikendi. Ebizimbe byali mu mbeera mbi, ebibiina byali tebimala nga teririna kkuumiro lya byuma bya saayansi litegeerekeka. Abasomesa abasajja baali baganza abayizi abawala. Akakiiko akakulu akatwala essomero kaali tekafaayo nnyo ku bigenda mu maaso mu ssomero. Mpolampola, omukulu w'essomero omuggya yaganyulwa mu maanyi ge yassaamu . Omwaka ogwayita nga tanaba kujja mu ssomero, essomero lyafuna abayizi bataano abayitira mu ddaala erisooka mu O-level. Mu 1992, omuwendo gwalinnya ne gutuuka ku 32, mu 1993 ne gulinnya ku 58, 64 mu 1994 oluannyuma 90 mu 1995. Okuva olwo, omuwendo gwalinnya ng'emyaka egimu lifuna ebitundu 100 ku buli kikumi eky'abayizi abayitira mu ddaala erisooka. Yaweereza mu kifo ekyo okuva mu 1992 okutuuka mu 2010.
Obuweereza bwe mu byobufuzi..
Mu mwaka gwa 2011, Muyingo yayingira mu by'obufuzi ng'avuganya ku kifo ky'omubaka wa palamenti ow'essazza ly'e Bamunanika mu Disitulikiti y'e Luweero nga talina kibiina kya byabufuzi mw'aggyidde. Yawangula ekifo ekyo n'ebitundu 92 ku buli kikumi ku bululu obwakubwa. Mu kulonda kwa bonna okwa 2011 yawangulwa munnakibiina kya NUP mu kulonda kwa 2021. . Alina pulojekiti eziwerako ezigenda mu maaso mu kitundu kye ez'okutumbula obulamu bw'abantu be. Ayambibwako Mwebe William, Matabi Christopher, ne Bazira Paul abakulira ekibinja ekikwanaganya pulojekiti ezo. Baddukanyizza pulojekiti eziwerako nga pulojekiti y'abakadde yokka eyaasoose okubeerawo mu Uganda. Pulojekiti y'okuyambako abaana abasoma mu by'okusoma eyitibwa BACEF ekulemberwa Ssenyonjo Moses, omukulu w'essomero lya St. Mary's College Lugazi era ng'ayambibwako Matabi Christopher ne Bazira Paul. Kiyambye abayizi abasoba mu 2500 abatalina nkizo okufuna obuyigirize obwa siniya. Yalondebwa nga minisita w'ebyenjigiriza ebya waggulu nga 27 May 2011. Oluvannyuma lw'okumala akaseera katono nga minisita w'ebyenjigiriza ebya pulayimale, okuva mu Gwokusatu 2015 okutuuka mu Gwomukaaga 2016, yaddamu okulondebwa ku kifo kya minisita w'ebyenjigiriza ebya waggulu nga 6 Ogwomukaaga 2016.
Bwe yali ng'akyali mu ssomero lya Uganda Martyrs' Secondary School, yasisinkana Rosemary Namayanja gwe yawasa mu mwaka gwa 1992 era balina abaana mukaaga. Omukyala ono y'akulira amasomero ga Seeta High Schools agali e Sseeta mu disitulikiti y'e mukono. Muyingo n'ab'enju ye be bannannyini masomero gonna aga Sseeta High schools. We twogerera kati gawera ana (4) era gaweza abakunukiriza mu 4500 nga bagatiddwa wamu. Era bagguddewo amasomero ga primary asatu (3) nga gonna gakozesa erinnya lya Seeta Junior school ate mu ngeri y'emu balina n'amasomero g'abato aga Kindergaten nga galina amatabi abiri(2). Ngogyeko eby'obukulembeze bw'amasomero Muyingo yakazibwako erinnya erya 'Musajja wa Kabaka. Emabegako yaweerezaako nga Minisita w'eby'enjigiriza mu gavumenti ya Ssaabasajja kabaka era nga yalondebwako emirundi egyawera ebiri nga Minisita asinze okuweereza obulungi. Erinnya lye etuufu ye Miyingo naye nga yaliwandiisa nga muyingo bwe yali ng'akyali muto, Miyinga kitegeeza omuti omunene ogukozesebwa okuziba omulyango gw'ekiraalo.

Rita Atukwasa:
Rita Atukwasa mubaka mu lukiiko lwa Uganda olukulu mu lutuula olw'okkumi n'emu. Mukugu mu kwekenneenya enkola okutambulira eggwanga. omukugu mu by'ekikula ky'abantu era omutendesi w'ebyenfuna n'obwenkanya. Era yali akulira ekitongole kya The Institute for Social Transformation (IST) Uganda. Ye mubaka omukyala akiikirira ekibuga Mbarara mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga olukulu, oluvannyuma lw'okuwangula mu kalulu akaakubwa mu gatonnya wa 2021 nga yeesimbawo ku bwannamunigina. Rita y'omu ku batuula mu lukiiko lw'ekibiina ekirwanirira obwenkanya eri abakyala. 
Obuyigirize.
Rita Atukwasa yatikkirwa diguli mu nkolagana n'abantu n'ebyobufuzi okuva ku ssetendekero wa makerere mu 2001. Era yafuna dipuloma ya okuva mu Institute for Training for Transformation South Africa. Oluvannyuma yakola diguli mu byobufuzi n'obufuzi okuva mu Uganda Management Institute mu 2016.
Emirimu.
Rita Atukwasa yakulirako enteekateeka mu kibiina kya Advocacy human Rights for the Kamwokya Christian Caring Community okuva mu mwezi gwa muwakanya wa 2004 okutuuka mu 2011. Oluvannyuma Rita yaweereza ng'omukulu of the Parliament Of Uganda okutuusa nga kasambula, 2012. Oluvannyuma yaweereza nga omwekenneenyi w'enkola z'obukulembeze mu kitongole kya Institute for Social Transformation okuva mu gwomunaana gwa 2012 okutuuka mu mwaka gwa 2016 nga tannafuuka akulira ekitongole kyakyo mu mwaka gwa 2016 okutuuka kati. Rita Atukwasa ye mubaka omukyala akiikirira ekibuga Mbarara mu lukiiko lw'eggwanga olulukulu.

Dorothy Nyakato:
Dorothy Nyakato Nzibonera munnabyabufuzi mu yuganda nga ye mubaka omukyala mu palamenti owa Disitulikiti y'e Kitagwenda mu Yuganda mu palamenti ey'ekkumi n'emu eya Republic of Uganda. Akolagana ne National Resistance Movement ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekifuga mu yuganda oluvannyuma lw'okulonda kwa Gatonnya, 2021. Mubalirizi w'ebitabo omukuggu era yaweereza ng'omuyambi w'omubalirizi w'ebitabo mu Human Rights Center Uganda.
Ebyafaayo n'obuyigirize.
Dorothy Nyakato ava mu disitulikiti y'e Kitagwenda mu bugwanjuba bwa yuganda. Mukristaayo era mu angulikani. Dorothy yafumbirwa Robert Kabandize mu Mugulansigo , 2022.
Ebyobufuzi.
Ye mukazi akiikirira palamenti ya disitulikiti y'e Kitagwenda olukiiko olw'ekkumi n'ogumu olwa Yuganda. Yawangula Asiimwe Joan owa Forum for Democratic Change, Ninsiima Grace eyawangulwa Dorothy mu kusunsulamu kw'ekibiina ne Kenyonyonzi Efrance eyavuganya nga yeetongodde mu kalulu ka Gatonnya, 2021 okuwangula okulonda n'obululu obusinga obungi. Era yaweereza ng'omuyambi w'omubalirizi w'ebitabo mu Human Rights Center, Uganda omulimu gw'alina n'okutuusa kati.

Jackie Senyonjo:
Ja
ckie Senyonjo
Obuzaale Jackie Senyonjo
Obutuuze Ugandan
Ekitongole God Is Alive/Mukama Mulamu
Om
ubeezi Pastor Godfrey Senyonjo 
Jackie Senyonjo mu kusooka Jackie Tumwebaze, mu Uganda Songwriter, muyimbi era mukulembeze w'abayimbi eyawangula PAM Awards Best Female Gospel Artist 2012, Olive Gospel Music awards for best video (Neetaaga Gwe) and best female artist.
Ebyafaayo n'okusoma.
Jackie ye mwana ow'okubiri mu baana bana, yagenda mu Kibuli Secondary School era yakulira mu Entebbe, maama w'abaana basatu. Mu kusooka yali Jackie Tumwebaze n'olwekyo yakyusa erinnya oluvannyuma lw'okufumbirwa Omusumba Godfrey Senyonjo omusumba omukulu owa Kansanga Miracle Center.
Omulimu.
Nga tannayingira Kansaga Miracle Center Choir, yali atandika dda okuyimba mu myaka gye egy'obuvubuka mu 1999 mu kibiina ky'ebyawandiikibwa. Jackie, ne mikwano gye babiri baatandika ekibinja ekiyitibwa EXTERNOL ne bafulumya oluyimba oluyitibwa Gyogenda (Everywhere you go) era oluvannyuma lw'ekiseera, ekibinja kyayawukana era Jackie n'agenda yekka mu 2008. Okutuusa kati afulumizza alubaam musanvu omuli Netaaga gwe, Gyogenda, Ndopera gwe,Mukama mulamu ne Nandibadewa,Okuba Omukazi ezimuleese amaaso ge ku mpapula ez'omu maaso.
Ng'oggyeeko okuyimba, Jackie yatandikawo ekibiina ky'obuyambi ekiyitibwa God Is Alive /Mukama Mulama charity organization okuyamba abantu abatasobola kusasula byetaago.
Enkaayana.
Kigambibwa nti Jackie yagattululwa ne bba Omusumba Godfrey Senyonjo oluvannyuma lw'okugambibwa nti yafumbirwa omulala Jackie n'agenda e Canada.

Margaret Aachilla Aleper:
 
Margaret Aachilla Aleper yazaalibwa nga 22 Museenene mu 1963. Munnabyabufuzi wa Uganda era omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti y'e Kotido mu palamenti ya Uganda ey'ekkumi. era nga memba mu kibiina ekifuga ekya National Resistance Movement. 
Ebyafaayo n'obuyigirize.
Margaret Aleper yatuula ebigezo bya kamaliririzo ebya pulayimale mu Kotido Mixed Primary School mu 1976. Mu 1980, yamaliriza Uganda Certificate of Education ku Kangole Girls Senior Secondary School. Yaweebwa satifikeeti mu kusomesa kwa Grade III ku Moroto Teacher Training College/Makerere University mu 1985. Mu 1997, yamaliriza dipulooma mu byenjigiriza by'abasomesa okuva mu Institute of Teacher Education, Kyambogo. Yafuna diguli ye mu byenjigiriza okuva ku Kyambogo University mu 2004.
Omulimu.
Ebyafaayo by'emirimu gye biragibwa wammanga:
Obuvunaanyizibwa obulala.
Era aweereza ng'omubaka ow'ekiseera kyonna wansi w'ekibiina ky'abasomesa mu Uganda National Teachers Union.
Enkaayana.
Yateekebwa mu babaka ba Palamenti abaalyamu Uganda olukwe.[http://freeuganda.com/forums/topic-tag/aleper-aachilla-margaret/] Yatuumibwa omu ku babaka ba palamenti abaalonda "Yee" ku musomo ogwokubiri ogw'etteeka ly'okukyusa Ssemateeka.
Okujjukiza.
Ebijulizidwa

Sheila Nduhukire:
Sheila Nduhukire (yazaalibwa nga 23 Ogwokuna 1990) munnamawulire wa Uganda, omuwandiisi w'amawulire era omukungu omukulu mu NBS Television era munnansi wa 2017 International Women's Media Foundation (IWMF) Great Lakes Reporting Initiative cohort.
Sheila yali munnamawulire omukulu mu NTV Uganda. Alipoota ye ey'okunoonyereza yakuguka mu by'obufuzi, obutakola bulungi mu byenfuna, n'ensonga z'abantu.
Obulamu bwe buto n'okusoma.
Sheila yazaalibwa mu Kazo, mu Disitulikiti y'e Kiruhura, Yagenda mu Uganda Martyr's SS Namugongo for Uganda Certificate of Education (UCE) for lower secondary education, oluvannyuma lw'okwegatta ku Bweranyangi Girls SS ku siniya ye eya waggulu emanyiddwa nga Uganda Advanced Certification of Education (UACE) era oluvannyuma yeegatta ku Mbarara University of Science and Technology (MUST) okufuna Bachelor of Business Administration, gye yalondebwa nga mukulebeze w'abayizi.
Omulimu gw'amawulire.
Oluvannyuma lw'okumaliriza emisomo gye okuva mu MUST, yakola nga munnamawulire wa "Red Pepper", olupapula lw'amawulire olw'omu kitundu era oluvannyuma n'afuna ekifo mu palamenti ya Uganda ng'akola ng'omuwandiisi w'amawulire ow'eddembe ku "Daily Monitor", ekyamuyamba okufuna obukugu obwamusobozesa okuyingira mu NTV Uganda oluvannyuma n'agenda ku NBS Television.

Alice Alaso:
Al
ice Alaso 
Alice Alaso (olumu ayitibwa Alice Alaso Asianut) (yazaalibwa nga 21 Gusooka 1969) musomesa era munnabyabufuzi Munnayuganda eyali omubaka omukyala owa Serere District mu palamenti ya Uganda ey'omunaana, ey'omwenda n'ey'ekkumi. Yali akolagana n'ekibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) mu by'obufuzi era ye yali Ssaabawandiisi w'ekibiina eyasooka okumala emyaka kkumi.
Ebyafaayo n'obuyigirize.
Alaso yafuna Bachelor of Arts in Education okuva ku Makerere University.
Ng'omusomesa, Alaso yasomesa ku Teso College Aloet wakati w'omwaka gwa 1993 ne 1997. Mu kiseera kino, yasomesanga ne ku Saint Mary's Madera.
Oluvannyuma lw'okuva ku Teso College mu 1997, yafuuka omukungu w'ekikula ky'abantu mu Disitulikiti ku pulogulaamu y'okweddaabulula oluvannyuma lw'obutabanguko nga okusinga avunaanyizibwa ku Disitulikiti y'e Kaberamaido.
Mu 2018, Alaso yava mu kibiina kya gye yali aweereza nga Ssaabawandiisi. Ensonda endala zigamba nti yagobebwa mu kibiina n'ekifo.
Yeegatta ku kibiina kya Alliance for National Transformation (ANT) era mu Gwokusatu 2022, yawandiikibwa ng'omukwanaganya w'ekibiina mu ggwanga.
Obulamu bw'omuntu.
Alaso yafumbirwa Johnson Ebaju okuva mu 2007.

Lydia Mugambe:
Lydia Mugambe, ye Kaliisoliiso wa Gavumenti okuva mu Mugulansigo 2022, munnamateeka wa Yuganda eyaweereza ng'omulamuzi mu kkooti enkulu ya Yuganda wakati wa Muzigo 2013 ne Mutunda 2020. Yalondebwa omukulembeze w'e Ggwanga Yoweri Museveni mu kkooti enkulu nga 3 Muzigo 2013. Lady Justice Mugambe Ssali oluvannyuma yalondebwa Pulezidenti Museveni nga Kaliisoliiso wa Yuganda nga 18 Mutunda 2020
Ebyafaayo n'obuyigirize.
Yamaliriza emisomo gye mu ssomero ly'amateeka mu Ssettendekero wa Makerere University, Ssettendekero esinga muYuganda obunene n'obukadde, n'afuna Diguli mu mateeka. Oluvannyuma yaweebwa dipulooma mu by'amateeka okuva mu Law Development Centre, mu Kampala, ekibuga kya Uganda ekikulu. Era yafuna Diguli ey'okubiri mu by'amateeka okuva mu University of Pretoria mu South Africa.
Emirimu gye.
Nga tannalondebwa mu kkooti enkulu, Mugambe yaweereza ng'omulamuzi mu kkooti za Uganda eza wansi. Yalondebwa mu kkooti enkulu eya Uganda nga 15 Muzigo 2013. Asindikibwa mu kitongole kya kkooti ekya Civil Division.
Mu Gatonnya wa 2017, Omulamuzi Mugambe yawa ensala ku ddwaliro lya Mulago National Referral Hospital, eryali livunaanibwa "Jennifer Musimenta" ne bba "Micheal Mubangaizi", olw'okubula kw'omwana waabwe omuwere. Omulamuzi yasanga eddwaliro nga lirina omusango gw'obuteegendereza. Mugambe era yawa abafumbo obukadde bwa USh85 (nga mu doola ya Amerika zikunukkiriza 24,000) olw'ebyayonoonebwa.
Omusango gutenderezebwa abatunuulizi b'amateeka n'ebibiina by'obwannakyewa mu Yuganda, ng'omusango ogulimu ensa, oguggyayo eddembe ly'abakyala n'abatalina mwasirizi. Omusango guno gwaweebwa engule ya Center for Health, Human Rights and Development (CEHURD), mu 2017.

Victoria Nalongo Namusisi:
Victoria Nnaalongo Namusisi (olumu ayitibwa Victoria Okoth Nnaalongo Namusisi) (yazaalibwa nga 19 Gatonnya 1956) munnamawulire w'ebyemizannyo n'eby'obufuzi mu Uganda, omukulembeze w'ebyobufuzi era omuwagizi. Namusisi atwalibwa nga munnamawulire omukyala Munnayuganda eyasooka mu byemizannyo ng'oggyeeko okuweereza ng'omubaka wa Pulezidentimu distulikiti y'e Mpigi wakati wa 1991 ne 1997. Mu 2010, yaweebwa omudaali gwa Nalubaale.
Ebyafaayo n'okusoma.
Namusisi yazaalibwa omugenzi Paul Mukasa, omulimi era omuvubi ne Miriam Nalunga nga 19 Gatonnya 1956. Mu myaka gye egy'okukula, Namusisi yasomera ku Kisubi Girls School mu e Ntebe ne Old Kampala Senior Secondary School. Oluvannyuma yeegatta ku Institute of Public Administration (IPA) mu by'amawulire mu 1975 n'amaliriza emisomo mu 1977.
Omulimu.
Okusaka ag'eby'emizannyo.
Mu 1976, Namusisi ye munnamawulire omukazi yekka ow'ebyemizannyo ku Uganda Times . Era yakolera ku Voice of Uganda mu 1984 oluvannyuma lw'okukomawo okuva mu buwaŋŋanguse e Kenya. Mu 1988, ng'akola ku lupapula lw'amawulire olwa Ngabo, Namusisi yafulumya Olympics za 1988 mu Seoul ng'omuwandiisi w'ebyemizannyo ng'oggyeeko okuba omukuumi w'abakyala mu ttiimu.
Alipoota z'ebyobufuzi.
Mu 1986, Namusisi yakyusa n'atandika okusaka ag'eby'obufuzi era n'aweebwa obuvunaanyizibwa okusaka amawulire mu mu Palamenti ne mu maka g'obwapulezidenti.Okuva mu kifo kino we yalondebwa nga omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu disitulikiti ye Mpigi.
OBUKULEMBEZE MU BY'OBUFUZI.
Wakati wa 1991 ne 1998, Namusisi yalondebwa n'aweereza nga omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu Disitulikiti y'e Mpigi.Era yali mmemba w'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda mu 1998 olw'ekifo kye mu gavumenti ez'ebitundu.
Obuyambi.
Oluvannyuma lw'okuva mu kifo ky'omuwabuzi wa Pulezidenti mu 2003, Namusisi yatandikawo amaka ga bamulekwa ne Manuel Pinto, Bright Kids Uganda
Ebirabo.
Mu 2010, Namusisi yaweebwa omudaali gwa Nalubaale - omudaali "ogwaweebwa abalwanirizi b'eddembe ly'obuntu bonna abayambye mu nkulaakulana y'ebyobufuzi mu Uganda nga bayita mu kulwanagana n'ebyokulwanyisa oba okujeemera kw'abantu n'ebirala okuva mu biseera by'amatwale okutuuka leero." Oluvannyuma mu mwezi gwa Muzigo 2019, yafuna diguli ey'ekitiibwa eya Doctor of Humane Letters ku Carlow University, USA, nga okusinziira ku mukutu gw'ekibiina kye gwali mu "kukakasa omulimu gwe ogw'obuntu n'abantu abatalina mwasirizi mu Uganda".
Obulamu bwe.
Namusisi yafumbirwa eyali Ssaabawandiisi w'olukiiko lw'eby'emizannyo mu ggwanga, Martin Okoth, okutuusa mu 1984 lwe baayawukana. Baalina abaana basatu.

Stella Isodo Apolot:
 
Stella Isodo Apolot ye Munnamateeka wa Uganda nga bwekyali mu Mugulansigo 2021 ye mubaka w'abakyala omulonde mu disitulikiti y'e Ngora. Mu by'obufuzi, akolagana n'ekibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change.
Eby'obufuzi.
Apolot Isodo akolagana n'ekibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) nga ye yavuganya mu kulonda kwa Yuganda okwa 2016 ne 2021. Yalangirirwa ng'omukwasi wa bendera y'ekibiina mu Muwakanya 2020 oluvannyuma lw'okuwangula gweyali avuganya naye mu kusunsulamu kw'ekibiina.
Yasooka kuvuganya ku kifo kino mu 2016 n'awangulwa Jacqueline Amongin.
Obulamu bwe obw'obuntu.
Isodo Apolot yafumbirwa Samuel Isodo, munnamateeka. Alina abaana basatu: Apio Joanne, Isodo Arnold ne Okiror AllanBill.

Baby Gloria:
 
Baby Gloria (Gloria Mulungi Senyonjo) (yazaalibwa nga 28 mukulukusabitungotungo 2001) muyimbi ow'ennyimba z'eddiini mu Uganda. Yatandika okuyimba nga wa myaka ebiri n'ekitundu. Mu 2010 yawangula Tumaini Musical Award ne Olive Musical Award mu 2011.
Ebyafaayo n'obuyigirize.
Yazaalibwa John Senyonjo ne Betty Nakibuka, naye nga muyimbi w'ennyimba ez'eddiini mu Uganda. John Senyonjo y'akwasaganya ensonga Baby Gloria ne Betty Nakibuka. Baby Gloria mwana waakusatu mu maka era yatandika emisomo ku Apollo Kaggwa primary school Mengo era oluvannyuma yeegatta ku Life international school. Asaba okuva mu kkanisa ya Omega healing church e Namasuba, mu disitulikiti y'e Wakiso omusumba Kyazze gy'akulira.
Emirimo.
Gloria yafulumya oluyimba lwe olwasooka oluyitibwa Mummy mu 2005 era mu "mwaka" gwe gumu n'afulumya oluyimba olulala oluyitibwa "Sisobola kukyawa". Ng'aweza emyaka 14, Gloria yakola ekivvulu kye ekisooka ku Apollo Kaggwa primary school era ng'ayita mu kivvulu kino , yasolooza ssente okuyamba abaana abaali mu bwetaavu mu bifo bye Luzira. Ekivvulu kye ekyaddako yakitegeka mu Uganda National Museum mu 2011. Ye muyimbi, muzanyi, mukubi w'ebivuga, omuyimbi era omubaka w'ebyamaguzi bya Movit, Lotions, Universities, Sanitary pads. Era yali omu ku baabaddewo ku MTN Pulse Awards mu 2020.
Discography.
Ezimu ku nnyimba ze:
Okukolagana.
Ebimu ku nkolagana ze:
Obulamu bw'omuntu.
Baby Gloria akulira ekitongole ky'obuyambi ekiyitibwa Gloria Hearts ekiyamba abaana abatalina nkizo era yatandikawo ekitongole ky'ekisa mu 2016.

Alice Kaboyo:
Alice Kaboyo munnabyabufuzi mu Uganda. Ye minisita w'eggwanga mu yafeesi ya Ssaabaminisita ku nsonga za Luweero Triangle n'ekitundu kya Rwenzori. Yaliko omuyambi mu maka g'obwa ppulezidenti.
Ebyafaayo.
Alice Kaboyo Kizibwe w'omukyala w'omukulembeze w'eggwanga era minisita w'ebyenjigiriza n'ebyemizannyo, Janet Museveni.
Olugendo lwe mu byobufuzi.
Mu kukyala kwe e Kiruhura, Kaboyo yakkaatiriza obukulu bw'ebyobusuubuzi mu kukendeeza obwavu, okutumbula omwenkanonkano, n'okuzzaamu abakyala amaanyi mu bye bakola.
Obukuubagano.
Kaboyo nga tannaba kufuuka minisita, okulondebwa kwe kwagaanibwa nga kino kyava ku nsonga z'obutaba mwesimbu n'obuli bw'enguzi. Newankubadde gwali gutyo, erinnya lye lyakomezebwawo mu Lukiiko lw'eggwanga olukulu okukakasibwa, Olukiiko olulonda lwakubirizibwa Omumyuka w'omwogezi w'Olukiiko lw'eggwanga Olukulu Anita Among era eyagaana okulondebwa kwa Alice nga entabwe eva ku kubeera nti Kkooti erwanyisa obuli bw'enguzi yali yamuvunaanako mu mwaka gwa 2012. Yavunaanibwa omusango gw'okukozesa obubi yaafeesi ye bwe yeenyigira mu mivuyo gy'obuli bw'enguzi mu buvujjirizi okuva mu kitongole ki Global Alliance for Vaccines and Immunization (GAVI). Yavunaanibwa nga ali wamu n'abantu abalala basatu okuli, eyaliko minisita w'ebyobulamu, Jim Muhwezi, wamu n'abamyuka be, Mike Mukula ne Alex Kamugisa.

Bakulembeze ba'Afirika abomulembe omujja:
Imege

Mugisha Muhanga Margaret:
Mugisha Muhanga Margaret era amanyikiddwa nga "Muhanga Magaret", mukyala munnabyabufuzi mu Uganda. Omukyala ono ye Minisita w'ebyobulamu ebitandikirwako nga yalondebwa Yoweri Kaguta Museveni mu mwaka gwa 2021, omukyala ono Munnalotale, Munnamawulire, yeebuuzibwako mu by'enkulaakulana ate era nga musuubuzi. Margaret yaliko omubaka wa disitulikiti y'e Kabarole mu ppaaliyamenti eyoomunaana ate era yaliko omubaka w'essaza ly'e Burahya mu ppaaliyamenti ya Uganda ey'omulundi ogw'ekkumi. Oluvannyuma yaddamu okwegatta ku lukiiko lw'eggwanga olukulu ng'omubaka wa disitulikiti ya Kabarole ey'Amambuka mu kibuga Fort Portal. Wano yali akiikirira ekitundu kino mu Ppaaliyamenti ya Uganda ey'omulundi ogw'ekkumi n'ogumu nga ali ku kkaadi y'ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekiyitibwa National Resistance Movement.
Obulamu bwe.
Mugisha Muhanga Margaret yazaalibwa Constance Muhangazima Adyeri. Mukyala mufumbo era nga omwami we ye Michael Mugisa, eyaliko ssentebe wa Disitulikiti y'e Kabarole era akulira ekitongole ky'ebibira mu ggwanga nga alina abaana bangi b'alabirira era nga bangi ku bbo bamulekwa. Omwami wa Muhanga yasikira Damiano Akankwasa mu National Forestry Authority, oluvannyuma lwa Akankwasa okusingisibwa omusango gw'okukozesa obubi yafeesi n'aleetawo okufiirizibwa obuwumbi bwa ssente za Uganda bubiri mu obukadde lunaana.
Ye mwannyina wa Andrew Mwenda omukulu, munnamawulire ate nga Munnayuganda. Omukyala ono era mwannyina wa Munnamagye Maj. Gen Kayanja Muhanga ne Maj. Henry Baguma, Omukulembeze ow'ebyafaayo mu kitongole ki Internal Security Organisation (ISO). Mu biseera bye eby'eddembe Muhanga anyumirwa nnyo okufumba n'okulongoosa ennyumba ye.
Okusoma kwe.
Yasomera ku Nyakasura School. 
Emirimu gye.
Yaweebwa omulimu mu New Vision ku ntandikwa y'emyaka gya 1990, nga y'asaka aga ppaaliyamenti. Margaret yatandikawo ekibiina kya bannamawulire abagasakira mu ppaaliyamenti ya Uganda nga wano yali wamu ne Henry Ochieng eyali ssentebe w'ekibiina kino ate nga Margaret ye mumyuka we. Y'akulira Diamond Empowerment Limited ne Fort Fun City Fort Portal. Yaweerezaako ng'omukozi mu yaafeesi y'omukulembeze w'eggwanga.
Yaliko omubaka wa ppaalamenti omukyala akiikirira disitulikiti y'e Kabarole wakati wa 2006–2011 era oluvannyuma yafuuka omubaka w'essaza lya Burahya erisangibwa mu disitulikiti y'e Kabarole. Yakiikirira ekitundu kino mu Ppaaliyamenti ey'omulundi ogw'ekkumi. Yayingira ebyobufuzi olw'okwagala okuyamba abantu, kyokka talina bwagazi mu byabufuzi.
Okukuubagana.
Mu mwaka gwa 2021, yategeeza eyaliko omukubiriza wa ppalamenti, Rebecca Kadaga nti yali asobola okudda e Busoga n'alima ebikajjo. Kino kyaliwo oluvannyuma lwa Kadaga obutassa kitiibwa mu kusalawo kw'ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM) okw'okusimbawo omugenzi Jacob Oulanyah ku ky'obukubiriza bwa ppaalamenti wadde nga yakola endagaano mu mwaka gwa 2016 Oulanyah mwe yasalirawo obutamuvuganya
Abadde yeekobaana okunyagako UBC ettaka lyayo.
Yali omu ku baakulemberamu okwekalakaasa okw'obuwanguzi mu Ppaalamenti era n'akunga bannamawulire bonna okuva mu kkampuni ez'enjawulo mu mwaka gwa 1999 era bannamawulire ne basalawo obutaddayo okumala wiiki emu kubanga baali baagala yaafeesi ate nga ppaalamenti tegibawa.

Sylvia Muzila:
 Sylvia Muzila yadira James Kgalajwe mu bigere ku bwa Meeya bwa Francistown wabula naye oluvannyuma n'avaawo Godsang Radisigo n'adda mu kifo kye.
Yaliko kansala ow'enjawulo ku kakiiko ka Francistown.
Ebimukwatako:Yazalibwa Sylvia Tabitha Nlea mu Dombodema ekya Zimbabwe
Ekibiina kye eky'eby'obufuzi:Botswana Democratic Party (BDP)
Alma mater: Yunivasite ye Birmingham
Ebimuwereddwa: Botswana Presidential Order of Meritorious Seravice mu 2005
Sylvia Muzila gwebatera okuyita Sylvia Tabitha Muzila née Nlea munabyabufuzi wa Motswana nga ye meeya omukyala eyasooka mu kibuga kya Francistown ekya Botswana. Alina akakwate ku kibiina kya Botswana Democratic Party (BDP), nga yalondebwa mu 2014 okutuusa mu 2019. Muzila era y'omu kubakazi abaasooka okwegata ku poliisi ya Botswana.
Ebyafaayo n'obuyigirize.
Muzila yazaalibwa Sylvia Tabitha Nlea mu Dombodema, Zimbabwe. Alina diguli mu Urban Development ng'oggyeeko diguli ya Master's of Social Science in Development Administration gye yafuna mu 1989 okuva ku University of Birmingham mu Bungereza.
Omulimu.
Muzila y'omu ku bakazi omunaana abaasooka okwegatta ku poliisi ya Botswana mu Francistown mu 1971 gye yava mu 1978 Oluvannyuma yeegatta ku Selebi Phikwe Town Council ng'omuwandiisi w'ebitundu n'oluvannyuma n'atwalibwa mu Self Help Housing Agency (SHHA). Oluvannyuma lw'okusoma Masters, yaweereza ng'omukungu w'amayumba mu minisitule y'ettaka n'amayumba mu Botswana.
Wakati wa 1996 ne 2008, Muzila yali kamisona wa Disitulikiti, eyasooka ku Gaborone, nga tannalondebwa ku Kweneng, mu bukiikakkono bw'ebuvanjuba n'oluvannyuma ku Francistown mu 2008.
Muzila yeegatta ku byabufuzi mu 2008. Mu Ddesemba 2014, ku tikiti y'ekibiina kya Botswana Democratic Party (BDP), Muzila yalondebwa nga tavuganyiziddwa okumala emyaka ebiri n'ekitundu egyasooka ng'omukyala asooka okubeera Meeya wa Francistown oluvannyuma lw'abakungu b'ekibiina abalala okuva mu mpaka z'omukulu w'ekibuga. Yaddamu okulondebwa nga tavuganyiziddwa ku kifo kye kimu mu 2017
Era ye nnannyini Thabitha Secondary School mu Francistown.
Obulamu bw'omuntu.
Muzila yafumbirwa Robert Muzila, kansala wa Francistown, gwe yagattululwa mu 2009
Empeera.
Muzila yaweebwa ekiragiro kya Botswana Presidential Order of Meritorious Service mu 2005.

Sylvia Nayebale:
S 
Sylvia Nayebale yazaalibwa nga 22 omwezi ogwa Museenene mu 1990. Munnamawulire, musuubuzi era munnabyabufuzi, aweereza nga Omubaka wa Palamenti akiikirira akiikirira abakyala mu disitulikiti eye Gomba Palamenti ey'ekkumi (2016 to 2021).
Ebyafaayo n'obuyigirize.
Yazaalibwa nga 22 Museene 1990, mu disitulikiti eye Gomba, mu bitundu bya Buganda mu Uganda. Yasomera mu masomero agabulijjo gyeyatuulira puayimale. Yasomera ku Nabisunsa Girls' Secondary School gyeyatuuira O ne A-level. Mu 2008, yaweebwa ekifo mu University eye Makerere ettendekero erisinga obukadde n'obunene n'atikkirwa mu 2011 ne diguli mu by'amawulire. 
Obumanyirivu mu mulimu.
Nga tannayingira byabufuzi eby'ekiseera kyonna, yakolanga nga atuukirwako mu "Royal Suites", eky'okusembeza abagenyi. Mu mwaka gwe ogusembayo, yaliko omusasi w'amawulire mu Uganda Broadcasting Corporation, ekitongole kya Gavumenti ekye by'empuliziganya.
Eby'obufuzi.
Mu kulonda kw'eggwanga okwa 2016, Ms. Sylvia Nayebale yawangula ekitundu ky'abakyala mu Disitulikiti y'e Gomba, ku kibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekifuga ekya National Resistance Movement, era ye mubaka wa palamenti aliwo kati, mu kitundu ekyo.
Mu kulonda kwa NRM, Nayebale yakuba omubaka wa palamenti eyaliwo mu kiseera ekyo, Nakato Kyabangi eyafuna obululu 9,297 ku bululu 21,835 bwa Nayebale. Mu palamenti ya Uganda ey'ekkumi ye mubaka w'akakiiko ka palamenti ak'ebyobulamu n'akakiiko ka palamenti akakola ku kawuka ka siriimu n'endwadde ez'enjawulo.

Grace Kaudha:
 
Grace Kaudha, era amanyiddwa nga Grace Hailat Kaudha Magumba, (yazaalibwa nga ennaku z'omwezi 14 Ogwekkumi 1986) yali munnabyabufuzi wa Uganda era omubaka eyali akiikirira abakyala mu disitulikiti y'e Iganga mu Ppaaliyamenti ya Uganda ey'ekkumi mu mwaka gwa 2016. Yali alina akakwate ku kibiina kya National Resistance Movement. Yafiira mu ddwaliro lya Mulago National Referral Hospital e Kawempe ku Lwomukaaga nga ennaku z'omwezi 1 Ogwomusanvu 2017 ku ssaawa munaana Kigambibwa nti okufa kwe kwava ku mbeera mu lufuutifuuti eyitibwa Pre-eclampsia eyaleetebwa obuzibu bw'olubuto. Yaziikibwa ku kyalo Magogo, mu ggombolola y'e Nawaningi, mu disitulikiti y'e Iganga.
Obuweereza bwe.
Yali mubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti y'e Iganga eyadda mu bigere bya Kabaale Kwagala Olivia, era yaweereza ku kakiiko k'amateeka, eby'empisa n'ebintu ebiweebwa abantu olw'obuweereza bwabwe. Era yaliko ne ku kakiiko akokola ku by'ekikula ky'abantu, emirimu wamu n'okwekulaakulanya.
Obulamu bwe.
Yali mukyala wa Ibrahim Tooto era nga alina omwana omu.

Hellen Adoa:
Hellen Adoa (yazaalibwa nga 25 Gatonya 1977), munnabyabufuzi wa Uganda aweereza nga Omubaka mu Paalamenti akiikirira abakyala mu Disitulikiti y'e Serere mu Paalamenti ya Uganda ey'ekkumi (okuva mu 2016 okutuuka 2021).
Okuva nga 14 Ntenvu 2019, azze aweereza nga Minisita omubeezi ow'ebyenfuba, mu Kabinenti ya Uganda
Obuvo n'obuyigirize bwe.
Yazaalibwa mu Disitulikiti y'e Serere, mu ttundutundu ly'e Teso, mu Buvanjuba bwa Uganda, nga 25 Gatonya 1977. yasomera ku "Kelim Primary School." Era yasomera Sekendule ye ku "Ngora Girls Secondary School," ku mutendera gwa O-Level, nga y'amaliriza ne Satifikeeti ya Uganda Certificate of Education, mu 1992. Mu 1995, yamaliriza emisomo gya A-Level ku Ngora High School nga y'amaliriza ne Satifikeeti ya Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education.
Alina DIpuloma bbiri; nga emu ya Dipulooma mu ssomo ly'ebyabizinensi, gyeyafunira ku ttendekero lya "Victoria Business Institute, mu Tororo", ne Dipuloma endala eya Diploma in Education Management, okuva ku ssetendekero wa Uganda Martyrs University. Diguli ye eyasooka, eya Bachelor of Democracy and Development Studies ne Diguli ye ey'okubiri, mu Master of Local Governance and Human Rights, zombi zamuweebwa ku Ssetendekero wa Uganda Martyrs University.
Eby'emirimu nga tannafuuka munnabyabufuzi.
Mu bbanga ly'amyaka 15, okuva mu ntandikwa y'omwaka 2001 okutuusa ku nkomekerero y'omwaka 2015, Hellen Adoa yaweereza nga Dilekita ku masomero n'amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza ag'enjawulo, agamu nga gabwanannyini. Era ye mukulu w'essomero lya "Halcyon High School".
Emirimu gye by'obufuzi.
Yayingira mu by'obufuzi bya Uganda eby'akalulu nga y'esimbawo ng'omukyala akikirira abakyala mu Disitulikiti y'e Serere mu Paalamenti mu 2016. Yalondebwa, era ye Mubaka ow'omugaso mu Paalamenti owa Disitulikiti y'e Serere. Era awerereza mu kibiina kye by'obufuzi ekiri mu buyinza ekyaNational Resistance Movement.
Nga 14 Ntenvu 2019, yaweebwa erinnya mu Kabinenti ya Uganda nga Minisita omubeezi ow'e byenvuba, ekifo kweyalondebwa Omukulembeze w'eGgwanga Uganda Yoweri Kaguta Museveni. Yalayizibwa ku bwa Minisita Omubeezi ow'e byenvuba nga 13 Gatonya 2020.

Namaganda Susan:
 
Namaganda Susan (eyafa mu mwaka gwa 2015) yali munnabyabufuzi wa Uganda eyalondebwa mu Ppaaliyamenti ya Uganda ey'omwenda okukiikirira disitulikiti y'e Bukomansimbi. Yafuuka omubaka omukyala eyasooka owa Bukomansimbi mu ppaaliyamenti mu mwaka gwa 2011 oluvannyuma lw'okutondebwawo kwa disitulikiti eyo mu mwezi Gwomusanvu (Kasambula) mu mwaka gwa 2010.
Obuyigirize bwe.
Yasomera ku St. Mary of Lourdese primary school, ne Mengo Senior School. Susan yafuna ebbaluwa ya ssiniya eyookuna (UCE) mu Christ the King Bulinda mu mwaka gwa 2002 bwe yali tanneegatta ku St. Andrew Kagwa ne Daniel okusoma eddaala lya "A". Yasoma bya ttekinologiya (ICT) era ng'alina ddiguli mu "Cisco Certified Network Associate" gye yafunira mu ddiguli ya ttekinologiya ("Information Technology") mu mwaka gwa 2006. Mu mwaka gwa 2008, yafuna ddipulooma mu "Cisco Certified Network professional" okuva mu Ssettendekero e Makerere.
Obulamu bwe.
Namaganda yazaalibwa nga ennaku z'omwezi 10 Ogwokuna (Kafuumuulampawu), 1984, nga yazaalibwa omugenzi Simon Peter Kamala ne Elizabeth Sserunkuma Bbosa. Mu mwaka gwa 2015, Susan yafiira mu ddwaliro e Nakasero oluvannyuma lw'okufuna akabenje k'emmotoka e Mpanga, mu disitulikiti y'e Mpigi ku luguudo lw'e Masaka bwe yali nga agenda e Kampala mu lutuula lwa Ppaaliyamenti. Okusinziira ku muwandiisi w'ekibiina kya Democratic Party, Innocent Katerega, akabenje kaaliwo nga ennaku z'omwezi 11 Ntenvu, mu mwaka gwa 2015 wakati wa ssaawa musanvu (7) ne munaana (8) nga obudde bukya mu kibira ky'e Mpanga okumpi n'akabuga k'e Mpigi. Susan yasigalawo n'abaana basatu nga mw'otwalidde n'omwana omuwala ow'emyezi omusanvu. Namaganda yali mukyala w'omubaka wa ppaaliyamenti owa "East African Legislative assembly", Mukasa Mbidde eyamuwasa mu mwezi gwa Ntenvu mu mwaka gwa 2012 mu mbaga ey'obuwangwa emanyikiddwa nga (Kwanjula) eyakolebwa mu maka ga bazadde ba Susan mu kyalo ky'e Kisojjo, mu ggombolola y'e Kibange, mu disitulikiti y'e Bukomansimbi. Kyokka, Mukasa Mbidde, oluvannyuma yayanjulwa muganzi we, Fiona ku mukolo gw'obuwangwa bw'Ekinyarwanda.
Obulamu bwe mu byobufuzi.
Mu ppaaliyamenti ey'omwenda, Susan yaweereza ng'omubaka omukyala mu ppaaliyamenti nga ali ku kkaadi y'ekibiina kya "Democratic Party (DP)". Susan yayingira ebyobufuzi mu mwaka gwa 2010 oluvannyuma lw'okuweerezaako ng'omukulembeze mu "Egy Trading and Engineering Ring" e Bugolobi. Bwe yali mu Ppaaliyamenti mu mwaka gwa 2011, Susan yaweerezaako ng'omumyuka wa ssentebe omukyala ow'ekibiina kya DP mu ggwanga lyonna okuva mu Kasambula w'omwaka gwa 2015, yaliko mmemba wa "Parliamentary Scripture Union" era n'abeerako omuwandiisi omuteesiteesi ow'ekibiina kya DP mu Bukomansimbi.
Yaweerezaako nga mmemba ku kakiiko ka ssaayansi ne ttekinologiya ate ne ku kakiiko k'ebyobulimi, obulunzi n'ebyobuvubi. Yafuuka ensonga bwe yalwana ennyo ku bbeeyi y'ebirime era bw'atyo n'akazibwako erinnya lya "bbeeyiyabirime". Nga wayise ennaku nnya nga Susan amaze okufa, Veronica Nanyondo yafukibwako amafuta n'alondebwa ng'omusika wa Susan mu byobufuzi era nga kino kyaliwo mu boomunju mu kuziika kwa Namaganda.  Nanyondo yavuganya mu kifo kya mwannyina ku Democratic Party (DP) era nga 18 Ogwokubiri, 2016, yalondebwa mu ofiisi n'awangula abalala bataano.
Mu kulaba kw'omulambo gw'omugenzi Susan Namaganda ogwalindiridde mu Palamenti, omubaka wa Rwampara, Vincent Kyamadidi yagamba nti eggwanga lyafiirwa munnabyabufuzi ow'amaanyi eyali akyalina bingi eby'okuwa abantu be.

Rose Mwebaza:
Rose Mwebaza Munnayuganda aweereza nga akulira ekitongole ekivunaanyizibwa ku tekinologiya eyeeyambisibwa mu kukuuma obutondde bw'ensi, Climate Technology Centre & Network (CTCN), omukono gw'ekitongole ky'ekibiina ky'amawanga amagatte, UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) entambula ya tekinologiya, edukanyizibwa ekitongole ky'ekibiina ky'amawanga amagatte ekivunaanyizibwa mu by'okulakulanya embeera z'abantu, United Nations Industrial Development Organization (UNIDO) neeky'eby'etolodde UN Environment Programme. Mwebaza era akola nga omuwi w'amagezi era omuwandiise mu UNFCCC. 
Ebyafaayo ne n'okusoma kwe:.
Mwebaza alina diguli mu by'amateeka okuva mu yunivasite y'e Makerere, Kampala, Uganda (LL.B, Hons.) ., nga yafuna ne diguli ey'okubiri mu by'amateeka g'ensi yonna nga kuliko ne satifikeeti ey'okusoma obulungi okuva mu yunivasite ya Florida, U.S.A, diguli ey'okusatu mu kudukanya obutonde bw'ensi n'eby'obugagga by'omutaka okuva mu yunivasite ya Macquarie, Sydney mu Australia. Yakolerako ne mu Carl Duisberg Research fellow mu World Conservation Union (IUCN).
Emirimu gy'akozeeko:.
Mwebaza yali musomesa ku yunivasite y'e Makerere ng'eno yakulirako ebanguliro ly'amateeka ageekuusa ku by'enfuna n'eby'obusuubuzi, n'okubeera omumyuka w'esomero ly'eby'amateeka wakati wa 1997 ne 2008. Mwebaza yaliko omuwi w'amagezi mu kukuuma eby'obutonde bw'ensi e Nairobi mu Kenya mutendekero lya Institute for Security Studies (ISS). Ng'era yakolanga nga omuwi w'amagezi mu kitongole ekivinaanyizibwa ku by'embeera y'obudde mu buvanjuba ne bukiika ddyo bwa Afrika mu kibiiba ky'obutonde bw'ensi n'aby'obugagga by'omuttaka mu kitongole ky'amawanga amagate ekya United Nations Development Programme Bureau for Development Policy e South Afrika mu Johannesburg, South Africa. Yakolako nga kalabalaba wa pulojekiti mu yafeesi ya UNDP eya ku semazinga wa Afrika esingaanibwa mu Addis Ababa, ekya Ethiopia ng'ekwasaganya amawanga 47. Yaliko omuwi w'amagezi wa ssentebe mu kibiina ekigata amawanga ga semazinga wa Afrika, gyeyaweera ng'amagezi ku ngeri y'okulakulanya Afrika nga bakwatiddwako ekibiina kya UNDP. Yeegata ku bya baanka ng'akola ng'avunaanyizibwa ku by'obugagga by'omuttaka mu baanka African Development Bank mu Abidjan ekya Ivory Coast. Y'akulira ekitongole ekivunaanyizibwa ku tekinologiya eyeeyambisibwa mu kukuuma obutondde bw'ensi, Climate Technology Centre & Network (CTCN),omukono gw'ekitongole ky'ekibiina ky'amawanga amagatte, UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) entambula ya tekinologiya, edukanyizibwa ekitongole ky'ekibiina ky'amawanga amagatte ekivunaanyizibwa mu by'okulakulanya embeera z'abantu, United Nations Industrial Development Organization (UNIDO) neeky'eby'etolodde UN Environment Programme ne and the UN Environment Programme nga yadira Jukka Uosukainen owa Finland eyagikulira okuva 2014-2019. Mu 2021, yatekebbwa kulukalala lw'abakyala 100 abasinga okubeera abatutumufu mu Afrika.

Lucy Achiro Otim:
 
Achiro Lucy Otim, era amanyikiddwa nga Lucy Achiro Otim (yazaalibwa nga 28 Mutunda 1986) mukyala Munnabyabufuzi wa Uganda era omukugu mu kikula ky'abantu. Ye mukyala akiikirira Obukiikakkono bw'eSsaza ly'omu Konsitituwense y'e Aruu, mu Disitulikiti y'e Pader mu Paalamenti ey'ekkumi. Achiro talina kibiina ky'ebyabufuzi kyalimu mu Paalamenti ya Uganda. Yawangula ekifo mu Paalamenti nga talina kibiina mu 2016. Okubeerawo kwe nga Omubaka mu Paalamenti kwasalibwaako Kkooti ensukulumu eya Uganda bwe yasazaamu okulondebwa kwe olw'okugyemera amateeka g'ebyokulonda kubanga akakiiko akakwasaganya eby'okulonda kalemererwa okuddamu okubala obululu oluvanyuma lw'okuwangula n'obululu bubiri, nga awangula James Nabinson Kidega ow'ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM). Wabula, yakomawo nga Omubaka mu Paalamenti oluvanyuma lw'okulondebwa nate ng'omubaka w'oBukiikakkono bwe Aruu mu Paalamenti mu mwezi gwa Kafuumulampawu 2017 mu kalulu mweyawangulira Kidega, ku mulundi guno ng'amuwangudde n'ebitundu nkaaga mu bina ku asatu mu bibiri ku buli kikumi.
Obuyigirize n'obuvo bwe.
Mukyala mufumbo. Achiro yasomera ku Mary Immaculate primary school ku misomo gye egy'aPulayimale era n'akola ebigezo bye eby'akamalirizo ebya primary leaving examinations (PLE) mu 1998. Oluvanyuma yaweebwa ekifo mu ssomero lya Sacred Heart secondary school, mu Gulu, gye yatuulira ebigezo bye ebya Siniya ey'okuna ebya Uganda Certificate of Education (UCE) mu 2002. N'asomera ku Merry Land High School ku mutendera gwa A'level, era n'akola ebigezo bye ebya Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education (UACE) mu 2004. Oluvanyuma yegatta ku Yunivasite y'e Makerere era n'atikkirwa Diguli eya Bachelor's degree in social sciences mu 2008. Era oluvanyuma yayongerako Diguli ey'okubiri mu Kikula ky'abantu mu 2014 okuva mu Yunivasite y'emu.
Ebyafaayo bye mirimu gye.
Achiro aweereza nga Dilekita omukulu mu kibiina ky'abakyala n'abaana ekya women and children protection initiative okuva mu 2012 okutuusa kaakano. Era yaweereza nga omukwanaganya w'abakyala mu kitongole kya United States Agency for International Development (USAID), Adventist Development and Relief Agency(ADRA) mu 2012. Era yali mukugu mu kikula ky'abantu mu kitongole kya oxfam international mu 2009, era yali mukugu mu kikula ky'abantu n'abaana mu kitongole ky'abakyala ekya UN Women mu 2011.
Achiro aweereza ng'Omubaka mu Paalamenti, akiikirira Konsitituwense y'oBukiikakonno bw'e Aruu mu Paalamenti y'a Uganda. Mu Paalamenti aweereza ku kakiiko k'eddembe ly'abantu era ne ku kakiiko k'ekikula ky'abantu. Y'e Minisita ow'ekikula ky'abantu ku Kabinenti ey'ekisiikirize.
Mmemba omujjuvu mu bitongole eby'obukugu bibiri. omuli eky'abaana ekiyitibwa Child protection working group of Uganda, n'ekya Gender cluster eky'omu Bukiikaddyo bwa Sudan. Achiro Mmemba mu kibiina ky'abakyala ekya Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA).
Ebitakwatagana.
Okulondebwa kwa Achiro kwasooka n'ekugaanibwa kkooti ensukkulumu mu mwezi gwa Ssebaaseka 2016 olw'okugyeemera amateeka g'akakiiko akakwasaganya eby'okulonda aka Electoral commission era n'ekalagira okulonda okupya. Lucy Achiro Otim yaddamu n'alondebwa ng'Omubaka mu Paalamenti ow'oBikiikakkono bwa Konsitituwense t'e Aruu mu Disitulikiti y'e Pader oluvayuma lw'okuwangula abaali besimbyewo abataano mu kulondebwa okwategekebwa okujjuza ekifo mu mwezi gwa Mukutulansanja nga 6 nga Kkooti ensukkulumu y'eyali efuga. Yagamba oluvanyuma lw'okuwangula akalulu nti tiimu ye yasanga okutiisibwatiisibwa n'okusoomozebwa mu nsonga z'assente n'ewankubadde basobola okubivvuunuka.
Mu 2017, Achiro Lucy Otim yazilikira mu bisenge bya Paalamenti mu kwekalakaasa kw'aBabaka mu Paalamenti ab'oludda oluvuganya Gavumenti era yafulumizibwa w'abweru oluvanyuma lw'okuzirika.

Judith Adong:
 
Adong Judith MunnaUganda omuwandiisi w'emizannyo era omulagirizi wa firimu. Yasoma era natikkibwa ku Yunivasite y'e Makerere, gye yasomera okuwandiika n'okuzannya firimu. Mu mwezi gwa Kasambula 2011, y'e muwandiisi yekka eyavva ku lukalu lwa Afirika ku bawandiisi b'ensi yonna ayakiika mu lukiiko lwa bawandiisi olwa Royal Court Theatre, gye yazimbira emizannyo gye omuli "Just Me, You and the Silence", egyazanyibwa mu New Black Fest mu mwezi gwa Mukulukusabitungotungo 2011. Yayogerera omuzannyo gwe ku Old Vic Theatre mu Bungereza, mu 2012. Era yali muyizi mu kibuga ekya New York ekikungirizibwa nga kyatandikibwa Robert Redford Sundance Institute mu pulogulaamu yaTheatre Program Lab ne Mira Nair's Maisha Film Lab (2008). Mu 2007, ye Munnuganda yekka eyaweebwa omulimu ku telefayina y'e Kenya eyasooka mu kulaga emizannyo eya M-Net, "The Agency". Egimu ku mizannyo egizanyibwa ku Ladiyo mu mannya ge mulimu "Rock Point 256" (2005), "River Yei Junction" (2007) ne "Take My Hand" (2011).
Okuwandiika.
Mu mwezi gwa kafuumuulampawu 2011, yayitibwa insitituti y'abaSudani eya Sundance Institute Theater Program wamu n'enkolagana n'abazanyi ba 651 Arts, ekitongole ky'abanzannyo ekiwagira emboozi z'aBafirika, mu kugoberera olukyala lwe mu kibuga kya New York, gye y'enyigira mu misomo egyenjawulo ku nguudo zi mwasanjala ne ku nguudo entono. Akazannyo akatono akagibwa mu muzannyo gwe ogwa"Silent Voices", akazimbibwa ku mboozi eyali eyakafubo n'abantu abakosebwa mu lutalo olwali mu Bukiikakkono bwa Uganda, ogwa somebwa ku radio y'eGgwanga eya WYNC National Public Radio mu kawungeezi akatuumibwa "Meet the Artist", nga mu muzannyo guno, abawuliriza banyumyako ne Adong ku nsonga z'omuzannyo gwe. Adong yafuna sikaala eya Fulbright Scholarship mu kukola firimu mu Yunivasite yaTemple mu Philadelphia, gyabeera kaakano. Era yeyongeddeyo nga awandiika ku by'obufuzi n'obulamu bwa bulijjo n'okubunya eby'buwangwa ku terefayina ne laadiyo mu Uganda, Kenya n'oBukiikaddyo bwa Sudan mu lulimi olungereza ne nnimi enzaliranwa eza –Luo (Acholi).
Mu 2018, yali muwandiisi era omuteesiteesi w'omuzannyo gwa "Ga-AD!, ogw'alagibwa okuva nga 26-30 Mutunda ku Yunivasite y'e" Illinois State University

Kyokuhairwa Kyaka Vicky:
Kyokuhairwa Kyaka Viccy (yafa 2008), era amanyiddwa nga "Vicky Kyaka Kyokuhairwa", yali munnabyabufuzi wa Uganda mu Palamenti ya Uganda ey'omunaana ng'akiikirira Disitulikiti y'e Isingiro. Ye kansala wa Bukanga eyasooka mu myaka egya 90.
Obulamu bw'ebyobufuzi.
Kyokuhairwa yawangula okulonda kwa 2006 mu kifo ky'omukyala mu disitulikiti ye Isingiro n'obululu 94,258. eyamuddirira Kyokuhairwe Stella Masiko Kafureka yafuna obululu 10,739, ate Biriwuija Edith Mwebaze n'afuna obululu 7,571.
Mu 2008, Vicky yafa n'abafumbo awamu n'abantu abalala babiri oluvannyuma lw'emmotoka yaabwe okukoonagana ne loole ya Fuso e Rubaale ku luguudo lwa Kabale-Mbarara. Ababala abaafa kwaliko Mathias Mulumba ne mukyala we Winnie. Winnie Kyokuhairwa yali wamu ne nnyazaala we era yaweebwa ekitanda mu ddwaliro lya Nkozi.
Palamenti era yasiima Viccy. ekyatwalibwa Nnampala wa gavumenti, Kabakumba Matsiko, eyategeeza nti omugenzi yali mukozi omunyiikivu, omukyamufu era omwesigwa eri ekibiina ekifuga ekya National Resistance Movement. Vicky era yali amanyiddwa ababaka abalala ng'omuntu yagala eby'enkulaakulana era n'ogwo mukubiriza omukulu eyali akkiririza mu bumu bw'amaka n"emirembe, omukyala ow'amaanyi, omuteesa w'amateeka omukulu eyali eky'okulabirako eri abakyala bangi mu palamenti mu nkola y'ebibiina eby'enjawulo era omusabi eyalina enkolagana ku b'enju ye n'ekitundu.
Ng'ali mu Palamenti, yaweereza ng'omubaka ku kakiiko ka palamenti ak'eby'okwerinda n'ensonga ez'omunda, eby'obugagga eb'omuttaka n'akakiiko akavunaanyizibwa ku kubalirira n'okulondoola eby'ensimbi.

Namaganda Christine:
 
Namaganda Christine (yazaalibwa mu 1986) muzanyi wa chess mu Uganda. Yafuna ekifo kya Woman Fide Master mu 2015.
Omulimu.
Yafuna ekifo ky'omutendesi wa fide Arbiter mu 2016. Era yagenda e Ivory Coast okutendeka abavubuka okuzannya chess. Akiikiridde Uganda mu mpaka z'ensi ez'enjawulo mu mizannyo egya CommonWealth mu Buyindi, 43rd Batumi Olympiad. Era awangudde empaka z'abakyala ez'omu kitundu, emirundi egisukka mu musanvu. Era yawangula empaka z'abakyala, Queens of Chess.

Kiboijana Margaret N:
 
Ki
boijana Margaret N
Eg
gwanga Munayuganda
Am
annya amalala Kiboijana Margaret Namara
Om
ulimu Munabyabufuzi
Ek
ibiina ky'eby'obufuzi Forum for Democratic Change
Om
ugendo National Resistance Movement
Kiboijana Margaret N oluusi ayitibwa Kiboijana Margaret Namara munnabyabufuzi wa Uganda eyaweerezako ng'omubaka wa Uganda mu palamenti ya Uganda ey'omunaana n'ey'omwenda ng'ali mu Forum for Democratic Change mu Disitulikiti y'e Ibanda.
Eby'obufuzi.
Yali omu ku babaka ba palamenti abawakanya ekiteeso ky'etteeka erirwanyisa okweyimirirwa nga likyogerako ng'eritaali mu mateeka. Ekiteeso ky'okukyusa ssemateeka ekya Pulezidenti Museveni okugaana okweyimirirwa kw'abeekalakaasi, wamu n'abamenyi b'amateeka abalala kyali kikubaganyizibwako ebirowoozo mu kakiiko k'ekibiina ekifuga. Era yali omu ku babaka abakyala abaali baagala okwesimbawo mu 2021-2026, Disitulikiti y'e Ibanda wansi w'ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekya NRM. Yali omu ku balonzi ba NRM abaalondebwa mu kalulu ka 2020 mu kakiiko k'ebyokulonda. Margaret mulwanirizi w'okulwanyisa obwaavu era agabidde abatuuze b'e Disitulikiti y'e Ibanda ensigo z'emwanyi, embuzi n'embizzi. Kiboijana awaddeyo obuyambi eri SACCO, amasomero n'amakanisa ag'enjawulo.

Jane Frances Kuka:
Jane Frances Kuka ow'ekitiibwa, mubaka wa Kapchorwa omukyala mu palamenti nga eyadira Gertrude Kulany mu bigere
Yaliko minisita omubeezi ow'ekikula ky'abantu n'okulakulanya ebitundu wabula nga Baguma Isoke yeyamudira mu bigere.
Yaliko Residenti District Commissoner wa Kapchorwa mu 2007 ng'adira Tezira Jamwa mu bigere, wabula naye oluvannyuma yavaako Joseph Arwata n'atwala ekifo kino.
Ebimukwatako nga omuntu:
Yazalibwa Jane Frances Yasiwa
Eggwanga: Munnayuganda
Ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi: National Resistance Movement (NRM)
Ommwami we: Stephen Kuka
Gyeyasomera: Gamatui Primary School, Nyondo Teachers College e Mbale, Ggaba Teachers College.
Omulimu: Munabyabufuzi era alwana okulaba nga omwana omiuwala oba omukyala tebamusala mbalu Anti FGM activist
Jane Frances Kuka munnayuganda omusomesa ng'era avumirira eby'okusala abaana ab'obuwala embalu, anti-Female Genital Mutilation (FGM) activist, munabyabufuzi eyaliko omukiise wa Kapchorwa mu palamenti ey'omukaaga wakati wa (1996 ne 2001), wabula nga Gertrude Kulany yeyamudira mu bigere. Yaliko minisita omubeezi ow'ekikula ky'abantu n'enkulakulana okuva mu 1996 okutuusa 1998, yaliko minisita omubeezi ow'ebigwa tebiraze mu 1999 gyeyava oluvannyuma nebamufuula Resident District Commissioner wa disitulikiti ya Kapchorwa 2007 ng'adira Tezira Jamwa mu bigere.
Ebyafaayo bye n'eby'enjigiriza:.
Kuka yazalibwa Jane Frances Yasiwa mu Sipi, Kapchorwa ne Miriam Chelangat mu myaka gya 1950 eyo. Yasomera ku Gamutui Primary School, gyeyava oluvannyuma mu 1966 okwegata ku kutendekero lya Nyondo Teachers College Mbale. Yayita ng'afuuse omusomesa 1969 . Kuno yakwongerezaako ng'agenze ku Ggaba Teachers College gyeyava ng'omusomesa w'ekibiina eky'okusatu.
By'azze akola:.
Okusomesa.
Kuka yali musomesa wa muziki ku Gamutui Primary School mu 1969. Mu 1988, yakuzibwa n'afuulibwa akulira etendekero lya Kapchorwa Teachers’ College.
Eby'obufuzi:.
Kuka yalemererwa okwesimbawo okubeera mukiise mu palamenti mu 1989 ssaako n'okubeera omu kubakola amateeka agatambulirwako eggwanga Constituent Assembly elections mu1994. Wabula oluvannyuma yalondebwa nga omukyala omukiise mu palamenti ey'omukaaga ng'akiikirira Kapchorwa.
Ng'ogyeko okubeera omukiise wa palamenti, yayongerko okubeera minista omubeezi o'w'ekikula ky'abantu n'okulakulanya ebituntu wakati wa 1996 ne 1998. Mu 1999, yatwalibwa n'afulibwa minista omubeezi ow'ebigwa tebiraze n'abanoonyi boobubudamu.
Mu 2007, yalondebwa nga Resident District Commissioner wa disitulikiti ya Kapchorwa nga baddamu nebamulonda mu kifo kyekimu mu 2014. Wakati awo, yakola nga omumyuka w'omuwandiisi wa pulezidenti ow'ekyama.
Okuvumurira abasala abaana embalu:.
Nga omukulembezze w'etendekero lya Kapchorwa Teachers College mu 1988, Kuka yawona okutibwa ekibinja ky'anatu kuba yali tawagira kakiiko ka disitulikiti Kapchorwa akaali kaatekawo eteeka erikiriza abaana abawala okubasala embalu. Kuka nga ye kino yakiyita nga ekintu ekibi ennyo era ekikyamu kuba baali bakikola abantu abasobola kwerwanako.
Yakazibwaako eky'okubeera omuzira mu ky'okulwanisa abasala abakyala wamu n'abawala embalu nga kino yakivumirira ne mu mwanga g'ensi ez'enjawulo gyeyalaga nga.
Obulamu bwe:.
Mu 1972, yafumbirwa Steven Kuka
Ebimuwereddwa n'okumulabawo:.
Mu 2012, Kuka yaweebwa awaadi y'okubeera omuntu wa bulijjo, civilian award - The Distinguished Order of the Nile nga eri mu kiti eky'okuna mungeri y'okumwebaza olw'okulwanirira omwana ow'obuwala obutamusala mbalu.
Mu kumulaba ng'eyalwanirira eddembe ly'omuwala obutamusala mbalu, Female Genital Mutilation (FGM), Kuka yaweebwa awaadi ya Tumaini Lifetime Achievement award mu2013 
Laba ne.
Gertrude Kulany
Female Genital Mutilation (FGM)

Susan Muwonge:
Susan Muwonge munnayuganda eyazalibwa mu 1977 nga muvuzi wa mmotoka za mpaka mu Uganda era omusomesa eyakazibwako erya 'Super Lady' ne naabagereka w'endiima, 'Queen of Speed' mu 2011 oluvannyuma lw'okufuuka omukazi eyasooka okuwangula empaka za Uganda eza Uganda's national rally championships.
Okusoma.
Yazaalibwa kitaawe Kitonsa Fred ne nnyina eyafa yali Namukasa Regina era yagenda ku St Mary's Primary School Nabbingo ku ssomero lye erya pulayimale (PLE), n'amaliriza Uganda Certificate of Education (UCE) okuva ku St Henry's Buyege Girls' Secondary School ne Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education (UACE) okuva ku Gombe Secondary School. Yasomera ku Makerere University n'afuna Bachelor's in Business Administration n'oluvannyuma yeegatta ku Kyambogo University n'afuna Bachelor's in Early Childhood Education.
Omulimu.
Nga bamaze okumaliriza emisomo, ye ne bba Lawrence Muwonge baatandika essomero lya St Francis Junior School mu Buddo Wakiso District. Yagula emmotoka ye eyasooka ey'empaka, Mitsubishi Evo 2 eyali evugibwa Jamil Ssenyonjo n'atandika okuvuganya mu 2005. Mu mpaka ze ezisooka mu Rakai, yamaliriza mu kifo eky'omukaaga. Omulimu gwe ogw'empaka gwatandika mu 2007 ku Garuga Racing Track. Yafuuka omukyala eyasooka okuwangula National Rally Championship (NRC) mu Noovemba 2011, ng'akuba Ponsiano Lwakataka mu 300 km Independence rally ku Festino City Race Circuit. Muwonge bw'atayigiriza, anyumirwa okulima, okukola n'okuyimba.

Derrick Nyeko:
 Derrick Nyeko mukiise mu palamenti owa Makindye East eya disitulikiti ya Kampala nga yalondeddwa mu 2021 okutuusa kati, nga yadira Ibrahim Kasozi eyavaako.
Ebimukwatako: Yazalibwa mu 1992 mu ddwaliro ly'e Nsambya mu Kampala ng'era munnayuganda.
Ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi: National Unity Platform (NUP)
Eby'obufuzi ebirala byeyeekusaako: National Resistance Movement (NRM) nga eno gyeyava
Derrick Nyeko Keko munnayuganda eyazalibwa 1992 nga munabyabufuzi akiikirira Makindye East mu palamenti eya 11 okuva mu 2021 ne 2026 n'okubeera minista ow'ekisikirize owa pulezidenti wamu n'eby'obukuumi Memba w'ekibiina ekivuganya gavumenti ekya National Unity Platform (NUP) ng'awagira n'ekisinde kya People power, Our Power Movement, wabula mu kusooka yaliko ne mu kibiina ekifuga ekya National Resistance Movement (NRM) .
Omulimu.
Nyeko yaweereza ng'omuwandiisi w'ensonga z'abayizi mu Uganda Youth Council for Market Zone mu 2011. Oluvannyuma yalondebwa ng'omuwandiisi w'ebyempuliziganya mu mwaka gwe gumu era n'akola n'akakiiko k'abavubuka mu Buganda ku mutendera gw'ekitundu. Era yaweereza nga Youth Councilor wa Makindye Urban Council era nga NRM Youth Council Publicity Secretary for Kampala, ekifo ekyaleetawo enkaayana kubanga yalabibwa ng'ali mu bibiina by'ebyobufuzi bibiri, NRM ekifuga n'ekivuganya National Unity Platform (NUP).
Okukwatibwa.
Nyeko yakwatibwa n'ateebwa mu biseera eby'enjawulo mu kampeyini ze ez'omubaka, era n'omukulembeze wa NUP Bobi Wine mu kampeyini za Bobi ez'obwapulezidenti ne mu kwekalakaasa olw'abawagizi b'oludda oluvuganya abaabula.
Ebyafaayo n'okusoma.
Nyeko yazaalibwa mu ddwaliro lya Nsambya mu Kampala mu 1992 mu bazadde ba Japadhola, Mr. Paineto Ofumbi ne Mrs. Florence Ofumbi. Yakulira mu Wabigalo, Namuwongo mu disitulikiti y'e Kampala mu maka g'abantu mukaaga. Yasomera ku Ebenezer Primary School e Wabigalo, St. Peter's Secondary School Nsambya ku O-Level ye ne St. Mary's College Lugazi ku A-Level. Oluvannyuma yasomera mu Kampala Film School gye yasomera dipuloma mu firimu.

Angella Katatumba:
Angella Franklin Keihongani Katatumba nga 21 Mukutuansanja 1989 muyimbi munayuganda, omuwandiisi w'ennyimba, omuwagizi, munnabyabufuzi era omusuubuzi.
Obulamu obwasooka, obuyigirize n'ensibuko.
Angella yali mu Nairobi, Kenya. Ye muwala w'omubaka wa Pakistan mu Uganda, H.E Prof. Boney Mwebesa Katatumba ne Gertrude Katatumba omutandisi wa AFK Beauty Clinic Kabalagala. Angella alina mugandawe ne banyina musanvu; Rosemary, Allan, Dennis, Rugiirwa (omulongo wa Angella), Colin (omugenzi), Ken, Ian ne Jay.
Yasoma pulayimale mu Uganda mu Katatumba Academy, oluvannyuma n'agenda mu Belmont Senior Secondary School mu Vancouver, B.C Canada, gye yafuna dipuloma y'enkolagana n'abantu. Oluvannyuma yagenda mu Oxford Brookes University, Bungereza gye yafuna diguli mu by'enfuna n'amateeka. Era ku Oxford Brookes University, Bungereza, yagenda mu maaso n'okufuna diguli mu International Management/Public Relations. Oluvannyuma yagenda mu Chicago, Illinois, gye yakolera.
Angella bwe yakomawo ewaabwe mu Uganda, yatandika okukola ng'akulira wooteeri ya kitaawe eya Diplomaté. Taata we bwe yafa mu 2017, ng'omumyuka we, yafuuka omukungu wa Pakistan mu Uganda okumala emyaka ebiri, okutuusa Pulezidenti wa Pakistan H.E Mamnoon Hussain, lwe yalonda omuntu omulala.
Okwongera ku kuyimba, Angella yatandikawo ekitongole eky'obwannakyewa ekiyitibwa Angella Katatumba Development Foundation (AKDF) nga kyekitte omumuli ku pulojekiti z'enyimba eza Angella.
Ebintu ebikulu ebituukiddwako.
• Mu 2010 British Council yalonda Angella nga Climate Change ICON mu Uganda.
• Nga 23 May 2016, Angella yayitibwa Ssaabawandiisi w'ekibiina ky'amawanga amagatte Ban-Ki Moon, okubeerawo n'okuyimba mu lukung'aana lw'ekibiina ky'amawanga amagatte olwasooka mu Istanbul, Turkey.
• Nga 28 Museenene 2016 Angella yayitibwa African Union okukiikirira Uganda mu lukung'aana olwa Humanitarian Symposium mu Nairobi,Kenya olwali olw'omulundi ogw'okuna.
• Nga 9 Mutunda 2017, Angella yalina omuzannyo gwe ogwasooka mu Bulaaya mu Austria, oguyitibwa ‘African Gala’ ku Längenfeldgasse 13-15 Street 1120, Vienna.
Discography.
Angella yatandika okuwandiika ennyimba ze mu Uganda. N'okutuusa kati, yaakafulumya alubaamu nnya.
• Peace Album - 10 tracks; "For You Gulu", Peace ft. Buchaman, "Sikyetaga" ft. Bebe Cool, I Live For You, Let Me, I Surrender, One Minute Man ft. Bebe Cool, Success and Standing in the Rain.
• Glad I'm Alive Album - 10 tracks; Feel Alright ft. Navio, Glad I'm Alive, Thank You, The Pledge, Without You, Wind Beneath Your Wings, A Better Place ft. First Love, Forgiveness, "Ngenze Noono" ne "Gwenjagala".
• Supernatural Girl Album - ennyimba 15; "Mulago Yaffe", Together Forever, "Let's Go" Green ft. Keko, In the Air ft. Keko, Only You, The Struggle ft. NTO, "So Painful" ft. NTO, "Multiply By 2" ft. Radio and Weasel, Out of My Head ft. Kuzi Kz, "Tebatufaako" ft. Kuzi Kz, Supernatural Girl, "So Close", "Tonelabila" ft. Daddy Andre, Darling ft. Mr. Green, Strange Feelings ft. Herbert Skillz.
• Wendi Album - ennyimba 15; Inside, All About You, "Cool Down", "Mukyikiri", "Wendi" ft. Daddy Andre, "Goshodo" ft. Mbuzi Gang, Only Jesus, "Dance For You", "Hey", "Sample Dat", "Jump In" ft. Jegede, Love Me ft. Kent & Flosso, This Boy ft. Omusumba Yiga, Emotional ne "Tubigezeeko".

Cerinah Nebanda:
Cerinah Nebanda (1988–2012) yali mubaka wa palamenti ya Uganda, ng'akiikirira Butaleja District Women's Constituency. Okufa kwe ng'aweza emyaka 24, mu Ddesemba 2012, kwaviirako enkaayana mu by'obufuzi.
Okufa n'okunoonyereza okw'oluvannyuma.
Lipoota y'omukugu wa gavumenti ey'oluvannyuma lw'okufa yagamba nti enjaga, heroin, omwenge, n'ebiragalagala bingi byasangibwa mu musaayi gwa Nebanda, mu byenda, ne sampolo z'ebitundu.
Kyokka mu kuziika Nebanda, Sipiika Rebecca Kadaga yagaana lipoota eno. Pulezidenti wa Uganda Yoweri Museveni yegaana nti National Resistance Movement, ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi ye n'omugenzi Nebanda kyebaalimu, kye kyamutta. Olupapula lw'amawulire oluyitibwa "The Observer" lwalaga nti abamu ku babaka ba palamenti (MPs) ba Uganda [b'ani?] balowooza nti Nebanda yaweebwa butwa, kubanga yali avumirira gavumenti, era nti eggwanga lyali "likwata omuntu yenna ateeberezebwa okuba ng'asaasaanya ebigambo ebiri mu ttuuba eryo." Mubaakwatibwa kwaiko ababaka babiri, ng'omu ku bo yali Mohamed Nsereko.
Emabegako, olupapula lw'amawulire olwa "Daily Monitor" lwali lutegeezezza nti omusawo ab'omu maka ga Nebanda gwe baali basabye okwekebejja sampolo ze yali yakwaatibwa ng'agenda mu South Africa.
Nga 2 Gatonnya 2013, poliisi yalangirira nti baali bagguddewo okunoonyereza ku nfa ya Nebanda era ne bakigatta n'ekyo kye baayita "ekibiina ky'eddagala erikola mu nsi ezitali zimu omuli Uganda, Pakistan, ne South Sudan". Nga 4 Gatonnya, muganzi wa Nebanda, Adam Suleiman Kalungi, yakwatibwa e Kenya n'atwalibwa mu Uganda okubuuzibwa ebibuuzo poliisi. Mu mwezi gw'omusanvu 2014, yaggulwako emisango gy'obumenyi bw'amateeka egikwata ku nfa ya Nebanda .

Victoria Kakoko Sebagereka:
Victoria Kakoko Sebagereka (17 Kasambula 1946 – 4 Ogwomunaana 2021) yali munnamateeka wa Uganda, munnabyabufuzi era omulwanirizi w'akawuka ka siriimu. Yaweereza ng'omubaka omukyala mu palamenti owa disitulikiti y'e Kayunga mu Palamenti ya Uganda ey'omusanvu.
Ebyafaayo n'obuyigirize.
Sebagereka yazaalibwa Bernard Kakoko n'Omumbejja Agnes Nkwenge Bagaya Kakoko (eyali amanyidwa nga Anne Mega).
Yasomera Kasukuru Palace Nursery ne Kyebambe Primary School nga tannagenda ku Bweranyangi Girls Senior Secondary School. Yamaliriza emisomo gye egya siniya ku Maryhill High School e Mbarara.
Yasomera mu London College, Bungereza n'oluvannyuma mu Kianda College, Kenya era n'afuna ebisaanyizo eby'obwa Kalaani.
Omulimu.
Okulwanyisa ebikolwa ebinyigiriza eddembe ly'obuntu.
Kakoko yaweereza nga ssentebe w'olukiiko lw'abakyala mu 1986. Ng'omu ku baategeka olukiiko lw'ensi yonna olw'eby'obulamu bw'abakyala ku Gayaza High School mu 1990, yayita omugenzi Philly Bongole Lutaaya okwogera mu lukiiko ku mbeera ye eya HIV/AIDS.
Oluvannyuma yeegatta ku The AIDS Support Organisation (TASO) ng'omubaka.
Eby'obufuzi.
Mu kulonda kwa Uganda okwa 1994 mu Uganda Constituent Assembly, Sebagereka yalondebwa ng'omubaka akiikirira Mukono. Mu kiseera kino, yaweereza ku kakiiko k'abasajja 45 ak'okulonda aka 4 akalina obuvunaanyizibwa "okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ssuula ku; Republic, Citizenship, Local Government ne General and miscellaneous provisions" mu ssemateeka eyateekebwawo
Sebagereka oluvannyuma yaweereza ng'omubaka omukyala owa Kayunga mu palamenti ya Uganda ey'omusanvu
Okulima.
Sebagereka yali Pulezidenti w'akakiiko k'abakyala aka International Federation of Agricultural Producers ng'oggyeeko okukiikirira ekitundu ky'omu masekkati mu Uganda National Farmers Association

Joana Ntaja:
 
Joana Ntaja (25 Mukutulansanja 1984 – 8 Mukutulansigo 2015) yali munnabyabufuzi wa Malawi era meeya omukyala eyasooka mu Zomba, ekibuga kya Malawi ekikadde, wakati wa Kasambula 2014 ne Mugulansi 2015. Yali akolagana ne Democratic Progress Party.
Ebyafaayo n'obuyigirize.
Ntaja yazaalibwa Cathyreen Chimgoga Chakhaza ku Queen Elizabeth Central Hospital (QECH) mu Blantyre, Malawi. Okusinziira ku kubuuzibwa kwe yawa nga yaakamala okulondebwa nga meeya, yasomera mu masomero ga pulayimale ag'enjawulo nga "St. Pius, St Anthony, Zomba Police n'amaliriza ku Balaka Primary School". Oluvannyuma yasomera Balaka ne St. Marys Secondary Schools. Oluvannyuma yakola emisomo gy'omuwandiisi mu Michiru Secretarial College. Okuva eyo, yasomera ku Lilongwe Technical College n'afuna Advanced Diploma in Business Management.
Omulimu.
Ng'ali ku Democratic Progressive Party (DPP), Ntaja yaweereza nga Kansala wa Zomba Central Ward ku Zomba City Council.
Nga 14 Ogwomusanvu 2014, Ntaja yalondebwa nga meeya ow'omukaaga mu lukiiko lw'ekibuga Zomba era omukazi eyasooka mu kifo ekyo.
Ntaja yali memba wa
Obulamu bw'omuntu n'okufa.
Oluvannyuma lw'okwemulugunya ku musujja gw'ensiri n'obuzibu mulubuto, Ntaja yalangirirwa nti afudde nga 8 Mugulansigo 2015 mu ddwaliro lya Mwaiwathu Private Hospital e Blantyre. Yafiirwa bba, Rashid Mussa n'abaana basatu.
Ntaja yaziikibwa ku kyalo Mteje mu Chigumula

Miss Uganda:
Miss Uganda oba Miss Uganda World muzannyo gw'obwanalulungi mu ggwanga Uganda.
Ebyafaayo.
Empaka za Miss Uganda zaatandika mu 1967, omuwanguzi nga yeetaba mu mpaka za Miss World, wadde nga alina Miss Uganda omu yekka okutuuka ku fayinolo okuva lwe zaatandikibwawo. Minisitule y'ebyobulimi eragira Nalulungi wa Uganda n'ekigendererwa eky'okwongera okwagazisa abavubuka mu by'obulimi.
Mu 2014, Salim Saleh yalangirira mu lujjudde enkolagana wakati wa Miss Uganda Foundation, abategesi b'empaka z'omwaka, ne pulogulaamu ya Wealth Creation Saleh gy'akulira. Saleh yagamba nti, "Tuli kumpi okuteeka omukono ku ndagaano y'okutegeeragana ne Miss Uganda Foundation kubanga twagala okulonda Miss Uganda addako nga tusinziira ku by'obulimi era kino kigendereddwamu okusikiriza abavubuka mu kitongole kino.

Angelina Wapakhabulo:
Angelina Wapakhabulo
Angelina Chogo
Yazaalibwa nga 24 Mugulansigo 1949 (aweza egy'obukulu 73) abeera Tanzania
Munnayuganda
Mu Uganda atera kuyitibwa Maama Angelina
Yasomera mu University ya Dar es salaam
Omulimu gwe.Mulwanirizi wa nkyukakyuka,mulwanierizi wa ddembe ly'aabalwadde bwa mukenenya ate mugunjufu
Aweerezza okuva mu mwaka gwa 1980 okutuusa kati.
Omwami we ye James Wapakhabulo
Angelina Chogo Wapakhabulo (a manyiddwa ennyo nga maama Maama Angelina mu Uganda) (yazaalibwa ng'ennaku z'omwezi 24 Mugulansigo mu mwaka gwa 1949) yaliko kaminsona omukulu owa Uganda mu ggwanga lya Kenya. Ye mutandisi era ayambako ssentebe wa United Way Board. Wapakhabulo mulwanirizi wa nkyukakyuka mu kitundu era ng'akolerera kukyusa mbeera z'abantu.
Emirimu gye.
Ng'omukwanaganya wa w'ekibiina kya Market Vendors AIDS Project (MAVAP), yakyusa obutale bw'ekibuga Kampala ne bufuuka ekifo ekigulwamu eby'amaguzi abaguzi n'abasuubuzi gye bagulanira ate era gye bakubirizibwa okwekekebeza akawuka ka mukenenya wamu n'okufuna obujjanjabi. Wapakhabulo wamu ne pulezidenti w'ekitongole kya United Way ko ne CEO Brian Gallagher baakiikirira United Way mu lukungaana olumanyiddwa nga White House Summit olwali lukwata ku musujja gw'ensiri mu Washington D.C. ng'ennaku z'omwezi 14 omwezi gwa Ntenvu omwaka gwa 2006. 
Ebimufaako ngomuntu.
Wapakhabulo yazaalibwa era n'akulira mu Disitulikiti y'e Iringa mu Tanzania. Ng'akyali muyizi ku yunivasite y'e Dar es Salaam, yasisinkana James Wapakhabulo (ng'ennaku z'omwezi 23 Mugulansigo okuva mu 1945 okutuuka ng'ennaku z'omwezi 27 Ogwokusatu omwaka gwa 2004), eyali minisita w'ensonga z'ebweru, okuva mu mwaka gwa 2001 okutuuka mu 2004. Baali bafumbo era baazaala abaana bana. Muwala waabwe, Josephine Wapakabulo y'akulira kkampuni ya Uganda National Oil Company.
Wapakhabulo n'omwami we baali mu kiseera kye kimu ku Dar es Salaam University, ne Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni mu myaka gya 1960.

Ampaire Shakira:
 
Ampaire Shakira (yazaalibwa mu mwaka gwa 1991) mukyala munnayuganda ozannyi wa Cheess nnakinku. Awaniridde ekitiibwa kya Fide ekya Woman Candidate Master okuva mu mwaka 2018. 
Ebyafaayo n'obuyigirize.
Ampaire azaalibwa mwami Bagenyi Saidi n'omukyala Kyomugisha Gloria Ruth. Yafuna diguli mu mateeka okuva mu University ya Uganda christian University wakati w'omwaka gwa 2010 ne 2014, era n'afuna ne dipulooma y'eby'amateeka okuva ku Law Development Center wakati wa 2014 ne 2015.
Emirimu gye..
Mukyala munnamateeka omutendeke. Yatandika emirimu gye ng'omuzannyi wa Chess ku myaka 11 egy'obukulu nga yasikirizibwa nnyina Kyomugisha Gloria Ruth. Waliwo lwe yayita ku lugwanyu okuwangula ekitiibwa kya Woman CandidatevMaster bwe yabuuzaako akatundutundu k'akabonero mu mpaka za Zone za 4.2 African Individual Chess Champions mu ggwanga lya Ethiopia kyokka ekyo tekyamuyinula ttama. Ampaire yawangula bannakibiina kya Women's section of Uganda Open Chess champions n'obubonero butaano bwokka, n'awangula bannantameggwa baagwo ba WFM Ivy Clare Amoko, WFM Goretti Angolikin ne WFM Christine Namaganda. Yafuna ekitiibwa ky'omukyala asinze okuzannya Chess mu nsi yona ekya Woman Candidate Master bwe yeetaba mu mu mpaka za Chess Olympiad e Batumi mu Georgia mu mwaka gwa 2018 bwe yakiikirira Uganda mu mpaka ez'ekitiibwa mu nsi yona eza World Chess Olympiad.

Madagascar (firimu):
Madagascar, firimu mu Amerika.

Rosebell Kagumire:
Rosebell Kagumire munamawulire omunnayuganda awandiika ku bikwatagana ku bakyala, awandiika ku mikutu ng'era yawangula ne awaadi, alina omwoyo gwa Afrika ku bikwataga n'abakyala, atuusa obubaka eri abantu ab'enjawulo wamu n'okwogerera eby'obufuzi. Yaatereka wamu n'okusunsula ebikwatagana ku bakyala mu Afrika, akatuuti akaliko ebiwandiiko ebiraga abakyala abafirka byebayitamu. Memba w'akakiikko ka bulaaya akawi k'amagezi kunsonga z'abakyala ez'ebweru, ali mu kitongole ekikola okunoonyereza, okwebuuza n'okumanyisa ebikwata ku bakyala munsi yonna.
Ebyafaayo bye n'eby'okusama.
Rosebell Kagumire yagenda ku Bwerayangi Girls Secondary School gyeyamalira siniya, gyeyava n'agenjda ku yunivasite e Makerere n'asoma eby'amawulire mu 2005. Yafuna satifikeeti mu by'okulembera n'amateeka ageekyaasa kya 21 okuva mu somero lya Harvard Kennedy School ne satifikeeti mu kugonjoola obutabanguko okuva mutendekero lya Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy, Tufts University. Rosebell alina diguli ey'okubiri mu by'amawulire, eby'eddembe n'obutabanguko okuva mu kibiina ky'amawanga amagate ng'obuyinza yabukwasa yunivasite ekwasaganya eby'emirembe mu Costa Rica.
By'azze akola.
Rosebell Kagumire yakolako nga omusasi mu mpapula za Daily Monitor, ku Uganda Radio Network ne NTV Uganda wabula ng'ali ku NTV Uganda, yali akwata bifannayi bya vidiyo, okusaka amawulire n'okugafulumya. Rosebell yakola kinene mu bw'okulwanirira eddembe ng'ayita mutendekero lya Institute for War and Peace Reporting (IWPR). Kagumire yaliko omuwandiisi mu mawulire ga The Independent News magazine. Yali musunsuzi mu buvanjuba bwa Afrika ku CH16.org, n'okula ne Inter Press Services. Mu 2010 bamuwa ogw'obyamawulire mu Women’s International Peace Centre (WIPC). Kagumire yakolako nga omukwanaganya wa Africans Act for Africa (AA4A) oluvannyuma n'agenda okukola kutendekero ly'eby'amateeka n'eby'obukuumi nga eyeebuzibwako ku by'amawulire. Yunivasite ya Addis Ababa okulakulanya eby'empuliziganya n'eby'amawulire kulwa Tana High Level Forum on Security mu Afika nga byali mu Ethiopia. Rosebell Kagumire yali maneja ku mikutu mukwatira wala oluvannyuma nga y'atuusa obubaka eri abantu mu kitongole kya International Organization for Migration (IOM). Mu 2013 ne 2016, yakola mu kibiina ky'amawanga agatakulakulana ekya Least Developed Countries Independent Expert Group mutendekero erivunaanyizibwa ku by'obutonde bw'ensi n'okulakulanya munsi yonna. Yali w'eby'empuliziganya ku lwa bakyala munsi mu Women's Link Worldwide. Rosebell Kagumire mukungaana n'okusunsula ebikwatagana ku bakyala mu Afrika, omukutu ogulaga embeera abakyala abafirika zebayitamu . Akola nga omukwanaganya mu Global Reporting Centre, omukungaana era omunwadiisi ng'emirimu gye girabikira ku mikutu gy'amawulire nga The Guardian, Al Jazeera ne Quartz. Rosebell Kagumire ayambako okundiikira aba Global Voices. Memba w'akakiiko k'omu bulaaya ak'omwenkano nkano, okunoonyereza, okulwanirira ensonga eziruma abantu, n'okwebuuzibwaako mungeri y'okumannyisa ensonga z'abakyala munsi yonna.
Ebimuwereddwa.
Rosebell Kagumire yasimibwa ne Anna Guèye 2018 award kulw'okulwanirira ensonga ezeekuusa ku bya demokulasiya n'omwenkano nkano n'aba Africtivistes, ekibiina omwegatirwa abafika abalwanirizi b'eddembe African activists. The World Economic Forum yalondebwa nga omu kubakulembezze abato abatasusa myaka 40 mu 2013 olwakawefube gweyateeka mu kulwanirira obw'enkanya mu kulwanirira abantu. Mu 2012 yalondebwa Foreign Policy Magazine ku bakyala “100 abookugoberera ku mukutu gwa Twitter”. Bye yawandiika ku mikutu byawangula ekirabo kya Waxal – Blogging Africa Awards"," ekirabo ekyasooka okuweebwa munamawulire omufirika nga etegekebwa etendekero lya Panos Institute of West Africa mu 2009.  Kagumire okuwandiika ku by'eddembe n'eby'obukuumi kyalondebwa mu ku mukolo ogw'okusiima banamawulire abakola egy'okunoonyereza mu 2008 esomero ly'eby'amawulire mu yunivasite y'e Makerere.

Babungi Josephine Bebona:
Babungi Josephine Bebona era amanyiddwa nga Josephine Babungi Bebona munnayuganda era musawo muzaalisa ate nga mukiise w'abakyala ba disitulikiti y'e Bundibugyo mu Paalamenti okuva mu mwezi gwa Mugulansigwa omwaka 2021 mu Paalamenti ya Uganda ey'ekkumineemu. Mukyala munnabyabufuzi era nga wa kibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM) era abadde mubaka wa Paalamenti okuviira ddala mu mwaka gwa 2016. 
Ebyafaayo n'obuyigirize..
Babungi Josephine Bebona yazaalibwa ng'ennaku z'omwezi 06-Gatonnya-1973 mu Disitulikiti y'e Bundibugyo mu bitundu by'ebugwanjuba bya Uganda, ebisalagana n'eggwanga lya Democratic Republic ya Congo. Yasomera Semuliki High School mu Disitulikiti y'e Bundibugyo gye yamalira eddaala lya haaya mu mwaka gwa 1989. Yafuna ebbaluwa y'okubeera omusawo omuzaalisa mu 1997 okuva mu Kabaale School of Nursing and Midwifery. Mu mwaka gwa 2004, Babungi Josephine Bebona yawanddisibwa era n'afuna ebbaluwa eyitibwa Certificate of Registration in Midwifery okuva mu ssomero ly'abazaalisa erya Rubaga School of Nursing and Midwifery.
Obumanyirivu bwe mu mirimu.
Babungi Josephine Bebona yali musawo eyawandiisibwa ekibiina ekitwala abazaalisa okuva mu mwaka gwa 1999 okutuuka mu mwaka gwa 2003. Yafuuka Nursing officer ku mutendera gwa Disitulikiti okuva mwaka gwa 2005 okutuuka 2016. Ekiseera kino aweereza ng'omubaka wa Paalamenti owa disitulikiti ya Bundibugyo okuviira ddala mu mwaka gwa 2016 okutuusa kati.
Ng'ekimu ku by.ateekeddwa okukola ng'omubaka wa Paalamenti, era ng'omu ku batuula ku bukiiko bwa Palamenti omuli ne: akakiiko k'abo abalina akawuka ka mukenenya wamu n'endwadde ez'engeri ng'eyo wamu n'okubeera omukiise ku kakiiko k'ebyobulamu aka committee on Haleath. 
Ebirala ebimukwatako.
Babungi Josephine Bebona muntu akkiririza ennyo mu bwenkanya n'emirembemu kitundu gye ko n'eggwanga lye okutwalira awamu. Yayambako mu kumalawo enkayana z'amawanga ezaali wakati w'Abakonjo n'Abamba mu Disitulikiti y'e Bundibugyo. Yeenyigira mu mu kugabira amaka agaakosebwa amataba obuyambie Bundibugyo nga yeegattibwako ekitongole kya Red Cross Society wamu ne gavumenti ya Uganda, era bw'atyo n'asaba ofiisi ya Ssaabaminisita wa Uganda okutunula mu nsonga y'okukyusa ekifo kya Disitulikti y'e Bundibugyo bagifunire ekifo ekirala olw'ensonga nti abantu baayo bakosebwa nnyo amataba buli mwaka. Omukyala ono ono yeenyigira mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga y'ekkomo ku myaka gy'omukulumbeze w'eggwanga naye n'asigala n'galemeddwa okusalawo okutuusa ensonga eno gye yaggweera mu mwaka gwa 2017. Babungi Josephine Bebona yatandikawo pulojekiti y'ebyenkulaakulana eruubirira okukulaakulanya abakyala n'abantu abaliko obulemu emanyiddwa nga (PWDs) era oluvannyuma pulojekiti eno yatongozebwa omukubiriza w'olukiiko lw'eggwanga lya Uganda mu mwaka gwa 2018.
Abadde mukiise ku kakiiko ka akakola ku nsonga za mukenenya aka HIV/AIDS era nga yasobola okufuna omutindo gwa bubonero 67.86. Mungeri y'emu asobodde okwenyigira mu puloject eziwerako omuli okugula emifaliso n'agiwa abayizi b'eky'omusanvu abayitidde mu ddaala erisooka,yagabira eddwaliro lya Kikyo Health center ne Bundibugyo Hospital ekyuma ekiyamba mu kujjanjaba obulwadde bwa sukaali kye yakwasa Dr. Bukombi, yagabira abalimu abamu embuzi n'ente,n'agaba obutebe bwa pulasitiika obuwera amakumi asatu (30) ko n'akakadde kamu (1,000,000) aka ssente za Uganda bye yawa ekibiina kya Mijosa.

Kikongo:
Kikongo (naye Olukoongo mu Luganda) ekizinga olulimi bwe Bantu okwogera mu Repubuliki bwa Koongo ya Demokratiki era Repubiliki bwa Koongo ya Demokratiki ne ezoogerebwa 8,000,000. Olulimi wabula ekizinga akwogera okujakko Bakoongo. Tekinedda olw’okunyigiriza kubanga emu wa ebina kya olulimi Repubuliki bwa Koongo ya Demokratiki

Ruth Molly Lematia:
 R
uth Molly Lematia Ondoru
Yazalibwa: Ntevu 30, 1946
Gyeyasomera: Case Western Reserve University mu US
Omulimu: Munabyabufuzi 
Ruth Molly Lematia Ondoru munabyabufuzi omunnyuganda, munamateeka era alwanirira eddembe ly'abantu ng'era mukiise mu palamenti ya Uganda wamu n'okubeera omuwi w'amagezi ewa pulezidenti ku nsonga za famire. Lematia akola mateeka n'engeri ly'okugatambuza mu ggwanga lya Uganda. Yeenyiigira mu by'eddembe n'okulakulanya eby'enfuna munsi wamu ne mu kitundu gy'ava.. 
Ebimukwatako n'ebyanjigiriza.
Molly Lematia yazalibwa Sadaraka Oce ne Maliza Oberu Oce ab'e Paranga Nigo mu muluka gwa Oleba mu River Oli mu central divizoni ya Arua mu mwezi gwa Ntevu nga 30 1946 mu muluka gwa Paranga mu gombolola lya Oleba, mu disitulikiti ya Maracha. Pulayimale ye yonna yagisomera ku Paranga Primary School gyeyava okugenda ku Goli Senior Secondary School ne Mvara Senior Secondary School gyeyatulira O'level ne A level.
Alina dipulooma mu busawo obusookerwako okuva mutendekero ly'e Mulago ery'abasawo abazaalisa. kuba alina ne dipulooma mu kuzaalisa.
Alina diguli ey'okubiri emirundi ebiri mu by'okujanjaba ebizimba by'okubwongo n'eby'obulamu by'abantu okuva mu mu yunivasite ya Case Western Reserve University mu US.
By'azze akola.
Molly Lematia yaliko omubaka wa palamenti omukyala mu Uganda okuva mu 2011 paka 2016 ng'akiikirira disitulikiti ya Maracha, yali kansala wa disitulikiti ya Maracha wakati wa 2004 ne 2011. Yeyali akulira wamu n'okwebuzibwako ku by'etendekero lya Mayanja Memorial Training Institute okumala emyaka 8 okuva mu 2010 okutuuka mu 2018, okuva 2007 paka 2016 yakola nga ow'ekwebuzaako ku bukwatagana ku by'obusalawo obusokerwako mu yunivasite ya West Nile.
Yali akulira eby'enjigiriza n'okumyuka akulira yunivasite lya Aga Khan ey'omu Uganda, yakolako ng'omumyuka w'akulira eby'obusawo obutandikirwako ku setendekero lya Kampala international University ng'asomesa ku by'amalwaliro mu 2006 ne kamisona mu bya bizineensi, okusomesa eby'ekikugu, eby'emikono n'okutendeka wansi w'eddwaliro ly'e Mulago mu 2001.
Memba w'esomero ly'ensi yonna erya kookolo, erirabirira abalwadde, ekibiina ekigata abasawo abasokerwako mu Uganda ne the Alpha chapter of Sigma Theta Tau.

Nvumetta Ruth Kavuma:
Nvumetta Ruth Kavuma abasinga gwebamannyi nga Ruth Kavuma munabyabufuzi omunnyuganda, okwegatira mu kibiina ky'abanabizineensi n'okuba omusomesa. Yeyamukyala omufirika eyasooka okukulira esomero lya Gayaza High School okumala emyaka 11 wakati wa 1990 ne 2002. Oluvannyuma lw'okuba ku Gayaza High School, yayingira eby'obufuzi n'afuuka omubaka omukyala owa palamenti mu palamenti ey'omunaana eya Uganda ng'akiikirira disitulikiti y'e Kalangala wansi w'ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement. Y'omu kubakyala abaatandikawo ekibiina ky'abakyala ekya Forum for African Women Educationalists (FAWE) n'afuuka ne ssentebe eyasooka okulembera boodi ya Uganda Chapter, ekitongole ekirwanirira eby'enjigiriza by'omwana ow'obuwala.
Obulamu bwe.
Bamuzaala mu bizinga by'e Ssese nga kitaawe ye James Lutaaya n'abeerako mu Gayaza High School. nga alina abaana bana.
Eby'okusoma kwe:.
Mu 1963, yeegata ku Gayaza Junior School gyeyava okugenda ku Gayaza High School mu 1970. Yali pulifekiti kweyateeka n'okuzannya Volleyball. Yasomera ku yunivasite y'e Makerere n'afuna diguli mu bya sayansi mu Physics, Chemistry n'okubala, oluvannyuma yasuula Chemistry ku lwa Psychology.
By'azze akola:.
Y'amyuka ssentebe w'ekitongole ekiwandiisa bannayuganda. Y'omu ku bamemba b'ekibiina ekigatta ba minista n'abakiiririra palamenti mu Afrika ekya Network of African Ministers and Parliamentarians Uganda Chapter. Mulugendolwe olw'eby'obufuzii, mu palamenti ya Uganda yakolako mu kakiiko k'eby'ensimbi ekintu ekyamuwa akakisa okukwasizaako n'okufuna ebikozese okuyamba mu by'obulamu. Yaliko ssentebe w'ekibiina kya Mama Alive Initiatives (MAI) ne memba wa Network of Women Parliamentarians mu Uganda. Ali mu Rotary Club of Kampala mu bizinga by'e Ssese nga yakolako ng'omukulembezze wakyo eyavaako. Yakulemberako akakiiko akaali kasaganya okuzimba rotary baanka y'e ddwaliro ly'e Mengo. Memba w'akakiiko akavunaanyizibwa kusonga z'omwana ow'obuwala mu Uganda ng'ate memba w'akakiiko kakadukanya e Kisaakate Kya Nnabagereka.
Mu bulamu bwe obwasooka, yakola ko nga yinginiya eyali atendekebwa ku ofiisi ezivunaanyizibwa mu kutambuza amabaluwa n'ebitereke wamu n'eby'empuliziganya. Nga wayise akaseera, yakizuula nti yali tayagala bya bwa yinginiya n'asalwo okudayo ku yunivasite e Makerere n'afuna dipulooma ey'okubiri mu by'okusomesa wakati wa 1979 ne 1980. Oluvannyuma lw'omusomo zino yatwalibwa ku Gayaza High School gyeyava okugenda mu by'obufuzi mu 2001 n'afuuka omubaka omukyala eyali akiikirira disitulikiti y'e Kalangala mu palamenti. Yalekulira eby'obufuzi ekyatiisa NRM ng'ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi okuva eri abaali bagivuganya mu kutwala entebbe y'anaakiikirira disitulikiti y'e Kalangala. Weyeegatta ku Gayaza High School okusomesa, yalondebwa ekibiina ekigata abazadde n'abasomesa, ng'akiikirira abasomesa.Yalondebwa nga omumyuka w'akulira esomero, oluvannyuma n'aweebwa eky'okukulira esomero lino. Kino kyatukawo eyali akulira esomero lino Sheelagh Warren, yali awezezza emyaka 60 eg'okuwumula 60 nga addayo e Bungereza. Ensangi zino akola gwakubudabuda.

Angella Emurwon:
 
Angella EmurwonOmulimu: Muwandiisi wa mizannyo
Eggwanga: Munnayuganda
Emizannyo 
egyakyaka ennyo: Sunflower Behind A Dirty Fence; The Cow Needs A wife. 
Angella Emurwon munnayuganda era muwandiisi wa mizannyo.Yawangula ekirabo ky'omuwandiisi w'emizannyo eyasinga mu lungereza ku mutendera gw'olulimi ogw'okubiri ku lw'omuzannyo gwe ogwa Sunflowers Behind A Dirty Fence mu 2012, mu mpaka za International Playwrighting Competitionoz'omulundi ogw'amakumi abiri mu esatu ogwategekebwa BBC World Service ne British Council nga beegase wamu n'bawandiisi ba Commonwealth . Omuzannyo gwe ogwa The Cow Needs A Wife gwakwata kifo kyakusatu mu mpaka za BBC African Performance Playwriting Competition eza 2010.
Ebijuliziddwa.
1.Angella Emurwon . www.wikidata.org yafunibwa nga 30/05/2020.
2.Empaka z'abawandiisi b'emizannyo mu 2012-abawanguzi balangirirwa bbc.co.uk.yakifuna nga 16/06/2014.
3.Awangula ekirabo ky'ensi yonna ekya BBC observer.ug. yakifuna nga 16/06/2014.
.4.Katemba afunira Yuganda ekirabo ky'okuwandiika emizannyo e ky'ensi yonna ebyateekebwatekebwa nga 17/072019 ku The Wayback Machine ,theeastafrican.co.ke.yakifuna nga 17/06/2014.
5.Awangula empaka z'okuwandiika emizannyo ebyateekatekebwa nga 17/07/2019 ku The Wayback Machine,monitor.co.ug.yakifuna nga 16/06/2014.
